brought lande egipte lorde sayde vnto moses se • xo 33 iu 14 b styffnecked people suffre wrath maye waxe whote ouer maye consume wil make greate people moses sought lorde god sayde oh lorde wherfore wil thy wrath waxe whote ouer thy people thou hast brought lōde egipte wt greate power mightie hāde wherfore shulde egipcians speake saye hath brought thē myschefe slaye mountaynes destroye thē vtterly earth turne fearcenesse ye wrath gracious ouer wickednesse thy people remembre thy seruaūtes abraham isaac israel vnto whō ge • 2 c thou swarest thyne owne self saydest wil multiplye youre sede starres heauen londe haue promysed wil geue vnto youre sede shall inheret euer thus lorde repented euell sayde wolde vnto people moses turned wente downe mount hande two table wytnesse wryttē vpon sydes god worke wrytinge wrytinge god therin whan iosua herde noyse ye people shouted sayde vnto moses noyse warre hoost answered noyse haue victory haue worse heare noyse synginge daunse whan came nye vnto hoost sawe calfe daunsynge 〈…〉 moued wrath cast • ables hande brake beneth mount 〈…〉 toke calfe made brent fyre stamped vnto poulder strowed water gaue vnto child israel drynke sayde vnto aaron dyd people vnto thou hast brought greate synne vpon aaron sayde let wrath lorde waxe fearce thou knowest wicked people sayde vnto make v goddes go v tell become man moses yt brought v londe egipte sayde vnto hath golde let plucke geue cast fyre therof came calfe whan moses sawe people naked aaron whan set vp made naked shame wē te gate hoost sayde belongeth vnto lorde let come hither vnto child leui gathered selues vnto sayde vnto thus sayeth lorde god israel euery man put swerde syde go thorow one gate another hoost slaye euery man brother frende neghboure child leui dyd moses sayde vnto fell people daye thre thousande men thē sayde moses cōsecrate youre handes daie vnto lorde euery man vpon sonne brother prayse maye geuen ouer daye morow moses sayde vnto people ye haue done greate synnne wil go vp vnto lorde yf peraduenture maye make attonement youre synnes whā moses came agayne vnto ye lorde saide oh people haue done greate synne haue made goddes golde 〈1 vnto moses speake vnto child israel ye styfnecked people must come sodenly vpon make ende put thy goodly araye yt maie knowe vnto child israel laied goodly araye thē euen mount horeb moses toke worshiped euery one tent dore lorde spake vnto moses face face 〈◊〉 1 • man speaketh vnto frende whan turned agayne hoost ye yonge mā iosua ye sonne nun minister pa • • c departed ye tabernacle moses sayde vnto lorde beholde thou saydest vnto brynge ye people vp lettest knowe thou wilt sende wt yet hast thou sayde knowe name thou hast founde grace sight let knowe thy waye therfore wherby maye thy sight yt thou goest v thy people maye haue preemynence people vpon face earth lorde sayde vnto moses wyll also thou hast sayde thou hast foūde grace sight knowe name sayde oh let thē se thy glory sayde wyl cause good go ouer thy face wyl let name ye lorde called vpon ro 9 b shewe mercy shewe mercy haue compassion haue compassion sayde morouer thou mayest se face deu 4 b iudic 6 c 13 ioh 1 b shall mā lyue yt seyth ye lorde sayde farthermore beholde place shalt thou stōde vpon rocke whan glory goeth forth wil put ye clyfte ye rocke hande shal holde styll vpō tyll passed whan take 20 •• ut 7 b thou visitest wickednesse father vpon ye child childers child vnto thirde fourth generacion moses bowed self downe vnto earth worshiped saide lorde yf haue founde grace thy sight thē let wt childrē israel cōmaunded thē childrē israel sawe face yt skynne face shyned put couerynge vpō face agayne tyll wente agayne talke xxxv chapter moses gathered cōgregacion ye childrē israel daye youre dwellynges moses sayde vnto ye whole congregacion child israel lorde hath commaunded geue amonge heue offerynges vnto ye lorde 〈◊〉 25 euery one brynge lordes heue offerynge fre hert golde syluer brasse yalowe sylke scarlet purple whyte sylke goates hayre reed skynnes rammes doo skynnes fyrre tre oyle lampes spyces anoyntinge oyle swete incense onix stone stone set ye ouerbody cote te men wemen wyllynge hert brought bracelettes earynges rynges gyrdels maner iewels golde euery man also brought golde waue offerynges vnto lorde euer foūde yalow sylke scarlet purple whyte sylke goates hayre reed skynnes rāmes doo skynnes brought euer houe vp syluer brasse brought ye heue offerynge vnto lorde euer founde fyrre tre brought maner worke god seruyce soch wemen wyse herted spanne hādes brought sponne worke yalow sylke scarlet purple whyte sylke soch wemen hye vnderstondinge wyszdome spanne goates hayre ye prynces brought onix stone set stone ye ouerbody coate brestlappe spyces oyle ye lightes anoyntinge oyle swete incense thus child israel brought fre wyllynge offerynges man wemē maner worke lorde commaunded moses made moses saide vnto childrē israel beholde exo 31 ye lorde hath called name bezaleel ye sonne vri ye sonne hur trybe iuda hath fylled wt sprete god maye haue wyszdome vnderstondinge knowlege maner worke worke connyngly golde syluer brasse graue precious stone set carue wodd make maner connynge workes hath geuē instruccion hert ahaliab sonne ahisamach ye trybe dan hath fylled wt wyszdome hert make maner worke carue broder worke nedle worke yalow sylke scarlet purple whyte sylke wee • ynge make maner worke deuyse connynge workes xxxvi chapter wrought bezaleel ahaliab wyse herted men vnto lorde geuen wyszdome vnderstondinge knowe shulde forbydden brynge stuff ynough maner worke made moch ye wyse herted men amonge thē yt wrought ye worke habitacion exo 26 made ten curtaynes whyte twyned sylke yalow sylke scarlet purple cherubyns broderd worke lēgth one curtayne eight twentye cubites bredth foure cubites one measure coupled curtaynes fyue fyue together one made yalow loupe longe ye edge euery curtayne shulde coupled together fiftie loupe vpō euery curtayne wherby one might coupled another made fiftie button golde button coupled curtaynes together one might one couerynge exo 26 b made xj curtaynes goates hayre tent ouer habitacion thirtie cubytes longe foure cubytes brode one measure coupled fyue together selues sixe selues made fiftie loupe longe ye edge euery curtayne wherby might coupled together made fiftie button brasse couple ye tent together withall made ouer ye tent couerynge reed skynnes rammes ouer couerynge doo skynnes made stondinge bordes habitacion exo 26 c fyrre tre euery one ten cubytes longe cubyte half brode two fete vnto euery one wherby one might ioyned another south syde stode twentye bordes made fourtye syluer sokettes vnder vnder euery borde two sokettes two fete like maner syde habitacion towarde north made twentye bordes also fourtye syluer sokettes vnder euery borde two sokettes behynde habitacion vpon west syde made sixe bordes two corner habitacion behynde either might ioyned corner borde vnder vp aboue vpon heade come together clampe eight bordes sixtene sokettes syluer vnder euery one two sokettes made barres fyrre tre fyue bordes vpon one syde habitacion fyue vpon syde fyue behynde towarde west made barres shute thorow bordes one ende euerlayde bordes golde rynges made golde barres ouerlayde ye barres golde made cherubyns vpon hangynge broderd worke yalow sylke scarlet purple whyte twyned sylke made foure pilers fyrre tre▪ ouerlayed golde knoppes golde cast foure sokettes syluer made hanginge tabernacle dore yalow sylke scarlet purple whyte twyned sylke nedle worke fyue pilers therto knoppes ouerlayed knoppes whopes golde fyue sokettes brasse thereto xxxvii chapter bezaleel made arke fyrre tre two cubites half lōge 〈…〉 cubyte half brode cubyte half hye ouerlayed fyne golde within without made crowne golde vnto rounde aboute cast foure rynges golde foure corner vpon euery syde two made staues fyrre tre ouerlayed thē golde put rynges longe ye sydes arke beare withall made ye mercyseate pure golde two cubytes half longe cubite half brode made two cherubyns fyne beaten golde vpon two endes mercyseate one cherub vpon one ende cherub vpon ende cherubyns spredde wynges aboue hye couered ye mercyseate therwith face stode one ouer agaynst loked vnto mercyseate made ye table fyrre tre two cubytes longe cubyte brode 〈…〉 cubyte half hye ouerlayed fyne golde made therto crowne golde rounde aboute made vnto whoope hande bredth hye made crowne golde rounde aboute whoope cast foure golde rynges put foure corner fete harde whoope staues might therin beare table withall made staues fyrre tre ouerlayed thē golde beare staues withall vessel vpon table made also fyne golde disshes spones flat peces pottes poure withall made candilsticke fyne beaten golde 〈◊〉 25 vpon shaft wt braū ches cuppes knoppes floures sixe braunches proceaded ye sydes therof vpon either syde thre braūches vpō euery braūch thre cuppes like allmōdes wt knoppes floures vpon candilsticke self foure cuppes knoppes floures vnder euery two braūches knoppe knoppes braunches therof proceaded one pece fyne beaten golde made seuen lampes snoffers outquenchers pure golde hūdreth weight golde made apparell therof made also altare incense fyrre tre cubyte longe brode • auen foure squared two cubytes hye horne ouerlayed fyne golde toppe sydes rounde aboute horne therof made crowne vnto rounde aboute pure golde two golde rynges vnder crowne sydes put staues therin beare withall staues made fyrre tre ouerlayed golde made holy anoyntinge oyle incense pure spyces ye craft apotecary xxxviii chapter altare burnt offrynges made fyrre tre • xo 27 • pat 1 fyue cubytes lōge brode eauen foure squared thre cubites hye made foure horne proceaded foure corner therof ouerlaied brasse made maner vessel altare cauldron shouels basens fleshokes colepannes brasse vnto altare made brasen gredyron net worke rounde aboute vnder vp vnto myddest altare laye dore tabernacle wytnesse made courte ye south syde hangynges hundreth cubytes longe whyte twyned sylke twētye pilers therof twentye sokettes brasse knoppes whopes syluer like maner vpon north syde hundreth cubytes twentye pilers twentye sokettes brasse knoppes whoopes syluer vpon west syde fiftie cubytes ten pilers tē sokettes knoppes whoopes syluer vpon east syde fiftie cubytes fiftene cubytes vpon either syde courte dore wt thre pilers thre sokettes hanginges courte whyte twyned sylke sokettes pilers brasse knoppes whoopes syluer heades ouerlayed wt syluer pilers courte whooped aboute syluer hangynge ye courte gate made wt nedle worke yalowe sylke scarlet purple whyte twyned sylke twentye cubytes longe fyue cubytes hye measure hanginges courte foure pilers also therto foure sokettes brasse knoppes syluer heades ouerlayed whoopes syluer nales habitacion courte rounde aboute brasse summe habitacion wytnesse counted cōmaundemēt moses ye god seruice leuites vnder hāde ithamar sonne aaron prest bezaleel sonne vri sonne hur trybe iuda made lorde commaunded moses wt ahaliab ye sonne ahisamach trybe dan connynge grauer worke nedle worke wt yalow sylke scarlet purple whyte sylke golde yt wrought worke sanctuary geuen waue offerynge nyne twenty hū dreth weight seuen hundreth thirtie sycles ye sycle ye sanctuary exo •• b syluer yt came congregacion fyue score hundreth weight thousande seuen hundreth fyue seuentye sycles ye sycle sanctuary many heades many half sycles sycle sanctuary nombred twentye yeare olde aboue euen sixe hundreth thousande thre thousande fyue hundreth fiftye fyue score hundreth weight syluer cast sokettes sanctuary sokettes vayle hūdreth sokettes fyue score hundreth weight hundreth weight euery sokett thousande seuen hundreth fyue seuentye sycles made knoppes pilers heades ouerlayed whoopes waue offerynge brasse seuentye hundreth weight two thousande foure hundreth sycles wherof made sokettes dore tabernacle scarlet purple made aaron mynistringe vestimentes exo▪ 28▪ seruyce sanctuary ye lorde cōmaunded moses made ouer body cote golde yalowe sylke scarlet purple whyte twyned sylke bett golde thinne plate cut wyres might wrought amonge yalowe sylke scarlet purple whyte sylke made ye ouerbody cote came together edge sydes gyrdel craft worke euē golde yalowe sylke scarlet purple whyte twyned sylke lorde commaunded moses wrought two onix stone set rounde aboute golde grauen stone grauer name childrē israel fastened vpō shulders ouerbody cote might stone remēbraunce vnto child israel lorde cōmaunded moses made brestlappe craft worke ouerbody cote golde yalowe sylke scarlet purple whyte twyned sylke foure square dubble hande bredth longe brode fylled foure rowes stone first rowe sardis topas smaragde secōde ruby saphyre 〈◊〉 dyamonde thirde ligurios 〈◊〉 achat amatist fourth turcas onix iaspis closed rounde aboute golde rowes stone stode twolue name child israel grauen stone grauer euery one name acordinge twolue trybes vpon brestlappe made wrythen cheynes pure golde two hokes golde two golde rynges fastened two rynges vpon two edge brestlappe ye two wrythen cheynes put two rynges vpon corner brestlappe • wo endes ye wrethen cheynes put two hokes fastened vpon corner ouer body cote one ouer agaynst another made two rynges golde fastened two corner brestlappe edge might hange vpon syde ouerbody cote made yet two golde rynges put beneth vpon two corner ouerbody cote one ouer agaynst another ouerbody cote ioyneth together brestlappe might festened rynges vnto ye rynges ouerbody cote yalowe lace might lye close vpon ye ouerbody cote lowsed ye ouerbody cote lorde commaunded moses made tunycle vnto ouerbody cote wrought yalow sylke hole therof aboue myddest bonde foldē together rounde aboute hole shulde rente beneth vpon ye hemme made pomgranates yalow sylke scarlet purple whyte twyned sylke made belle pure golde put betwixte ye pomgranates rounde aboute vpon hemme tunycle bell pomgranate bell pomgranate rounde aboute seruyce lorde commaunded moses made albes also wrought whyte sylke aaron sonnes ye myter whyte sylke goodly bonettes whyte sylke breches twyned whyte lynnen girdle nedle worke euen whyte twyned sylke yalow sylke scarlet purple lorde commaunded moses made fore heade plate also ye holy crowne pure golde wrote therin grauen worke holynes lorde festened yalowe lace theron tye 〈◊〉 vnto myter aboue lorde cō maunded moses thus whole worke ye habitacion ye tabernacle wytnesse fynished childrē israel dyd lorde cōmaunded moses brought habitacion vnto moses tabernacle apparell therof button bordes barres pilers sokettes ye couerynge reed slrynnes rammes couerynge doo slrynnes vayle ye arke wytnesse wt staues therof mercyseate table apparell shewbred candilsticke wt lampes prepared apparell oyle lightes golden altare anoyntinge oyle incense hanginge tabernacle dore brasen altare brasen gredyron wt staues▪ apparell ye lauer wt foote hangynges ye courte wt pilers sokettes therof ye hanginge courte gate wt pilers nales ordynaunce fo • seruyce habitacion ye tabernacle wytnesse ye mynistringe vestimētes aarō ye prest seruyce ye sanctuary garmētes sonnes yt might execute ye prestes office acordinge ye lorde cōmaunded moses euē dyd childrē israel seruyce moses sawe ye worke yt dyd euē ye lorde commaunded blessed xl chapter ye lorde spake vnto moses sayde fyrst daye first moneth shalt thou set vp ye habitaciō ye tabernacle wytnesse shal put arke wytnes therin hange vayle ye arke thou shalt bringe table garnish brynge cā dilsticke put lampes theron ye goldē altare incense shalt thou set ye arke wytnesse hange vp hanginge dore habitaciō altare burnt offeringes shalt thou set dore habitacion tabernacle wytnesse lauer betwixte tabernacle wytnesse altare put water therin set courte rounde aboute hange vp hanginge courte gate thou shalt take anoyntynge oyle anoynte habitacion exo • 0 c shalt consecrate ye apparell therof maye holy thou shalt anoynte altare burnt offerynges vessel consecrate maye holy lauer also fote shalt thou anoynte consecrate exo 29 thou shalt brynge aaron sonnes vnto dore tabernacle wytnesse wash water put holy vestimentes vpon aaron anoynte consecrate maye prest thou shalt brynge sonnes also put albes vpon anoynte thou hast anoynted father yt maye prestes anoyntinge shall haue euerlastinge presthode amonge posterity nu 7 moses dyd lorde cōmaunded thus tabernacle set vp seconde yeare vpon first daye first moneth num 9 c whan moses reared vp fastened ye sokettes bordes barres set vp pilers spred tent ouer habitacion put couerynge tent aboue hye lorde commaunded toke wytnesse layed arke put ye staues arke set mercyseate aboue vpon arke brought arke habitacion hanged vayle arke wytnesse lorde commaunded set table tabernacle wytnesse corner habitacion vpon north syde without vayle prepared bred theron ye lorde exo 2 • c lorde commaunded set candilsticke also euen ouer agaynst table corner habitacion vpon south syde put lampes theron ye lorde lorde commaunded golden altare set also vayle brent swete incense theron lorde commaunded hanged vp hangynge tabernacle dore altare burnt offerynges set dore habitacion ye tabernacle wytnesse offred burnt offerynges meate offerynges theron lorde commaunded lauer set betwixte tabernacle wytnesse ye altare 〈…〉 put water therin wash withall moses aaron sonnes washed hādes fete ther ought wash thē whan wente tabernacle wytnesse whan wente vnto altare lorde commaunded set vp courte rounde aboute habitacion altare hanged vp ye hanginge ye courte gate thus moses fynished whole worke cloude couered ye tabernacle wytnesse glory lorde fylled habitacion moses coulde go tabernacle wytnesse whyle cloude abode theron glory ye lorde fylled habitacion whan cloude remoued habitacion wente child israel forth oft toke iourney yf cloude remoued toke iourney tyll daie remoued daye tyme cloude lorde vpon habitacion night season fyre therin ye sight ye house israel iourneis ende seconde boke moses called exodus thirde boke moses called leuiticus boke conteyneth chap ordre vse burnt offerynges whether small greate catell foules chap ii meat offerynges fyne floure c chap iii deed offerynges otherwyse called health offrynges peace offrynges thākofferynges fatt chap iiii offringe sinne prest whole congregacion viii anoyntinge consecratynge aaron sonnes chap ix aaron sonnes offred synne fyre god consumed burnt offerynge chap x death nadab abihu prestes forbydden drynke wyne porcion offerynges appoynted chap
