shewbred punyshment cursynge blasphemy chap xxv rest seuenth yeare libertye fiftieth yeare otherwyse called yeare iubylie yeare horne blowinge trompet yeare chap xxvi swete louynge promyses god soch wyl kep • commaundemētes agayne maruelous sore plage threatened vnto wyll harken worde chap xxvii vowes fre yeare redemynge lowsynge agayne catell londe man promyseth voweth dedicateth vnto lorde first chapter lorde called moses exo 29 g spake vnto ye tabernacle wytnesse sayde speake vnto ye childrē israel saie vnto euer amōge wyl brynge offerynge vnto lorde let brynge ye catell euen ox shepe yf wyl brynge burnt offerynge ye ox greate catell thē let offre male without blemysh ye dore tabernacle wytnesse reconcyle self lorde exo 29 b leui 3 let laye hande vpon heade burnt offerynge shal reconcyled yt god shalbe mercifull vnto shall kyll yonge oxe ye lorde ye prestes aaron sonnes shal brynge bloude sprenkle rounde aboute vpon altare dore tabernacle wytnesse slrynne shalbe flayne burnt offerynge shalbe hewen peces sonnes aaron prest shal make fyre vpon altare laye wod aboue ther ye peces heade fatt shal laye vpon wodd lyeth vpon ye fyre altare ye bowel legges shal waszshen water prest shal burne alltogether vpon altare burntsacrifice offerynge swete sauoure vnto lorde yf wyl offre burntsacrifice small catell lambes goates let offre male without blemysh shall kyll lorde euen corner altare north syde ye lorde prestes aaron sonnes shal sprenkle bloude rounde aboute vpon ye altare shal hewen peces prest shall laye heade fatt vpon wodd lyeth vpon fyre altare bowel ye legges shal waszshen water ye prest shal offre alltogether burne vpon ye altare burntsacrifice offerynge swete sauoure vnto lorde yf wil offre burntsacrifice ye foules vnto lorde let offre turtill doues ye yonge pigeon prest shal brynge vnto altare wrynge neck sunder maye burnt vpon altare let bloude runne vpon sydes altare croppe fethers shalbe cast vpon heape aszshes besyde altare towarde east shall deuyde wynges breake thē cleane thus shall prest burne vpon altare euen vpon wodd lyeth vpō fyre burntsacrifice offerynge swete sauoure vnto lorde ii chapter whan soule wyll offre meat offerynge vnto lorde leui 6 b 9 c nu 15 shal fyne floure shal poure oyle vpon put frankencense theron brynge vnto aaron sonnes prestes shal one take handefull floure oyle frankēcense burne remembraunce vpon altare offeringe swete sauoure vnto lorde leui 10 ye remnaunt meat offerynge shalbe aaron sonnes shalbe ye holy offerynges lorde yf wyll brynge meat offerynge baken ouen let take swete cake wheate mixte oyle vnleuended wafer anoynted oyle neuertheles yf thy meat offerynge enythinge fryed panne shal fyne swete floure myxte oyle thou shalt cut peces poure oyle theron meat offerynge yf thy meat offeringe ought broyled gredyron shalt thou make fyne floure oyle meat offerynge thou wilt make soch thinges lorde shalt thou brynge vnto ye prest shal brynge vnto altare shal heue vp meat offerynge remē braunce burne vpon altare offerynge swete sauoure vnto lorde remnaunt shal aaron sonnes shall holy offerynges lorde meat offerynges ye wil offre vnto lorde shal ye make without leuē shal leuē hony burnt offerynge vnto lorde offerynge firstlinges shal ye offer thē vnto lorde neuertheles shal come vpon altare swete sauoure thy meat offerynges shalt thou 〈…〉 salt thy meat offerynge shal neuer ye salt couenaunt thy god thy offerynges shalt thou offre salt yf thou wilt offre meat offerynge first frutes vnto ye lorde shalt thou drye grene fyre beate small offre meat offerynge thy first frutes thou shalt put oyle vpon laye frankēcense theron meat offerynge shall prest beate burne oyle frankēcense remembraunce offerynge vnto lorde iii chapter bvt yf offerynge deed offeringe greate catell whether oxe cowe shal offre soch without blemysh lorde shal laie hande vpon heade kyll dore tabernacle wytnesse prestes aaron sonnes shall sprenkle bloude rounde aboute vpon altare shal offre ye dead offerynge vnto lorde namely fat within two kydneyes fat theron vpon loynes nett leuer vpō kydneyes also aaron sonnes shal burne vpon altare burnt offerynge euen vpon wod lyeth fyre offerynge swete sauoure vnto lorde yf dead offerynge small catell whether male female shal blemish yf lambe shall brynge lorde shal laye hande vpon heade sleye tabernacle wytnesse aaron sonnes shal sprenkle bloude rounde aboute vpon altare offre deadofferynge vnto lorde namely fa • rompe backe fat couereth bowel ye fat within two kydneys fat theron vpon loynes nett leuer vpon kydneys also prest shal burne vpon altare ye meate offerynge vnto ye lorde yf offeringe goate bringeth lorde shal laye hande vpon heade kyll tabernacle wytnesse aaron sonnes shal sprēkle bloude rounde aboute vpō altare shal offer therof sacrifice vnto lorde namely fat yt couereth bowel fat yt within two kydneys fat theron vpon loynes net leuer vpon kydneys prest shal burne vpō altare meate sacrifice swete sauoure •• 7 c fatt lordes let perpetuall lawe amonge yor posterity youre dwellynges ye eate fatt 〈◊〉 9 〈◊〉 17 〈◊〉 19 f ner bloude iiii chapter lorde spake vnto moses sayde speake vnto childrē israel saye whan soule synneth thorow ignoraunce commaundemēt lorde ought namely yf prest anoynted synne make people amysse shall brynge ye synne hath done yonge bullocke without blemysh vnto lorde syn offerynge • euit 9 b bullocke shal brynge dore tabernacle wytnesse lorde laie hāde vpō heade kyll ye lorde ye prest yt anoynted leui 16 c shal take bloude brynge tabernacle wytnesse shall dyppe fynger bloude sprenkle therwith seuē tymes lorde towarde vayle ye holy shal put bloude vpon horne altare incense yt stondeth ye lorde tabernacle wytnesse bloude bullocke shal poure vpon botome altare burnt offeringes yt stondeth entringe ye tabernacle wytnesse fat syn offerynge shal heue vp namely fat yt couereth bowel fat yt within ye two kydneys fatt theron vpon loynes net leuer vpon kydneys also like heueth oxe dead offerynge shall burne vpon altare burnt offerynges skynne bullocke • xo 29 b nu 19 flesh heade legges bowel donge shal cary alltogether hoost cleane place ye aszshes poured shal burne vpon wodd fyre whan whole cōgregacion israel synneth thorow ignoraūce dede hyd eye yt ought agaynst eny cōmaundementes lorde shulde come afterwarde knowlege synne haue done shal bringe • yonge bullocke syn offerynge set ye dore ye tabernacle wytnesse elder congregacion shall laye handes vpon heade lorde kyll ye bullocke lorde ye prest yt anoynted shal brynge ye bullockes bloude tabernacle wytnesse dyppe ther fynger sprenkle ther seuen tymes lorde euē vayle holy shall put bloude vpon horne altare yt stondeth lorde tabernacle wytnesse ye bloude shal poure vpō botome ye altare burntofferynges yt stondeth dore ye tabernacle wytnesse fatt shal heue vp burne vpō altare shal bullocke dyd ye bullocke syn offeringe thus prest shal make attonement shall forgeuen bullocke shall brynge without hoost burne brent ye first bullocke shalbe ye synofferynge congregacion whan prynce synneth doth agaynst cōmaundement lorde god yt ought offendeth ignorauntly commeth knowlege synne yt hath done shal bringe offeringe goate without blemysh laye hande vpō goates heade slaye ye place ye burnt offeringes slayne ye lorde thē shal ye prest take ye bloude ye syn offeringe wt fynger put vpon altare burnt offerynges poure bloude vpon botome altare burnt offerynges fat shal burne vpō altare like fat health offerynge prest shal make attonement synne shal forgeuen whā soule ye comon people synneth ignorauntly doinge eny thinge agaynst cōmaundement lorde yt ought offendeth cōmeth ye knowlege synne yt hath done shal bringe offerynge goate without blemysh synne yt hath done shal laye hande vpon heade synofferynge slaye place burntofferynges prest shall take bloude wt fynger put vpon horne ye altare burnt offerynges poure bloude vpon botome altare fat shal take awaye like taketh awaye fat deadofferynge shal burne vpon altare swete sauoure vnto lorde shal prest make attonemēt shal forgeuen yf brynge lambe syn offerynge let brynge female without blemysh laye hande vpon heade syn offerynge kyll syn offerynge place burnt offerynges slayne prest shal take ye bloude wt fynger put vpon horne altare burnt offerynges poure bloude vpon botome altare ye fatt therof shall take frō like dyd fat lambe health offerynge shal burne vpon ye altare lordes sacrifice ye prest shal make attonement synne hath done shalbe forgeuen v chapter whan soule synneth yt heare oursynge • eui 24 c wytnesse therof hath sene agg • ▪ b knowne telleth giltie trespace whan soule 2 cor 6 c toucheth eny vncleane thīge whether ye carion vncleane beast catell worme awarre vncleane hath offended whan toucheth vncleane man vnclennesse euer man defyled withall awarre afterwarde cōmeth ye knowlege therof ye hath offended whan soule sweareth yt pronounceth wt mouth euell good euer man pronounceth wt ooth awarre afterwarde cōmeth knowlege therof hath offended one whan yt hath offended one enfourmed therof hath synned shal bringe vnto ye lorde trespace synne yt hath done female flocke either yewe goate syn offerynge shal prest make attonement concernynge synne leui 12 yf able brynge shepe let brynge vnto ye lorde offence hath done two turtill doues two yonge pigeon one syn offerynge burnt offerynge brynge prest shall make first syn offerynge fyrst wringe neck plucke cleane sprenkle bloude vpō sydes altare let resydue bloude blede vpon botome altare syn offerynge shal make burnt offerynge maner therof thus shall prest make attonement concernynge synne hath done shalbe forgeuen yf able brynge two turtill doues two yonge pigeon let brynge offerynge synne tenth deale epha fyne floure syn offerynge shall put oyle theron ner laye frankēcense vpon syn offerynge shal brynge vnto prest ye prest shal take hād full remembraunce burne vpon altare offerynge vnto lorde syn offeringe shal prest make attoment concernynge synne hath done shalbe forgeuen remnaunt shall prestes like meat offerynge lorde spake vnto moses sayde yf soule trespace yt thorow ignoraū ce offendeth thinge yt halowed vnto lorde shal brynge trespace offeringe vnto lorde euen ramme ye flocke without blemysh worth two sycles syluer 〈…〉 sycle sanctuary trespace offerynge loke hath offended halowed thinge shall make restitucion geue fifth parte therto shal delyuer vnto ye prest shall make attonement wt ramme trespace offeringe shalbe forgeuen whan soule synneth doth ought agaynst eny cōmaundement lorde yt shulde infourmed therof hath trespased giltie synne shall brynge flocke ramme wt blemysh worth trespace offeringe vnto prest shal make attonement concernynge ignoraunce dyd awarre shalbe forgeuen trespaceofferynge trespaced agaynst lorde ye lorde talked moses sayde whan soule synneth trespaceth agaynst lorde denyeth vnto neghboure gaue kepe put vnder hande hath violently taken awaye gotten vnrighteously founde lost denyeth false • oth euer wherin man synneth agaynst neghboure whan commeth passe 〈◊〉 5 synneth maner trespaceth shal restore agayne toke violently awaye gat wrongeously geuen kepe hath founde euer aboute ye hath sworne falsely shal restore againe whole alltogether geue fifth parte therto euen belonged vnto daye geueth trespace offerynge trespace shall brynge lorde euen vnto prest ramme flocke without blemysh worth trespace offerynge shall prest make attonement lorde hath synned shalbe forgeuen vi chapter lorde spake vnto moses sayde commaunde aaron sonnes saye lawe burnt offerynge burnt offerynge shall burne vpon altare night vntyll mornynge fyre altare onely shal burne theron 〈◊〉 28 g ye prest shal put lynen albe lyuen breches vpon flesh shal take vp aszshes fyre burnt offerynge vpon altare hath made shall poure besyde altare shall put rayment put rayment cary aszshes without hoost cleane place fyre vpon altare shal burne neuer go prest shal kyndle wod theron euery mornynge dresse burnt offerynge vpon burne fat deed offerynges theron fyre shall euer burne vpon altare neuer go lawe meat offerynge • um 15 • eui 2 aaron sonnes shall offre lorde vpon altare one shall heue handfull fyne floure ye meat offerynge oyle frankencense lyeth vpon meat offerynge shall burne vpon altare swete sauoure remembraunce vnto lorde remnaunt aaron sonnes shal eate vnleuended shal eate holy place namely courte tabernacle witnesse leuē shal bake porcion haue geuen offerynges shalbe vnto holy syn offerynge trespace offerynge male amonge child aaron shall eate let perpetuall lawe youre posterity sacrifice lorde man shall touch excepte consecrated lorde spake vnto moses sayde shalbe offerynge aaron sonnes shall offre vnto lorde daie anoyntinge tenth parte epha fyne floure meat offerynge daylie one half parte mornynge half parte euen panne oyle shall thou make brynge fryed peces shalt thou offer swete sauoure lorde prest amonge sonnes shalbe anoynted steade shall perpetuall dewtye vnto lorde shal burnt alltogether meat offerynges prest shalbe consumed fyre eaten ye lorde talked moses sayde speake vnto aaron sonnes saye lawe syn offerynge place thou slayest ye bunrt offerynge shalt thou slaye syn offerynge also lorde holy ose 4 b prest offereth syn offerynge shal eate holy place courte ye tabernacle wytnesse man shal touch ye flesh therof excepte halowed yf eny garment sprenkled bloude shalbe washē holy place leui 11 e 15 b earthē pot sodden shalbe broken yf brasen pot shalbe scoured rēsed water ye male amonge prestes shall eate therof holy notwithstondinge ye syn offerynge whose bloude brought tabernacle wytnesse make attonement shall eaten burnt fyre vii chapter lawe trespaceofferynge shal holy place burnt offerynge slayne shall trespace offerynge slayne also shall bloude sprenkled rounde aboute vpon altare fat shalbe offered rompe fat yt couereth bowel two kydneys fat yt theron vpon loynes net leuer vpon kydneys also prest shal burne vpon altare offerynge vnto lorde trespace offerynge male amonge prestes shal eate holy place holy euen syn offerynge shall trespace offerynge also shall haue one lawe shal prestes reconcyleth ther wt loke prest offereth eny man burnt offorynge skynne burnt offrynge hath offered shal euery meat offerynge baken ouen rosted vpon gredyron fryed panne shal prestes yt offereth euery meat offerynge yt myngled oyle drye shal belonge vnto aaron sonnes vnto one well another ye lawe health offeringe offered vnto lorde psal 115 yf wyll offre sacrifice thankesgeuynge shal offre vnleuēded cake mē gled oyle swete wafer straked ouer oyle fryed cake fyne floure mengled oyle offerynge also shall brynge vpon cake leuended bred thank offerynge healthofferynge shall offre one heue offerynge vnto lorde shalbe prestes sprenkleth bloude health offerynge flesh thank offerynge healthofferynges shalbe eaten daye offred shall nothinge left ouer vntyll mornynge leui 19 b whether vowe fre wylofferynge • shalbe eaten daye offred yf ought left ouer vntyll mornynge yet maye eaten loke remayneth vnto ye thirde daye flesh offred shalbe brent fyre yf eny man vpon thirde daie eate ye offred flesh health offerynge shall accepted offred nether shall rekened vnto shalbe refused loke soule eateth therof giltie mysdede flesh toucheth eny vncleane thinge shal eaten burnt fyre euer cleane body shal eate flesh soule eateth ye flesh ye health offerynge belongeth vnto lorde vnclennes vpon shalbe roted amonge people whan soule toucheth eny vncleane thinge whether vncleane man catell eny abhominacion eateth flesh burnt offerynge belongeth vnto lorde shalbe roted amonge people lorde talketh moses sayde speake vnto child israel saye ye shall eate fat ox 〈…〉 lambes goates neuerthelesse fat dyeth alone soch torne wylde beastes maye ye occupye maner v ye shall eate euer eateth fat ye beest geuen vnto lorde offerynge soule shalbe roted people morouer 〈…〉 ye shall eate bloude nether catell ner foules euer ye dwell soule eateth eny bloude shall roted people lorde talked moses sayde speake vnto child israel saye wyll offre healthofferynge vnto lorde shall also brynge belongeth vnto ye health offerynge lorde shall brynge hande offerynge lorde namely fat vpon brest shall brynge brest waue offerynge lorde prest shall burne fat vpon altare brest shalbe aaron sonnes right shulder shal geue vnto prest gift health offerynges loke aaron sonnes offreth bloude health offerynges fat shall haue right shulder parte 〈…〉 wauebrest heueshulder haue taken child israel health offerynges haue geuen vnto aaron prest vnto sonnes perpetuall dewtye anoyntinge aaron sonnes offerynges lorde daye whā moses presented prestes vnto lorde tyme lorde commaunded daye whan anoynted geuen child israel perpetuall dewtye vnto posterity lawe burnt offerynge meat offerynge syn offerynge trespace offerynge offerynge consecracion health offerynges lorde commaunded moses vpon mount sinai daye whan gaue commaudement vnto child israel offre offerynges vnto ye lorde wyldernesse sinai viii chapter lorde spake vnto moses sayde take aaron sonnes wt vestimentes anoyntinge oyle •• 29 bullocke syn offerynge two rammes maunde vnleuended bred call whole congregacion together dore tabernacle wytnesse moses dyd lorde commaunded gathered congregacion together vnto dore ye tabernacle wytnesse sayde vnto lorde hath commaunded toke aaron sonnes waszshed water put albe vpō girde girdell put vpon yalowe tunycle put ouerbody cote vpon girde vpon ouerbody cote put brest lappetheron ye brestlappe light perfectnesse set myter vpon heade vpon myter euen aboue fore heade put plate golde holy crowne ye lorde cōmaunded moses moses toke • xo 30 anoyntinge oyle anoynted habitacion therin consecrated sprenkled ther seuē tymes vpon altare anoynted altare vessel lauer fote might consecrated 〈◊〉 132 poured anoyntinge oyle vpon aaron heade anoynted yt might consecrated brought aaron sonnes put albes vpon girde girdle put bonettes vpon heades lorde commaunded caused bringe bullocke syn offrynge aaron sonnes layed handes vpon heade slayne moses toke bloude put vpon horne altare rounde aboute fynger purified altare poured bloude vpon botome altare consecrated might reconcyle toke fat vpō bowel nett vpon leuer two kydneys fat theron burned vpon altare bullocke wt skynne flesh donge burned fyre without hoost exo 29 • lorde commaunded brought ramme burnt offerynge aaron wt sonnes layed handes vpon heade slayne moses sprenkled ye bloude vpon altare rounde aboute hewed ramme peces burnt heade peces fatt waszshed bowel legges water burnt ye whole ramme vpō altare brunt offerynge swete sauoure euen sacrifice vnto lorde exo 29 • lorde commaunded brought also ramme offerynge consecracion aaron sonnes layed hādes vpon heade slayne moses toke bloude put vpon typpe aaron right eare vpon thombe right hande vpon greate right fote brought aaron sonnes put bloude vpon typpe right eare vpon ye thombes righte handes vpon greate toe righte fete poured resydue bloude vpon altare rounde aboute toke fat rompe exo 29 • fat vpon bowel nett vpon leuer two kydneys fat theron righte shulder maunde vnleuended bred lorde toke vnleuēded cake cake oyled bred wafer layed vpō fat vpon right shulder put alltogether vpon handes aaron sonnes waued waue offerynge lorde afterwarde toke agayne hondes burned altare euen vpon burnt offeringe offerynge consecracion swete sauoure euen sacrifice vnto ye lorde moses toke brest exo • 9 waued waue offerynge lorde ramme offerynge consecracion moses parte lorde commaunded moses moses toke ye anoyntinge oyle bloude vpon altare sprenkled vpon aaron vestimentes vpon sonnes vpon vestimentes cōsecrated aaron vestimentes sonnes vestimentes sayde vnto aaron sonnes seeth ye flesh dore tabernacle wytnesse eate bred ye maunde cōsecracion offeringes cōmaunded sayde aaron sonnes shall eate yt remayneth flesh bred ye shal burne fyre seuē dayes shall ye departe ye dore tabernacle wytnesse vntyll daye yt dayes yor consecracion offerynges ende seuē dayes must yor handes consecrated come passe daye lorde hath cō maunded ye might reconcyled ye shal tary tabernacle wytnesse daye night seuen dayes longe shal kepe ye watch ye lorde ye dye thus cōmaunded aaron sonnes dyd ye lorde commaunded moses ix chapter vpon eight daye moses called aaron sonnes elder israel sayde vnto aaron take vnto yonge calfe syn offeringe ramme burnt offerynge without blemysh brynge lorde speake vnto child israel saye take goate synofferynge calf shepe yeare olde without blemysh burnt offerynge oxe ramme health offerynge maye offre lorde meat offerynge myngled oyle daye shal lorde appeare vnto toke moses commaunded ye dore tabernacle wytnesse whole cōgregacion came nye stode lorde sayde moses lorde commaunded ye shulde shall glory ye lorde appeare vnto moses sayde vnto aaron go vnto ye altare heb 5 b 7 offre thy syn offerynge thy burnt offerynge make attonemēt people offre people offerynge reconcyle also lorde hath commaunded leui 4 aaron wente vnto altare slewe ye calfe syn offerynge sonnes brought bloude vnto dypte fynger bloude put vpon horne altare poured ye bloude vpon ye botome altare fat kydneys net vpon leuer syn offerynge burnt thē vpon altare lorde cōmaunded moses flesh also hyde burnt wt fyre without hoost afterwarde slewe burnt offeringe aaron sonnes brought bloude vnto sprenkled rounde aboute vpon altare brought burnt offerynge peces heade burnt vpon altare washed bowel legges burnt aboue vpon burnt offerynge altare brought offerynge people toke goate 〈…〉 syn offerynge people slewe made syn offerynge therof fyrst brought burnt offerynge dyd lawe brought meat offerynge toke handfull 〈…〉 burnt vpon altare besyde burnt offeringe mornynge afterwarde slewe oxe ramme health offerynge people sonnes brought bloude sprenkled vpon altare rounde aboute fat oxe ramme rompe fat couereth bowel kydneyes net vpon leuer soch fat laied vpon brest burnt fat vpon altare brest right shulder waued aaron waue offerynge lorde 〈…〉 lorde commaunded moses aaron lift vp hāde ouer people blessed came downe worke syn offerynge burnt offerynge health offerynge moses aaron wente tabernacle wytnesse whan came agayne blessed people appeared glory lorde vnto people came 〈…〉 fyre lorde vpon altare consumed burntofferynge fat whan people sawe reioysed fell vpon face x chapter ye sonnes aaron nadab abihu toke ether thē censoure 〈…〉 put fyre therin layed incense vpon brought straunge fyre lorde 〈…〉 commaūded wente fyre ye lorde consumed dyed lorde sayde moses vnto aaron lorde sayde wil sanctified vpō come nye people wil glorified aaron helde peace moses called misael elzaphan sonnes vsiel aaron vncle sayde vnto go cary youre brother sanctuary without hoost wente caried forth albes without hoost moses sayde sayde moses vnto aaron sonnes eleasar ithamar 〈◊〉 14 • 〈◊〉 6 ye shall vncouer youre heades ner rente yor clothes ye dye wrath come vpon whole congregacion let youre brethrē whole house israel bewepe burnynge lorde hath done ye shall go dore tabernacle wytnesse lest ye dye anoyntinge oyle lorde vpon dyd moses sayde lorde spake vnto aaron sayde thou thy sonnes wt shal drynke wyne ner stronge drynke 〈◊〉 44 〈◊〉 1 b whan ye go tabernacle wytnesse ye dye let perpetuall lawe vnto yor posterity yt ye maye haue knowlege discerne holy vnholy cleane vncleane ye maye teach child israel lawes lorde hath spoken vnto moses moses sayde vnto aaron vnto eleasar ithamar sonnes left 〈…〉 take remnaunt meat offerynge sacrifice ye lorde eate without leuen besyde altare holy euen holy place shal ye eate thy dutye thy sonnes dutye sacrifice lorde thus commaunded wauebrest heueshulder shalt thou eate thy sonnes thy doughters cleane place dutye geuen vnto thy child dead offerynges child israel heueshulder wauebrest offerynges fat shalbe brought maye waued waue offeringe lorde therfore thine thy childrens perpetuall dutye lorde commaunded moses sought goate syn offerynge founde burnt angrie eleasar ithamar ye sonnes aaron left alyue sayde wherfore haue ye eaten syn offerynge holy place holy hath geuen ye might beare ye synne cōgregacion make agremēt lorde beholde bloude came sanctuary ye shulde haue eaten sanctuary commaunded aaron sayde vnto moses beholde daye haue offred syn offerynge burnt offerynge ye lorde chaunsed maner shulde eate syn offerynge daye mery lorde whan moses herde content xi chapter ye lorde talked wt moses aaron sayde speake vnto ye childrē israel saye deu 14 act 10 b beestes ye shal eate amōge ye beestes vpō earth euer hath hoffe deuydeth two clawes cheweth cud amonge beestes shal ye eate loke cheweth cud hath hoffe deuydeth camell vncleane vnto ye shal eate conyes chewe cud deuyde hoffe two clawes therfore vncleane vnto hare cheweth cud also deuydeth ye hoffe two clawes therfore vncleane vnto swyne deuydeth ye hoffe two clawes cheweth cud therfore vncleane vnto flesh shall ye eate ner touch carcase vncleane vnto shall ye eate water euer hath fynnes scale water see ryuers shal ye eate euer hath fynnes scale see ryuers amonge yt moue water lyue water shalbe abhominacion vnto ye eate flesh ye abhorre carcase haue fynnes scale water shall ye abhorre shal ye abhorre amonge ye foules ye eate aegle goshauke cormoraunte vultur ye ryte kynde rauens wt kynde estrich ye nightcrow cocow sparow hauke kynde litle oule storke greate oule ye backe pellycane swanne pye heron ye iaye kynde lap wynge ye swalowe whatso euer crepeth amonge foules goeth vpon foure fete shalbe abhominaciō vnto yet shal ye eate foules crepe go vpon foure fete euen haue knyes aboue vpon ye legges hoppe withall vpon earth maye ye eate arbe kynde selaam kynde hargol kynde hagab wt kynde euer el hath foure fete amonge foules shalbe abhominacion vnto leui 5 agg 2 b ye shal take vncleane euer toucheth carcase soch shall vncleane vntill ye euen euer beareth carcase eny shall wash clothes shalbe vncleane vntyll euen therfore euery beest hath hoffe deuydeth two clawes cheweth cud shalbe vncleane vnto euer toucheth soch shalbe vncleane euer goeth vpon handes amonge ye beestes go vpon foure fete shalbe vncleane vnto euer toucheth carcase thē shalbe vncleane vntyll euen yt beareth carcase shall wash clothes vncleane vntyll euē soch vncleane vnto shalbe vncleane vnto also amonge beestes crepe vpon earth ye wesell mouse tode euery one kynde hedgehogge stellio lacerte snale moule vncleane vnto amonge crepe euer toucheth deed carcase thē shalbe vncleane vntyll euen euer eny soch deed carcase falleth vpon shalbe vncleane euer vessell wodd rayment skynne bagge euery vessell eny thinge occupyed withall shalbe put water vncleane vntyll euen shal cleane leui 6 15 b maner earthen vessell eny soch carcase falleth shal vncleane therin ye shal breake meate eatē eny soch water commeth vncleane maner drynke dronkē maner soch vessell vncleane euer eny soch carcase falleth vpō shalbe vncleane whether ouen kettell shal brokē vncleane shalbe vncleane vnto neuertheles fountaynes welles poundes water cleane euer toucheth carcase vncleane though deed carcase eny soch fell vpon sede sowne yet cleane whan water poured vpon sede afterwarde eny soch deed carcase falleth theron shall vncleane vnto whan beest dyeth ye maye eate toucheth deed carcase therof vncleane vntyll euen eateth eny soch carcase shall wash clothes vncleane vntyll euen likewyse beareth eny soch carcase shal wash clothes vncleane vntyll euen euer crepeth vpon earth shall abhominacion vnto shall eaten euer crepeth vpon ye bely goeth vpon foure mo fete amōge crepeth vpon earth shall ye eate shalbe abhominacion vnto make youre soules abhominable defyle stayne youre selues lorde youre god therfore shal ye sanctifie youre selues ye maye holy holy 〈…〉 ye shal defyle youre selues eny maner crepynge beest crepeth vpon earth lorde brought londe egipte might youre god therfore shal ye holy holy lawe ouer ye beestes foules maner soules crepynge beestes water maner soules yt crepe vpon earth ye maie knowe discerne vncleane cleane maner beestes eaten eaten xii chapter lorde talked moses sayde speake vnto child israel saye whan woman hath conceaued beareth manchilde shalbe vncleane seuen dayes longe suffreth hir disease 〈…〉 ye eight daye shal ye flesh foreskynne cut awaie shal byde home thre thirtie dayes ye bloude hir purifienger shal touch holy thinge ner come ye sāctuary tyll day hir purifienge yf heare mayde childe thē shal vncleane two wekes longe suffreth hir disease sixe thre score day shall byde home bloude hir purifienge 〈…〉 whan dayes hir purifienge sonne doughter shal brynge lambe one yeare olde burnt offerynge yonge pigeon turtill done syn offerynge dore ye tabernacle wytnesse vnto ye prest shal offre lorde make attonemēt shal clensed hir bloudyssue lawe beareth manchilde mayde childe • uit 5 b yf able bringe shepe let hir take two turtill doues two yonge pigeon one burnt offerynge syn offerynge shall prest make attonement shal cleane xiii chapter ye lorde spake vnto moses aaron sayde whan ryseth vp eny thinge skynne man flesh whether scabbe glistrynge whyte though wolde leprosy ye szkynne flesh shal brought vnto aaron prest one sonnes amonge ye prestes whan prest seyth plage vpon szkynne flesh hayres turned whyte seme deper place szkynne flesh surely leprosy therfore shal prest loke vpon iudge vncleane whan eny whyte plecke szkynne flesh yet seme deper szkynne flesh hayres turned whyte thē shal prest shut vp seuen dayes ye seuenth daye loke vpon yf plage seme vnto afore hath frett deper szkynne shall prest shut vp yet seuen dayes mo whan loketh agayne vpon seuenth daye fyndeth plage darkish hath frett deper szkynne thē shal iudge cleane szkyrfe shal wash clothes cleane whan scabbe fretteth farther szkynne sene prest iudged cleane sene prest agayne whan prest seyth thē yt scabbe hath frett farther szkynne shal iudge vncleane surely leprosy whan plage leprosy vpō man shalbe brought vnto prest whan seyth fyndeth whyte rysen vp szkynne hayre turned vnto whyte rawe flesh sore thē surely olde leprosy ye szkynne flesh therfore shal prest iudge vncleane shut vp vn cleane allready whan leprosy breaketh szkynne couereth whole szkynne heade vnto fote prest se whan prest loketh vpon fyndeth ye leprosy hath couered flesh shal iudge cleane moch turned whyte vpon cleane notwithstōdinge yf rawe flesh daye whan loked vpon thē vncleane whan prest seyth ye rawe flesh shall iudge vncleane vncleane surely leprosye yf rawe flesh chaunge agayne turned whyte shall come vnto prest whan prest loketh vpon fyndeth plage turned whyte shall iudge cleane cleane whan byle szkynne eny man flesh healeth agayne afterwarde place aryse vp eny whyte thinge glisterynge whyte som reedish shal sene prest whan prest seyeth appeareth lower szkynne hayre turned whyte shall iudge vncleane surely plage leprosye broken byle yf prest se fynde hayres whyte lower szkynne darkysh shal shut vp seuen dayes yf hath frett farther szkynne shal iudge vncleane surely plage leprosye yf glysterynge whyte abyde styll freate farther thē prynte byle prest shal iudge cleane whan szkynne eny man flesh hurt fyre prynte burninge reedysh whyte prest loketh vpon fyndeth hayre turned whyte vpon mark burnynge apeare deper szkynne thē surely leprosy brokē ye prynte ye burnynge therfore shal ye prest iudge hī vncleane plage leprosye yf prest se fynde ye hayre vpon prynte burninge turned vnto whyte lower skynne darkish also shall shut vp seuen dayes vpon seuenth daye shall loke vpon yf hath frett farther ye skynne shal iudge vncleane leprosy yf stōde styll vpō mark burnynge frett farther skynne darkysh sore ye mark burnynge prest shal iudge cleane prynte burnynge whan man woman skyruye vpon heade beerd prest seyth mark fyndeth appeareth deper skynne hayre goldē thynne shal iudge vncleane skyrfe leprosy heade beerde yf prest se ye skyrfe apeare deper thē skynne hayre pale coloure shall shut vp seuē dayes vpō seuenth daye whan loketh fyndeth skyrfe hath frett farther golden hayre skyrfe appeare deper skynne let shauen shaue scabbe prest shall shut vp yet seuen dayes moo vpon seuēth daye whā loketh fyndeth skyrfe hath frett farther skynne apeareth deper skynne shall prest iudge cleane shall wash clothes cleane yf scabbe freate farther skynne yt iudged cleane prest loketh fyndeth ye scabbe hath frett farther skynne shal seke nom • golden hayres vncleane neuerthelesse yf se scabbe stondeth styll pale hayres rysen vp ye scabbe hole cleane therfore shall ye prest iudge cleane whā eny glisteringe whyte vpō ye skynne flesh man woman prest seyth glisterynge whyte vanysheth whyte scabbe rysen vp ye skynne cleane whan hayres fall heade man woman balde cleane yf fall fore heade fore heade balde cleane yf whyte reedish sore balde heade balde fore heade leprosy rysen vp balde heade balde foreheade therfore shal ye prest loke vpon whan fyndeth whyte reedysh sore rysen vp balde heade balde foreheade shal ye skynne flesh leporous therfore leporous man vncleane prest shall iudge vncleane ye sore vpō heade leporous clothes shal rent heade bare lippes moffled shall eny wyse called vncleane longe sore vpon 〈…〉 shal vncleane dwell alone haue dwellinge without hoost whan plage leprosy cloth whether wollen lynnen warpe weft whether lynnen wollen skynne eny maner thynge made skynne whan ye plage pale reedish cloth skynne either warpe weft eny maner thinge made skynne surely plage leprosy therfore shall prest loke vpon whan seyth plage shal shut vp seuen dayes vpon seuēth daye whan seyth ye plage hath frett farther cloth warpe weft skynne eny maner thinge made skynne fretinge plage leprosye vn cleane cloth shal burnt either warpe weft whether wollen lynnē eny thynge made skynne wherin eny soch plage plage leprosy shal burnt wt fyre yf prest se plage hath frete farther ye cloth either warpe weft eny thinge made skynne shal commaunde wash thinge plage shall shut vp seuen dayes whan prest seyth plage waszshen yt plage chaūged eye hath frett farther also yet vn cleane shal burnt wt fyre depe fretē inwarde hath made skyrfes neuertheles whan prest seyth prynte vanyshed washinge shall rente clothe skynne warpe weft yf appeare eny clothe either warpe weft eny maner thinge made skynne waxinge plage fyre shal burnt eny soch plage cloth either warpe weft eny maner thynge made skynne waszshē plage departed shalbe waszshen agayne cleane lawe ouer plage leprosy clothes whether wollen lynnē ether warpe weft eny maner thinge made sknne iudge cleane vncleane xiiii chapter lorde sp • • vnto moses sayde •• ouer ye leper whan shalbe clensed 〈…〉 shall come vnto ye prest prest shal go hoost loke plage leprosye healed vpon leper shal commaunde clensed take two lyuinge • de cleane ceder wodd purple woll ysope shall commaunde one byrde kylled earthen vessell ouer sprynginge water shall take lyuynge byrde ceder wodd purple woll ysope dyppe bloude slaine byrde vpon springynge water sprenkle seuen tymes vpon must clensed ye leprosy clense let lyuynge byrde flye libertye felde clensed shal wash clothes shaue hayre bathe self water cleane afterwarde let go hoost yet shall tarye without tent seuen dayes vpon seuenth daye shal shaue ye hayre vpon heade vpō beerde vpon browes hayre shauen shall wash clothes bathe flesh water cleane vpō eight daye shal take two lambes without blemysh shepe yeare olde without blemysh thre tenth deales fyne floure meat offerynge myngled oyle logg oyle thē shall prest presente clensed thinges lorde dore tabernacle wytnesse shal take ye one lambe offre trespace offerynge logg oyle shall waue ye lorde afterwarde slaye lambe syn offerynge burnt offerynge slayne namely holy place syn offerynge trespace offerynge prestes also holy prest shall take bloude trespace offerynge put vpon typpe ye right eare clēsed vpon thombe right hande vpon greate right fote afterwarde shall take oyle logg poure awne left hande dyppe right fynger oyle left hande sprenkle oyle fynger seuen tymes lorde remnaunt oyle hande shall put vpon typpe right eare clensed vpon thombe right hande vpon greate right fote euen aboue vpon bloude trespace offerynge remnaunt oyle hande shall poure vpon heade clensed make attonement lorde shall make syn offerynge reconcyle clē sed vnclennesse afterwarde shall sleye burnt offerynge shal offre vpon altare meatofferynge make attonement cleane yf poore getteth moch hande let take one lambe trespace offerynge waue make attonement tenth deale fyne floure myngled oyle meat offerynge logg oyle two turtyll doues two yonge pigeon able get hande let one syn offerynge burnt offerynge let brynge vpon eight daye clensynge vnto prest dore tabernacle wytnesse lorde shall prest take lambe syn offerynge logg oyle shall waue lorde sley lambe trespace offerynge take ye bloude trespace offerynge put vpon typpe righte eare clensed vpon thombe right hande vpon greate righte fote poure oyle awne lefte hande right fynger sprenkle oyle left hande seuen tymes lorde remnaunt oyle hande shal put vpon typpe right eare clensed vpon thombe right hande vpon greate right fote euen aboue vpō ye bloude ye trespace offerynge oyle hāde shal poure vpō ye heade yt clensed make attonement lorde afterwarde one turtill doues yonge pigeon acordinge handes able get shal make syn offerynge ye burnt offerynge meat offerynge shal prest make attonemēt clensed lorde let lawe leper able hande get belongeth vnto clensynge lorde spake vnto moses aaron sayde whan ye come lande canaan geue possesse yf happen plage leprosy house youre possession shal oweth house come tell prest saye thynke plage leprosy house shal prest commaunde rydde thynge house euer prest go se ye plage lest house made vncleane afterwarde shall ye prest go se plage whan loketh fyndeth yt holowe strake yalowe reedish walles house seme lower wall besyde shall go dore house shut vp house seuen dayes vpon seuenth daye whan commeth seyth plage hath fretten farther walles house thē shall commaunde breake stone wherin plage cast thē foule place without cite house scraped within rounde aboute dust yt scraped poured without ye cite vncleane place take stone put place take playster playster house whan plage commeth agayne breaketh forth house yt stone brokē playster scraped house playsterd new thē shal prest go whan seyth plage hath fretten farther house surely fretinge leprosy house vncleane therfore shal house broken downe stone ye tymber dust house shal caried cite vncleane place goeth house whyle shut vp vncleane vntyll ye euen yt lyeth therin eateth therin shal wash clothes yf prest se whā goeth plage hath frett farther house house new playsterd thē shal iudge cleane plage healed syn offeringe house shal take two byrdes ceder wodd purple woll ysope slaye one byrde erthen vessell vpon sprynginge water shall take ceder wodd purple woll ysope lyuinge byrde dyppe bloude slayne byrde vpon sprynginge water sprenkle house seuē tymes shal purifie house bloude byrde springinge water lyuinge byrde ceder wodd ysope purple woll lyuynge byrde shall let flye libertye towne felde make attonement house cleane lawe ouer maner plage leprosye skyrfe ouer ye leprosye clothes house ouer sore scabbes gliste rynge whyte maye knowne whan eny thinge vncleane cleane ye lawe leprosy xv chapter lorde talked moses aaron sayde speake child israel saie vnto whan man hath runnynge yssue flesh ye vncleane thē vncleane reason yssue whan flesh fretten ye yssue wounde euery bed lyeth euer sytteth vpon shalbe vncleane toucheth bed shall wash clothes bathe self water vncleane vntyll euen yt sytteth sat shal wash clothes bathe self water vncleane vntyll euē toucheth flesh shall wash clothes bathe self water vncleane vntyll euen whan spytteth vpon cleane ye shal wash clothes bathe self water vncleane vntyll euen saddell euer rydeth vpō shalbe vncleane euer toucheth eny thinge hath bene vnder shalbe vncleane vntyll euen beareth eny soch shall wash clothes bathe self water vncleane vntyll euen euer toucheth washeth handes first shal wash clothes bathe self water vncleane vntyll euen 〈…〉 whan toucheth erthen vessell shal broken treen vessell shal rensed wt water whā cleane yssue shal nombre vij dayes yt made cleane wash clothes bathe self wt sprynginge water thē cleane vpon eight daye shal take two turtill doues two yonge pigeōs brynge lorde dore tabernacle wytnesse geue vnto prest prest shal make one syn offeringe burnt offerynge make attonement lorde concernynge yssue whan man sede departeth slepe shal bathe flesh wt water vncleane vntyll euen clothes euery skynne stained soch sede shall wash water vncleane vntyll euen woman soch one lyeth shall bathe hir self wt water vncleane vntyll euen whan woman hath bloude yssue hir flesh shalbe put parte vij day sundrie place euer toucheth shal vncleane vntyll euē lyeth vpon longe put aparte shalbe vncleane sytteth vpō shalbe vncleane euer toucheth hir bed shal wash clothes bathe self water vncleane vntyll euen euer toucheth eny maner thinge hath sytten vpō shal wash clothes bathe self water vncleane vntyll euē yf man lye whyle put parte shalbe vncleane seuen dayes leui 18 c bed laye vpon shalbe vncleane matt 9 c whan woman hath hir bloude yssue longe season onely tyme hir naturall course also tyme hir naturall course shall vncleane longe hath yssue euē tyme whan put aparte shall vncleane also euer lyeth vpon tyme hir yssue shalbe hir bed whan put aparte sytteth vpon shalbe vncleane hir vnclennesse whan put aparte euer toucheth eny shal vncleane shal wash clothes bathe self water vncleane vntyll euen yf cleane hir yssue thē shal nombre seuen dayes afterwarde shall cleane vpon eight daye shall take two turtill doues two yonge pigeon brynge vnto prest dore tabernacle wytnesse prest shall make one synofferynge burnt offerynge make attonement lorde concernynge yssue hir vnclennesse thus shal ye se childrē israel kepe selues vnclēnesse dye vnclennesse whan defyle habitacion amōge lawe ouer hath runnynge sore whose sede departeth slepe vncleane ther ouer hath hir bloude yssue euer hath runnynge sore whether man woman whan man lyeth vncleane xvi chapter lorde spake vnto moses aaron two sonnes deed leu 10 • whan offered lorde sayde speake vnto aaron thy brother yt go tymes ye ynnermer sanctuary within vale mercyseate vpon arke yt dye exo 40 • 3 8 b wyll appeare cloude vpon ye mercyseate herewithall shal go euen yonge bullocke syn offerynge ramme burntofferynge shal put holy lynnen albe haue lynnen breches vpon flesh gyrde lynnē girdell haue lynnen myter vpon heade ye holy garmentes shal bathe flesh water put cōgregacion childrē israel shal take two goates syn offerynge ramme burnt offerynge aaron shal brynge bullocke owne syn offerynge heb 9 b make attonemēt house afterwarde shall take two goates present lorde euen dore tabernacle witnesse shall cast lotte ouer two goates lot one goate lorde fre goate goate ye lordes lot fell vpon shal offre syn offerynge goate fre goates lot fell vpon shal present alyue ye lorde make attonement let fre goate go ye wyldernes shal brynge bullocke syn offerynge make attonement housholde shal kyll shall take censor full coales altare stondeth lorde handfull beaten incense brynge within ye vayle put incense vpon fyre ye lorde cloude incense maye couer mercyseate vpon witnesse • eui 4 dye shall take bloude bullocke sprenkle fynger towarde mercyseate foresyde seuen tymes shall sprenkle bloude thus fynger mercyseate thē shal kyll goate people syn offerynge brynge bloude within vayle shall bloude dyd bloude bullocke sprenkle therwith also foresyde towarde mercyseate shal reconcyle sāctuary vnclennesse childrē israel frō trespaces synnes thus shal vnto tabernacle wytnesse habitacion amō ge vnclennesses man shalbe tabernacle witnesse whan goeth make attonement sāctuary vntyll go shall make attonement self house whole congregacion israel whā goeth forth vnto altare stondeth lorde shal reconcyle shal take ye bullockes bloude goates bloude put vpon horne altare rounde aboute fynger shal sprē kle bloude theron seuen tymes halowe consecrate vnclennesse child israel whan hath made ende reconcylinge sanctuary tabernacle witnesse altare shal bringe lyuynge goate thē shal aaron laie hādes vpō ye heade confesse ouer myszdedes ye childrē israel trespaces synnes shal laye thē vpō ye heade goate man yt hande shal let runne wildernes yt goate maye beare mysdedes vpon ye wyldernesse shal leaue wyldernesse aaron shal go tabernacle witnesse put lynnen clothes put whā wente ye sāctuary shal leaue bathe flesh water holy place put awne rayment shal go forth make burnt offeringe burnt offeringe people make attonement people burne fat syn offerynge vpon altare ye caried fre goate shal wash clothes bathe self water come hoost bullocke syn offerynge ye goate syn offerynge whose bloude brought sanctuary make attonemēt shalbe caried ye hoost brent fyre skynnes flesh donge burneth shal wash clothes bathe self water come hoost shalbe perpetuall lawe vnto leu • ▪ • vpon tenth daye seuenth moneth shal ye humble youre soules worke whether one youre selues straunger amonge daye youre attonemēt made ye maye clensed youre synnes lorde therfore shall fre sabbath vnto ye shal humble youre soules let b • perpetuall lawe prest anoynted whose hande fylled prest father steade shal make attonement shal put lynnen clothes namely holy vestimētes shal recōcyle holy sāctuary tabernacle wytnesse altare ye prestes people congregacion 〈…〉 shal perpetuall lawe vnto ye reconcyle ye child israel synnes yeare moses dyd lorde commaunded xvii chapter ye lorde talked moses sayde speake vnto aaron sonnes ye childrē israel saye vnto ye lorde hath commaunded euer ye house israel yt kylleth oxe lābe goate hoost hoost bryngeth dore tabernacle wytnesse maye brought vnto lorde offerynge habitacion ye lorde shal giltie bloude though shed bloude soch man shalbe roted amonge people therfore shall child israel brynge offerynges wyll • e vpon wyde felde lorde euen dore tabernacle witnesse vnto prest offre health offerynges vnto lorde prest shal sprenkle bloude vpon altare lorde dore tabernacle wytnesse burne fat swete sauoure vnto lorde shall offre offerynges nomore vnto deuels go whorynge shal perpetuall lawe vnto amonge posterity therfore shalt thou saie vnto thē man euer house israel straunger also amonge offereth burnt offerynge eny offerynge bringeth dore tabernacle wytnesse offre vnto lorde shal roted amō ge people •• ui 7 c man euer either house israel straunger amonge eateth eny maner bloude agaynst wyll set face wil rote amonge people soule ye body bloude haue geuen altare youre soules maye reconcyled ther bloude soule maketh attonement therfore haue sayde vnto child israel soule amonge shall eate bloude ner eny straunger dwelleth amonge man euer amonge whether house israel straunger amōge huntynge taketh beest foule maye eaten shall poure bloude couer earth flesh lyueth bloude haue sayde vnto child israel • eu 9 •• ui 3 c 〈◊〉 19 f ye shall eate bloude body life flesh bloude euer eateth shalbe roted euer soule eateth dyed alone yt torne wylde beestes whether one youre selues straunger shal wash clothes bathe water vncleane vntyll euen cleane yf wash clothes bathe self shal beare synne xviii chapter lorde talked wt moses saide speake vnto childrē israel saye vnto lorde youre god ye shall ye workes lande egipte wherin ye dwelt nether doynges lande canaan brynge ye shal walke customes lawes shall ye statute shall ye kepe ye maye walke therin lorde youre god therfore shal ye kepe statute lawes ro 10 man doth shal liue therin lorde mā shal come nexte kinszwomā vncouer hir preuytie ye lorde thou shalt vncouer ye preuytie ye father ye mother thy mother gen 14 eze 22 • therfore shalt thou vncouer hir preuytie thou shalt vncouer ye preuytie ye father wife ye father preuytie deu 22 27 • 1 cor 5 thou shalt vncouer preuytie thy sister doughter ye father ye mother whether borne home without thou shalt vncouer preuytie thy sonnes doughter deu 27 2 1 • thy doughters doughter thine awne preuytie thou shalt vncouer ye preuytie ye father wiues doughter borne vnto thy sister thou shalt vncouer preuytie thy father sister thy father nexte kynszwoman thou shalt vncouer preuytie thy mother sister leui • 0 • ye mother nexte kynszwoman thou shalt vncouer preuytie thy father brother take wife thine awnte thou shalt vncouer ye preuytie ye doughter lawe ye sonnes wife gen 38 • deu 27 • therfore shalt thou vncouer hir preuitie thou shalt vncouer preuytie thy brother wife leui 20 • mat 14 • thy brother preuytie thou shalt vncouer preuytie thy wife hir doughter also nether shalt thou take hir sonnes doughter hir doughters doughter vncouer preuyties hir nexte kynszwomen wickednesse thou shalt take wife hir sister also vncouer hir preuytie gen 29 • whyle yet alyue thou shalt go vnto woman vncouer hir preuytie leu 15 eze 22 b longe hath hir disease hir vnclennesse thou shalt lye thy neghbours wife medle her2 11 • defyle thy self withall thou shalt geue thy sede also burnt vnto moloch leu 20 • lest thou vnhalowe name thy god lorde • om 1 • eu 20 b thou shalt lye mankynde womankynde yt abhominacion • eu 27 c thou shalt lye maner beest defyle ye self therwith woman shal haue wt beest abhominacion ye shal defyle youre selues none thinges ye heithen wil cast haue stayned selues londe defyled thorow wickednesse wyl vyset vpō londe shal spue indweller therof therfore kepe ye statute lawes one abhominacions nether one youre awne selues ner straunger amonge soch abhominacions haue ye people lōde done haue defyled lande lande spue also whan ye haue defyled spewed heythē euer commytte abhominaciōs soules shalbe roted amonge people therfore kepe ye statute ye ye abhominable customes ye defyled therwith lorde youre god xix chapter lorde talked moses sayde speake whole congregacion child israel saye vnto leui 11 g 20 c 1 pet 1 c ye shall holy holy euen lorde youre god euery one feare father mother repe holy dayes lorde youre god ye shal turne youre selues vnto idol ye shal make goddes metall lorde youre god whan ye wyll offre health offerynges vnto lorde shal ye offre thē maye mercifull vnto leuit 7 b ye shal eate daye ye offre morow euer left thirde daye shalbe burnt fyre yf eny man eate therof vpon thirde daye vnholy shall accepted eater shal beare synne hath vnhalowed sanctuary lorde soch soule shalbe roted amonge people whan thou reapest thy londe thou shalt reape downe vttemost border rounde aboute leui 33 deu • 4 ner gather cleane vp euen likewyse thou shalt plucke thy vynyarde cleane also ner gather vp grape fallen downe shalt leaue ye poore straungers lorde youre god ye shal steale nether lye ner deale falsely one another ye shal sweare falsely name exo • • ▪ • vnhalowe name thy god lorde thou shalt ye neghboure wronge ner robbe deut • tob▪ • workmās laboure shal byde vntyll mornynge thou shalt curse deaf 〈…〉 thou shalt put stomblynge blocke ye blinde shalt feare thy god lorde ye shall deale wrongeously iudgment nether shal ye accepte personne poore ner honoure parsonne greate thou shalt iudge thy neghboure righteously thou shalt let preuy accuser go amōge ye people nether shalt thou stonde agaynst ye neghbours bloude ye lorde thou shalt hate thy brother thine hert mat • ecc • shalt tell ye neghboure faute thou beare synne sake thou shalt auenge thy self ner beare euell agaynst childrē thy people 〈…〉 ro • • gen • thou shalt loue thy neghboure thy self lorde statute shal ye kepe thou 〈…〉 ro • • gen • let ye catell gendre beestes another kynde nether sowe thy felde myngled sede let garment come vpon yt mixte wollen lynnen whan man lyeth woman hath bonde woman hath bene medled withall another man lowsed ner hath optayned fredome shalbe punyshed shal suffre death fre shal brynge trespace vnto ye lorde euen dore tabernacle wytnesse ramme trespace ferynge▪ prest shal make attonement trespace offerynge lorde concernynge synne hath done • • shall god mercifull vnto concernynge synne hath done tyme ye come londe plante maner tree wherof men eate ye shall circumcise foreskynne frutes thre yeares shall ye holde vncircumcysed ye eate fourth yeare shall frutes holy praysed vnto ye lorde fifth yeare shall ye eate frutes gather ye lorde youre god • eui 3 c • eu • 8 b ye shal eate nothinge wt bloude ye shall regarde ye foules cryenge ner chose dayes • eui 21 〈◊〉 44 c ye shal shaue crownes vpō youre heade nether shalt thou clyppe thy beerde cleane ye shal rente markes youre body eny deed ner make lettres vpō lorde thou shalt holde thy doughter whordome londe fall whordome waxe full wickednesse kepe holy dayes stonde awe sanctuary lorde • eg 28 b ye shal turne yor selues ye soyth sayers axe nothinge expounder tokēs ye defyled lorde youre god • ccli 8 tim 5 thou shalt ryse vp graye heade shalt geue reuerence vnto aged thou shalt feare god ye lorde • word 22 c whan dwelleth straunger amonge youre londe ye shall vexe shal dwell euen one home amonge thou shalt loue ye self ye youre selues also straungers lande egipte lorde youre god ye shal deale wrōgeously iudgmēt meteyarde weight measure true balaunce true weight true epha true hin shalbe amōge lorde youre god brought londe egipte ye shulde kepe statute lawes lorde xx chapter lorde talked moses saide tell child israel leui 18 c deut 27 euer amonge child israel eny straunger dwelleth israel geueth sede vnto moloch shall dye death people lande shal stone wyll set face agaynst man wyll rote amōge people hath geuen sede vnto moloch defyled sanctuary vnhalowed holy name though people londe loke thorow fyngers vpon man hath geuen sede vnto moloch put death yet wyl set face agaynst man agaynst generacion go whorynge moloch wyll rote amonge people yf eny soule turne ye soythsayers expounder token goeth whorynge wyl set face agaynst soule wyl rote amonge people leui 1 • nu 11 • iosu 3 • sanctifie youre selues therfore holy holy euen youre god kepe ye statute ye lorde sanctifieth euer curseth father mother shall dye death exo 21 pro 20 • matt •• bloude vpon hath cursed father mother breaketh wedlocke eny mās wife deu 22 shal dye death aduouterer ye aduouteresse hath broken wedlocke neghbours wife yf eny man lye father wife leuit 18 deu 27 yt vncouer father preuyte shal dye death bloude vpō thē yf eny man lye wt doughter lawe leui 1 • shall dye haue wrought abhominacion bloude vpon yf eny man lye mankynde leui 18 rom 1 womankynde haue wrought abhominacion shal dye death bloude vpon yf eny man take wyfe leui 18 hir mother therto hath wrought wickednes shalbe burnt fyre shal also wickednes amōge yf eny man lye beest leui 18 deu 27 shall dye death beest shal slayne yf woman medle beest yt haue wt thou shalt put death beest also shall dye death bloude vpon yf eny man take sister father doughter mother doughter se hir preuyte agayne se secretes wicked thinge shalbe roted sight people hath vncouered sister preuyte shal beare synne yf man lye woman tyme hir sicknesse vncouer hir secretes leui 15 • 18 c open vp hir founteyne vncouer fountayne hir bloude shall roted amonge people thou shalt vncouer preuytie thy mother sister thy father sister leui 18 b soch one hath vncouered nexte kynswoman shal beare synne yf eny man lye vncles wyfe hath vncouered preuytie vncle shal beare synne without child shal dye 〈◊〉 18 b 〈◊〉 14 yf eny man take brother wyfe yt vncleane thinge shalbe without child hath vncouered brother secretes kepe statute lawes yt lōde whither brynge dwell therin spewe walke ye ye statute heithen shal cast • eut 9 soch thinges haue done haue abhorred thē saye vnto ye shall possesse londe wyll geue enheritaunce lōde floweth mylke hony lorde youre god haue separated nacions ye also shulde separate cleane beestes frō vncleane vncleane foules cleane defyle youre soules vpon beestes vpon foules vpon crepeth grounde • eui 11 • eut 14 haue separated vnto shulde vncleane therfore shall ye holy vnto lorde holy haue separated frō nacions ye shulde myne • eu 1 • b 28 b yf man woman soythsayer expounder token shall dye death shalbe stoned bloude vpon xxi chapter lorde sayde vnto moses speake ye prestes ye sonnes aaron saye vnto thē 〈◊〉 44 prest shal defyle self vpō soule people vpon nexte kynne yt belongeth vnto vpon mother vpō father vpō sonne vpō doughter vpon brother vpon sister yet virgin hath bene man wife belongeth vnto vpon maie defyle morouer shal defyle self vpō eny ruler people vnhalowe self leui 19▪ f eze 44▪ c shall make crowne also vpon heade ner shaue beerd nether shall cut eny markes ī fleshe shalbe holy vnto god vnhalowe ye name god offre sacrifice lorde bred god therfore shal holy shal take whore ner one defyled1 tim 2 yt put awaye hir huszbande holy vnto god therfore shal sanctifie self offreth bred thy god shal holy vnto holy euen lorde sanctifieth yf prestes doughter fall whoringe shalbe burnt fyre hath shamed hir father hye prest amonge brother vpō whose heade anoyntinge oyle poured hande fylled yt might arayed vestimentes shal vncouer heade ner cut clothes shal come deed luc • shal defyle self nether vpon father ner mother shall go sanctuary vnhalowe sanctuary god ye crowne anoyntinge oyle god vpon lorde virgin shal take wife wedowe ner deuorsed ner defyled ner whore eze • • • virgin awne people shal take wife yt vnhalowe sede amonge people ye lorde sanctifie ye lorde talked wt moses sayde speake vnto aaron saie yf blemysh vpō eny ye sede yor generacions shal preasse offre bred god 〈…〉 euer hath blemysh vpon shal come nere whether blynde lame euell fauoured nose wt eny myszshappen membre yt hath broken fote hande croke backed hath eny blemysh eye gleyd skyrvye scaulde hath stone broken euer sede aaron ye prest hath eny blemysh vpō shal come nye offre ye sacrifice lorde hath deformyte therfore shall preasse vnto bred god offre notwithstondinge shal eate bred god holy ye holy shal go ye vayle ner come nye altare moch hath blemysh vpō yt vnhalowe sāctuary ye lorde yt sanctifieth thē moses spake vnto aaron sonnes child israel xxii chapter lorde talked moses sayde speake vnto aaron sonnes yt absteyne ye halowed thinges childrē israel haue halowed vnto yt vnhalowe holy name ye lorde saie vnto posterity euer yor sede yt commeth nye vnto holy thinges childrē israel halowe vnto lorde defyleth self vpon soule shal perishe face lorde euer sede aaron leper hath runnynge yssue shall eate holy thinges tyll clensed toucheth eny vncleane thinge whose sede departeth night toucheth eny worme vncleane vnto mā yt vncleane vnto euer defyleth hī loke soule toucheth eny soch vncleane vntyll euen shall eate holy thinges shall first bath flesh water whā ye sonne gone downe cleane maye eate therof foode loke dyeth alone rent wylde beestes shall eate yt vncleane theron ye lorde therfore shal kepe lawe yt lade synne vpon dye therin whan vnhalowe selues ye lorde yt halowe straunger shal eate holy thinges ner housholde gest prestes ner hyred seruaūt yf ye prest bye soule money ye maye eate therof loke borne house maye eate bred also neuertheles yf prestes doughter straungers wife shal eate heue offeringes holynes yf wedowe deuorced haue sede commeth agayne hir father house afore whan yet mayden hir father house shall eate hir father bred straūger shal eate therof el eateth halowed thynges vnwyttingly shal put ye fifth parte vnto geue vnto prest halowed thinge vnhalowe ye halowed thinges child israel heue vp vnto lorde lest lade selues myszdoinge trespace whā eate halowed thynges ye lorde halowe thē ye lorde talked wt moses saide speake vnto aaron sonnes ye childrē israel deut 15 c 17 euer israelite straunger israel wyll offerynge whether vowe fre wyl wyll offre burnt offerynge vnto lorde reconcyle selues shal male without blemysh ox lambes goates • al 1 b euer hath eny blemish shal offre shal fynde fauoure therwith wyl offre health offeringe vnto lorde separate vowe fre wyl ox shepe shalbe without blemysh yt maye accepted shal haue deformite yf blynde brokē wounded haue wen skyrvye scabbed shal offre none soch vnto lorde ner put offerynge eny soch vpō altare lorde oxe shepe yt hath myszshappē membres rompe mayest thou •• fre wyll vowe maye accepted thou shalt offre also vnto lorde nothinge yt brused broken rent cutt ye shal soch youre londe morouer ye shall offre bred vnto youre god straungers hande marred hath deformite therfore shal accepted lorde spake vnto moses sayde whā oxe lābe goate brought forth shal seuen dayes dame vpon eight daye therafter maie offered vnto lorde thē accepted whether oxe lambe shall slayne yonge one daye whā ye wil offre thāk offringe vnto lorde yt maye accepted ye shal eate daye kepe nothinge ouer vntyll mornynge lorde therfore kepe commaundementes lorde yt ye vnhalowe holy name maye halowed amonge child israel halowe euē ye lorde brought ye lōde egipte yt might yor god euen ye lorde xxiii chapter lorde talked moses sayde speake vnto ye child israel saye vnto ye feastes lorde ye shal call holy dayes sixe dayes shalt thou worke exo 2 • • deu 5 b seuenth daie rest sabbath shalbe called holy ye shal worke therin sabbath lorde euer ye dwell feastes lorde yt called holy ye shal call youre feastes exo 12 • nu 28 c eze 45 • apon ye fourtene daye ye first moneth euen lordes easter vpon ye fiftene daye moneth feast vnleuēded bred lorde shall ye eate vnleuended bred seuen dayes first daie shalbe called holy amonge ye shal worke bōdage therin nu 2 • • seuē day shal ye offre vnto ye lorde seuēth daie shalbe called holy likewise wherin ye shal worke bondage also ye lorde talked wt moses sayde speake childrē israel saye vnto whan ye come lande yt shall geue reape downe youre haruest ye shal brynge shefe first frutes youre haruest vnto prest thē shall shefe waued lorde ye maye accepted shal prest nexte daye sabbath ye daie yor shefe waued shal ye offre burnt offeringe vnto lorde lambe without blemysh one yeare olde wt meat offerynge two tenth deales fyne floure mengled oyle offerynge swete sauoure vnto lorde drynk offerynge also euē fourth parte hin wyne ye shall eate nether bred cake ner furmentye new corne tyll daye ye brynge offerynge vnto youre god • osu • c shalbe lawe vnto youre posterity euer ye dwell deu 16 b shal ye nombre nexte daye sabbath whan ye brought ye waueshefe seuen whole wekes vntyll nexte daie ye seuēth weke namely fiftie day shal ye nombre offre new meat offerynges vnto lorde youre dwellinges shal ye offre namely two waue loaues two tenth deales fyne floure leuēded baken first frutes vnto ye lorde • u 28 youre bred ye shal brynge seuen lambes one yeare olde without blemysh yonge bullocke two rammes shalbe lordes burnt offerynge meat offerynge drynk offrynge sacrifice swete sauoure vnto lorde morouer ye shal offre goate syn offerynge two lambes yeare olde health offerynge ye prest shal waue vpon bred first frutes lorde two lambes shalbe holy vnto lorde shal prestes daye shal ye proclame shalbe called holy amonge seruyle worke shal ye therin perpetuall lawe shall amonge yor posterity euer ye dwell leu 19 c • eu 24 whan ye reape downe ye haruest youre londe ye shal cut cleane downe vpō felde ner gather vp shal leaue poore straungers lorde youre god ye lorde talked moses sayde speake vnto child israel saye • u 39 vpon first daye seuenth moneth shal ye haue holy rest remembraunce blowinge wherin ye shal seruyle worke ye shal offre sacrifice vnto lorde lorde spake vnto moses sayde leu • • nu • vpon tenth daye seuenth moneth daye reconcylinge shalbe holy conuocacion wt ye shal humble youre soules therin offre vnto lorde shal seruyle worke daye daye attonement ye maye reconcyled lorde youre god soule euer humbleth self vpon daye shalbe roted amonge people soule euer doth eny worke daye wil destroye amonge people therfore shall ye worke shalbe perpetuall lawe vnto youre posterity euer ye dwell rest youre sabbath ye maye humble youre soules vpon nyenth daye ye moneth euen shal ye kepe holy daye euen forth vntyll euē agayne lorde talked moses sayde 〈…〉 vpon fiftene daye seuenth moneth feast tabernacle seuen dayes vnto lorde first daye shal holy cōuocacion seruyle worke shal ye therin seuen dayes shal ye offre vnto lorde eight daye shalbe holy conuocacion vnto also ye shal offre vnto lorde daye gatheringe together seruyle worke shall ye therin holy day lorde ye shall proclame holde holy conuocacions ye maye offre vnto lorde burnt offerynges meat offerynges drynk offerynges offerynges euery one acordinge daye besyde ye sabbathes ye lorde youre giftes vowes frewyl offerynges ye offre vnto lorde vpon fiftene daye seuenth moneth whan ye haue brought increase londe ye shall kepe lordes feast seuen dayes longe first daye shalbe kepte holy daye eight daye shalbe kepte holy daye also vpon first daie ye shal take ye goodly frutefull tree braunches palme tree bowes thicke tree wyllies broke seuē dayes shal ye mery ye lorde youre god thus shal ye kepe feast vnto lorde seuen dayes yeare shalbe perpetuall lawe amonge youre posterity kepe holy daye thus ye seuenth moneth seuen dayes shal ye dwell bothes euer israelite borne shal dwell bothes come maye knowe made ye child israel dwell bothes whan brought lōde egipte lorde youre god moses tolde child israel holy day lorde xxiiii chapter lorde spake vnto moses sayde 〈◊〉 7 cōmaunde child israel brynge pure oyle olyue beaten lightes maye allwaye put lampes without vayle wytnesse tabernacle wytnesse aaron shall dresse allwaye euen ye mornynge lorde let perpetuall lawe vnto youre posterity lāpes shal dresse vpon pure candilsticke lorde perpetually thou shalt take fyne floure bake twolue cake therof 〈◊〉 25 c two tēth deales shal euery cake haue thou shalt laye sixe rowe vpō pure table lorde vpon shalt thou laye pure frankencense maye bred remembraunce offerynge vnto ye lorde euery sabbath shal prepare thē lorde allwaye receaue child israel euerlastinge couenaunt 〈◊〉 21 shalbe aaron sonnes shal eate holy place holy offerynges lorde perpetuall dewtye wente israelitish woman sonne childe man egipte amonge child israel stroue ye hoost man israel 〈◊〉 10 b named name god blasphemously cursed brought vnto moses mother name selomith doughter dibri trybe dan 〈◊〉 1 • put preson tyll infourmed mouth lorde lorde spake vnto moses sayde brynge cursed hoost let thē herde laye handes vpon heade let whole congregacion stone saye vnto childrē israel mat 26 g ioh 19 euer blasphemeth god shall beare synne blasphemeth name lorde shal dye death whole congregaciō shal stone straunger shal housholde also yf blaspheme name shal dye slayeth man shall dye ye death slayeth beest shall paye exo 21 b deut▪ 19 iudic 1 b math 5· c soule soule maymeth neghboure shall done vnto euen hath done broke broke math 5 c eye eye tothe tothe euen hath maymed man shal done vnto agayne slayeth beest shall paye slayeth man shal dye shal one maner lawe amonge ye straunger one youre selues lorde youre god moses tolde child israel brought cursed ye hoost stoned thus dyd childrē israel lorde cōmaunded moses xxv chapter lorde talked moses vpon mount sinai sayde speake child israel saye vnto whan ye come londe exo 23 b yt shal geue londe shal rest vnto lorde thou sowe thy felde sixe yeares sixe yeares cut ye vynes gather frutes seuenth yeare lō de shal haue sabbath rest sabbath vnto lorde wherin thou shalt sowe thy felde ner cut thy vynes loke groweth self thy haruest thou shalt reape grape growe without thy laboure shalt thou gather moch yeare londes rest deut 15 • rest londe shalt thou kepe intent thou mayest eate therof thy seruaunte thy mayde thy hyrelinge thy gest thy straūger thy catell beestes thy londe increase shal meate thou shalt nombre seuen yeare sabbathes seuen yeares maye tolde seuen tymes tyme seuen yeare sabbathes make nyne fourtye yeares shalt thou let blast horne go thorow youre londe vpon tenth daye seuenth moneth euen ye daye attonement ye shal halowe fiftieth yeare shall call fre yeare ye londe dwell therin yeare iubilye eze 46 c shall euery one amonge come agayne possession kynred fiftieth yeare ye yeare iubilye ye shal sowe ner reape groweth ner gather grape growe without laboure yeare iubilye shall holy amonge loke felde beareth shall ye eate yeare iubilye wherin ye shal come againe euery man owne whan thou sellest ought vnto thy neghboure byest eny thinge shal none oppresse brother acordinge nombre yeare iubilye shalt thou bye acordinge nombre yeares increase shall sell vnto acordinge multitude yeares shalt thou rayse pryce acordynge fewnesse yeares shalt thou mynish pryce shall sell vnto acordinge nombre increase therfore let man defraude neghboure feare ye god lorde youre god wherfore statute kepe lawes yt ye ye maye dwell safe londe londe shal geue hir frute ye shal haue ynough eate dwell safe therin yf ye wolde saye shall eate seuenth yeare moch shal sowe ner gather oure increase wyll sende blessynge vpon sixte yeare shal brynge forth frute thre yeare ye shal sowe ye eight yeare eate olde frute vntyll nyenth yeare ye maye eate olde tyll new frutes come agayne therfore shall ye sell londe euer psal 23 lōde myne ye straungers indweller youre lande shall ye geue londe lowse nu 36 c • ere 32 ruth 4 whan thy brother waxeth poore selleth ye possession nexte kynszmā commeth yt maye redeme shall redeme brother solde whan man hath none redeme cā get moch hande redeme one parte shall rekened many yeares hath bene solde remnaunt shal restored vnto solde yt maie come agayne possession yf hande get moch haue one parte agayne thē shal yt solde styll hande byer vntyll ye yeare iubilye ye shal go returne owner agayne selleth dwellinge house within walles cite hath whole yeare respyte lowse agayne shall tyme wherin maye redeme yf redeme fore whole yeare shal bought successours kepe euer shall go lowse yeare iubylie neuertheles yf house vyllage hath wall aboute shall counted like vnto felde coūtre maye redemed shal go fre yeare iubilye city leuites house city possession maye waye redemed purchaceth ought leuites shal leaue yeare iubilye whether house cite hath possession house city leuites possession amonge child israel felde city shal solde awne euer whan thy brother waxeth poore falleth decaye besyde thou shalt receaue straunger gest maye lyue thou shalt take 〈…〉 vsury ner thou hast geuē shalt feare thy god thy brother maye lyue besydes thou shalt lende ye money vpon vsury ner delyuer thy meate vpon vauntage lorde yor god haue brought lō de egipte geue lande canaan youre god whan thy brother waxeth poore besyde selleth vnto 〈…〉 thou shalt holde bōde mā hyred seruaunte soiourner shall wt serue vntyll ye yeare iubilye shal departe lowse childrē shal returne awne kinred father possession seruauntes brought londe egipte therfore shal solde like bondman thou shalt raigne ouer crueltie shalt feare thy god yf thou wylt haue bōde seruauntes maydens thou shalt bye heithen rounde aboute child soiourners straungers amonge generacions borne youre londe shal ye haue bonde seruaūtes shal possesse youre child euerlastinge possession shalbe yor bondman 〈…〉 ouer youre brother child israel shall none raigne ouer another crueltie whan straunger soiourner waxeth ryche thy brother waxeth poore besyde selleth self vnto ye straunger soiourner eny kynne shall haue right solde redemed agayne eny brother maye lowse vncle vncles sonne eny kynszman kynred yf awne hande getteth moch shal lowse self shal reken bought ye yeare solde self vntyll yeare iubilye ye money shal counted acordinge nombre yeares solde wage whole tyme shalbe rekened withall yf yet many yeares vnto ye yeare iubilye shal acordinge geue delyueraunce therafter solde yf remayne yeares vnto yeare iubilye shall geue agayne therafter redempcion wage yeare yeare shall reken withall thou shalt let raigne cruelly ouer ye sight yf bye self maner shal go fre yeare iubilye childrē childrē israel seruauntes haue brought londe egipte lorde youre god 〈◊〉 3 ye shall make idol ner ymage ye shal reare vp piler ner set vp eny markstone youre londe bowe youre selues therto lorde youre god kepe sabbathes stonde awe sanctuary lorde xxvi chapter yf ye wyll walke statute kepe commaundementes 〈◊〉 28 thē wyl geue rayne due season ye londe shal geue hir increase tree ye felde shal brynge forth frute threszshinge tyme shall reache vnto wyne haruest wyne haruest shal reache vnto sowynge tyme ye shall eate yor bred plenteousnes shal dwell safe youre londe wil geue peace youre londe ye shall slepe man shall make afrayed wyl ryd euell beestes youre londe shall swerde go thorow youre londe ye shal chace youre enemy shal fall ye swerde 〈◊〉 23 c 〈◊〉 30 c fyue shal chace hundreth hundreth shal chace ten thousande youre enemy shall fall swerde wyl turne vnto wyl cause growe increase wyl set vp couenaunt ye shal eate olde stoare shall let go olde plenteousnesse new exo 29 g 2 cor 6 c haue dwellynge amonge soule shall refuse wyll walke amonge wyl youre god ye shalbe people lorde youre god brought londe egipte ye shulde bondman haue brokē cepter youre yocke caused go vp right yf ye wil harken vnto deut 28 b mala 2 ner commaundementes wyl despyse statute yf youre soules refuse lawes yt ye wyll commaundementes shal let couenaunt stonde wyll agayne vnto wyl vyset shortly swellynges feuers shal destroye ye eye consume awaie ye hert ye shal sowe youre sede vayne youre enemy shal eate vp wyl set face agaynst ye shal slayne youre enemy hate shal haue dominion ouer pro 28 ye shall flye whā man chaseth yf ye wyll herken vnto wyl make yet seuen tymes punysh youre synnes maye breake ye pryde youre strength wyl make youre heauen lyke yron youre earth brasse youre trauaile labor shal lost youre londe shall geue hir increase tree londe shal brynge forth frute yf ye walke yet agaynst wyll harken vnto wyl make yet seuen tymes punysh youre synnes wyl sende wylde beestes amō mōge shal robbe destroie youre catell make fewer youre hye waye shal become waist yf ye wyl yet refourmed withall wyll walke contrary vnto wyl walke contrary vnto also wyll punysh yet seuen tymes youre synnes wyl brynge vpon swerde vengeaunce shall auenge testament though ye gather together youre city yet wyll sende pestilence amonge wyll delyuer handes youre enemy wil destroye youre prouysion bred yt ten wemen shall bake youre bred one ouen youre bred shal delyuered weight osc 4 b mich 6 c whan ye eate ye shall haue ynough yf ye wyl yet harken vnto wyl walke contrary vnto wyll also walke cōtrary vnto wrath full displeasure wyll punysh seuen folde youre synnes 4 6 f ye shal eate flesh youre sonnes doughters wyl destroye youre hye altares rote youre ymages wyll cast youre body vpon body youre idol soule shall abhorre youre city wyll make waist brynge youre church naught wyll smell youre swete odoures thus wyll make londe desolate youre enemy shall dwell therin make waist scater amonge heythen drawe swerde youre londe shal waist youre city desolate shall londe reioyse hir sabbathes longe lyeth wayst ye enemy londe yee shal londe kepe holy daye reioyse hir rest longe lieth wayst coude rest youre sabbathes whan ye dwelt therin remayne wyll make faynte harted londe enemy shakynge leaf shall chace shall flye though swerde persecuted shal fall noman folowynge vpon shall fall one vpon another swerde noman yet chacynge ye shall bolde withstonde youre enemy shal perishe amonge heithen londe youre enemy shal eate vp l • ft shall pyne awaye myszdede euen enemy londe myszdedes father shall consume awaye shall knowlege myszdedes myszdedes father trespace wherwith haue trespaced agaynst walked contrary vnto therfore wyll also walke contrary vnto thē wyll brynge enemy londe shal vncircumcysed herte tamed shall ende myszdedes deut 4 c shal thinke vpō couenaūt iacob vpon couenaunt isaac vpon couenaunt abraham wyl thynke vpon lōde londe▪ whan shalbe left shal reioyse hir sabbathes euen whan lyeth waist tylle shall make attonement myszdedes despysed lawes soules refused statute morouer haue refused shulde enemy londe nether haue vtterly abhorred wolde brynge naught breake couenaunt wt ye lorde god sake wyl remēbre 〈…〉 first couenaūt whā brought ye londe egipte sight heythen yt might god euen lorde ordinaunces statute lawes ye lorde made betwixte child israel vpon mount sinai hande moses xxvii chapter lorde talked moses sayde speake ye child israel saye vnto yf eny man make speciall vowe vnto ye lorde yt pryse soule shal valuacion mā twentye yeare olde vnto thre score yeare shalt thou set fiftie syluer sycles sycle sanctuary woman thirtie sycles yf fyue yeare olde vnto twentye yeare thou shalt set twentye sycles whan man childe 〈…〉 woman ten sycles yf moneth olde vnto fiue yeare thou shalt set fyue sycles syluer whan māchilde woman thre syluer sycles yf thre score yeare olde aboue thē shalt thou set fiftene sicles whā mā womā tē sicles yf poore set thē let present ye prest ye prest shal value neuertheles shal value acordinge ye hāde vowed able get yf beest yt maye offred vnto ye lorde yt offred vnto ye lorde soch holy shal altered ner chaunged good bad bad good yf eny man chaunge one beest another shal holy vnto ye lorde yf ye beest vn cleane maye offred vnto ye lorde thē shal set ye prest ye prest shal value whether good bad shal stonde prestes valuynge yf eny man wil bye shal geue fifth parte set whan eny mā sanctifieth house vnto lorde ye sanctuary prest shall value whether good bad prest valueth shal stonde yf yt sanctified wyl redeme shal geue ye fifth parte syluer therto aboue set shal yf eny man halowe pece lōde heretage vnto lorde shalbe set acordinge yt beareth yf beare homer barlye shalbe valued fiftye sycles syluer yf halowe londe immediatly yeare iubilye forth shal set acordinge ye value therof yf haue halowed yeare iubilye shal prest rekē acordinge ye yeares yt remayne vnto ye yeare iubilye therafter shal set lower yf yt sanctified londe wil redeme agayne shal geue fifth parte syluer therto aboue set shal yf wil lowse selleth vnto another shal redeme nomore londe whan goeth fre ye yeare iubilye shal holy vnto lorde dedicated felde shalbe prestes inheritaunce yf eny man halowe vnto lorde felde hath bought inheritaunce shal ye prest reken worth vnto yeare iubilye daye shall geue pryce set vnto lorde sanctuary ye yeare iubilye shal returne vnto bought yt maye inheritaunce londe maner prysinge shalbe made acordinge sycle sāctuary one sycle maketh xx geras 〈◊〉 30 b •• g 〈◊〉 45 b 〈◊〉 15 c first borne amonge ye catell belongeth vnto lorde shall man sanctifie vnto lorde whether oxe shepe lordes ready yf eny vn cleane thinge vpon beest thē shal lowsed therafter worth fifth parte shalbe geuen therro yf wil redeme thē let solde worth shall dedicated thinge solde ner bought yt eny man dedicateth vnto ye lorde yt good whether mē catell lōde euery dedicated thī ge holy vnto ye lorde shal dedicated thīge mā bought shal dye death tythes londe sede londe ye frutes tree lordes shal holy vnto lorde yf eny man wil redeme tithe shall geue fifth parte therto tithe ox shepe goeth vnder rod holy tythe vnto lorde shall axed whether good bad nether shall chaunged yf eny man chaunge chaunged withall shal holy redemed cōmaundementes ye lorde name captaynes shal stonde ruben elizur sonne sedeur simeon selumiel sonne zuri sadai iuda nahasson sonne aminadab isachar nathaneel sonne zuar zabulon eliab sonne helon amonge child ioseph ephraim elisama ye sonne amihud manasse gamaliel sonne pedazur ben iamin abidam ye sonne gedeoni dan ahieser sonne ammi sadai asser pagiel sonne ochram gad eliasaph ye sonne deguel nephthali ahira sonne enan
