one ouer ye house father exo 12 f num 11 summe child israel father house twentye yeare aboue euer able go forth warre israel sixe c thousande thre thousande fyue c fift • e leuites trybe father nombred amonge lorde spake vnto moses saide trybe leui shalt thou nombre ner take summe amonge ye child israel shalt appoynte habitacion wytnesse ye apparell therof belongeth therto 1 par 14 • shall beare tabernacle ordinaunce therof shal wayte vpon shal pitch tentes rounde aboute whan men shal go iourney leuites shal take downe ye tabernacle whan hoost pitch tē te shal set vp tabernacle yf straunger preasse nye vnto shall dye child israel shal pitch tentes euery one awne armye baner awne companye leuites shall pitch rounde aboute tabernacle wytnesse come wrath vpon ye congregacion child israel therfore shal leuites wayte vpon habitacion wytnesse child israel dyd lorde commaunded moses ii chapter ye lorde spake vnto moses aaron sayde childrē israel shal pitch rounde aboute ye tabernacle wytnesse euery one vnder banner token father house east syde shall iuda pitch banner hoost captayne nahasson sonne aminadab armie summe foure seuentie thousande sixe hundreth nexte vnto shal trybe isachar pitch captayne nathaneel sonne zuar armye summe foure fiftye thousande foure hundreth trybe zabulon also captayne eliab sonne helon armye summe seuen fiftie thousande foure hundreth yt belōge ye hoost iuda summe c sixe foure score thousande foure hundreth longinge armye shall go south side shall lye pauylions baner ruben wt hoost captaine elizur ye sonne sedeur armie summe sixe fourtie thousande fyue c nexte vnto shal trybe simeon pitch captayne selumiel ye sonne zuri sadai armie ye summe nyne fiftie thousande thre hundreth trybe gad also captayne eliasaph ye sonne deguel armye summe fyue fourtye thousande sixe hundreth fiftie belonge hoost ruben summe hundreth one fiftie thousande foure hūdreth fiftye belonginge armye shall seconde iourney shall tabernacle wytnesse go wt hoost leuites euē ye myddes amōge hoostes lye tentes shal go forth also euery one place vnder baner west syde shall lye ye pauylions baner ephraim wt hoost captayne shalbe elisama sonne amihud armye summe fourtye thousande fyue hundreth nexte vnto shal ye trybe manasse pitch captayne gamaliel sonne pedazur armye summe two thirtie thousande two hūdreth trybe ben iamin also captayne abidan sonne gedeoni armye summe fyue thirtie thousande foure hundreth yt belonge hoost ephraim summe hundreth thousande eight thousande hūdreth belonginge armie shal thirde iourney north syde shal lye ye pauylions baner dan hoost captayne ahieser ye sonne ammi sadai armye summe two sixtye thousande seuē hundreth nexte vnto shal trybe asser pitche captayne pagiel ye sonne ochran army summe one fourtie thousande fyue hundreth trybe nephthali also captayne ahira sonne enan armye summe thre fiftye thousande foure hūdreth yt belonge hoost dan summe hū dreth thousande seuen fiftie thousande sixe hundreth shalbe last iourney baners summe child israel father house armyes hoostes euen sixe hundreth thousande thre thousande fyue hūdreth fiftie ye leuites nombred ye summe amonge childrē israel 〈◊〉 • g ye lorde cōmaunded moses ye childrē israel dyd lorde cōmaunded moses pitched vnder baners toke iourney euery one kynred acordinge house father iii chapter generacions aaron moses whan ye lorde spake vnto moses ye tyme vpon mount sinai ye name sonnes aron 〈◊〉 10 〈◊〉 26 g firstborne nadab abihu eleasar ithamar ye name sonnes aaron • eui 8 anoynted prestes handes fylled ye presthode •• ui 10 nadab abihu dyed ye lorde whā offred straūge fyre ye lorde ye wildernesse sinai sonnes eleasar ithamar executed ye prestes office wt father aaron 〈◊〉 1 • b 〈◊〉 18 pa • 10 b lorde spake vnto moses sayde bringe hither trybe leui set aaron prest yt maye serue wt wayte vpon vpō whole congregacion ye tabernacle witnesse execute seruyce habitacion kepe apparell tabernacle wytnesse wayte vpon child israel mynistre seruyce habitacion thou shalt geue ye leuites vnto aaron sonnes gift vnto euery one awne amonge child israel aaron sonnes thou shalt appoynte wayte prestes office 〈◊〉 3 f 〈◊〉 16 num • f • b yf another preasse therto shal dye lorde spake vnto moses saide beholde haue takē leuites frō amonge childrē israel first borne open matrix amonge child israel▪ leuites shalbe myne exod 13 firstborne myne sence ye tyme smo • e first borne ye lande egipte whā sanctified vnto firstborne israel mē vnto catell shulde myne lorde lorde spake vnto moses wyldernesse sinai sayde nombre child leui father house kynreds male moneth olde aboue moses nombred acordinge worde lorde commaunded child leui name gerson kahath exod 6 merari name child gerson kynreds libni semei childrē kahath kynreds amram iezehar hebron vsiel child merari kynreds maheli musi kynreds leui father house ye kynreds gerson libnites seme • te summe founde nombre seuen thousande fyue hundreth male moneth olde aboue kynreds gersonites shal pitche behinde habitacion west syde let eliasaph sonne lael ruler shal waite vpon tabernacle wytnesse habitacion tent couerynges therof hangynge dore tabernacle wytnesse hangynge aboute courte hangynge ye courtedore courte goeth aboute habitacion altare cordes belongeth seruyce therof kynreds kahath amramites iezeharites hebronites vsielites male moneth olde aboue nombre eight thousande sixe hundreth waytinge vpon tabernacle sanctuary shal pitch south syde ye habitacion let elisaphan sonne vsiel ruler shal kepe arke table candil sticke altare vessel sanctuary seruyce vayle belongeth seruice therof chefe ruler leuites shalbe eleasar sonne aron prest ouer apoynted kepe watch sanctuary ye kynreds merari mahelites musites nombre sixe thousande two hūdreth male moneth olde aboue let zuriel ye sonne abihail ruler shall pitche vpon north syde habitacion office shalbe kepe bordes barres pilers sokettes habitacion apparell therof serueth therto ye pilers also aboute ye courte sokettes nales cordes habitacion ye tabernacle east syde shal moses aaron sonnes pytche maye wayte vpon sanctuary child israel num 3 b • nd 16 yf eny preasse therto shal dye leuites summe moses aaron nombred kynreds nu 26 g acordinge worde lorde male moneth olde aboue two twentye thousande ye lorde saide vnto moses nombre first borne male amonge child israel moneth olde aboue take nombre name num 3 b • nd 8 b ye leuites shalt thou take vnto lorde ye first borne ye childrē israel catell leuites first borne amonge catell ye child israel moses nombred first borne borne amonge childrē israel catell ye leuites catell yt leuites maye myne lordes leui 27 redempcion money two hundreth thre seuentye yt remayne first borne child israel aboue nombre leuites shalt thou take euen fyue sycles euery heade sycle sanctuary 〈◊〉 50 b 〈◊〉 26 〈◊〉 ▪ 45 b one sycle worth twentye geras money yt remayneth ouer nōbre shalt thou geue vnto aaron sonnes toke moses ye redempcion money remayned ouer aboue nombre leuites ye first borne childrē israel euen thousande thre hundreth fyue thre score sycles ye sycle sanctuary gaue vnto aaron sonnes acordinge worde lorde lorde commaunded moses iiii chapter lorde spake vnto moses aaron sayde take ye summe childrē kahath amonge childrē leui kynreds father house 〈…〉 thirtie yeare aboue vntill fiftye yeare mete warre maye worke tabernacle witnesse shal office child kahath tabernacle wytnesse holy whan hoost breaketh vp aaron sonnes shall go take downe vayle couer arke wytnesse therwith laye couerynge doo skynnes vpon sprede whole yalowe clothe aboue theron put staues therin vpon shewe table shal sprede yalowe clothe also set theron disshes spones flatpeces pottes poure daylie bred shal lye vpon shall sprede purple clothe ther ouer couer couerynge doo skynnes put staues therin shal take yalowe clothe couer cādilsticke light therwith lampes snoffers outquenchers oyle vessel belonge seruyce aboute shal put couerynge doo skynnes put vpon staues shal sprede yalowe clothe ouer golden altare also couer couerynge doo skynnes put vpon staues vessel occupye sanctuary shal take put yalowe clothe ther ouer couer couerynge doo skynnes put vpon staues shal swepe asshes also altare sprede clothe scarlet ouer set vessel theron occupye vpon colepames fleshokes shouels basens apparell altare shal sprede couerynge doo skynnes theron put staues therto whan aaron sonnes haue done haue couered sanctuary ornamētes therof whan hoost breaketh vp 〈…〉 shal child kahath go maye beare sanctuary shall touche 〈…〉 lest dye charge childrē kahath tabernacle wytnesse eleasar sonne aaron ye prest shal haue office prepare oyle light spyces incense daylie meat offerynge anoyntinge oyle order whole habitacion therin sanctuary ornamentes therof lorde spake vnto moses aaron sayde ye shal destroye trybe kynred kahathites amōge leuites shal ye yt maye lyue dye yf touche holy aaron sonnes shal go appoynte euery one vnto office charge shal go presumptuously loke vpō ye sanctuary lest die ye lorde spake vnto moses aaron sayde take summe child gerson also father house kynred 〈◊〉 8 thirtye yeare aboue vntyll fiftye yeare appoynte yt mete warre haue office tabernacle wytnesse shalbe office kynred gersonites euē serue beare shal beare curtaynes habitacion tabernacle wytnesse couerynge coueringe doo skynnes aboue theron hanginge dore tabernacle wytnesse hanginge aboute courte goeth aboute habitacion altare cordes instrumentes yt serue thē belongeth occupienge acordinge vnto worde aaron sonnes shal office child gerson done euer shall beare occupye ye shal se wayte vpon charge shal ye office ye kinred ye childrē ye gersonites ye tabernacle witnes waytinge shal vnder ye hā de ithamar sonne aarō prest child merari kynred father house shalt thou appoynte also thirtie yeare aboue vnto fiftie yeare mete warre yt maye haue office tabernacle wytnesse vpon charge shall wayte acordinge office ye tabernacle witnesse beare bordes habitacion barres pilers sokettes pilers courte also rounde aboute sokettes nales▪ cordes apparell▪ acordynge seruyce vnto euery one shall ye appoynte porcion charge waite vpon apparell le • office kynred child merari shall tabernacle wytnesse vnder hande ithamar sonne aaron prest moses aaron captaynes congregacion nombred child ye kahathites acordinge kynreds house father thirtie yeare aboue vntyll fyftye mete warre haue offyce tabernacle wytnesse summe two thousande seuen hundreth fyftie summe kynred kahathite • seruyce tabernacle witnesse moses aaron nombred acordynge worde lorde moses child gerson nombred also kynreds father house thirtie yeare aboue vntyll fyftie mete warre haue office ye tabernacle witnesse summe two thousande syxe hundreth thirtie ye summe kinred childrē gerson tabernacle wytnesse moses aaron nombred acordinge ye worde ye lorde child merari nombred also acordinge kynreds father house thirtie yeare aboue vntyll fyftye mete warre haue office tabernacle witnesse summe thre thousande two hundreth summe kynred childrē merari moses aaron nombred acordinge worde lorde moses summe leuites moses aaron captaynes israel tolde kinreds father house thyrtie yeare aboue vntyll fyftye wente euery one office beare burthen ye tabernacle wytnesse eight thousande fyue hundreth foure score nombred acordinge worde lorde moses euery one office charge▪ lorde commaunded moses v chapter ye lorde spake vnto moses sayde commaunde child israel yt put hoost leu 13 • ye leper haue yssues defyled vpon deed men womē shall putt hoost defyle tentes wherin dwell amonge ye child israel dyd put hoost ye lorde sayde vnto moses lorde talked moses sayde speake vnto child israel saye vnto whan man woman doth synne eny body offendeth ther agaynst lorde hath soule trespace vpon • eui 5 c shall knowlege synne haue done shall make amendes trespace euen whole summe put ye fifth parte therto geue vnto agaynst haue trespaced yf noman make amendes vnto offence yt hath trespaced agaynst shal reconcylynge made vnto lorde prest besydes ramme attonemēt wherwith shal reconcyled likewyse heue offerynges child israel halowe vnto lorde offre vnto prest shall haloweth enythinge shal geueth prest eny thinge shal also lorde talked moses sayde speake child israel saye vnto whan eny man wife goth asyde trespaceth agaynst eny mā lye fleshlye thinge yet hyd eye come light defiled brynge witnesse agaynst takē therin sprete gelousye kyndleth gelous ouer wife whether vncleane vncleane shal brynge vnto prest brynge offerynge euen tenth parte epha barlye meele shal poure oyle theron ner put frankensence vpon offerynge gelousy offeringe remembraunce remembreth synne shall prest beynge sett lorde take num 19 b holy water earthen vessell put ye dust floore habitacion water shal set wife ye lorde vncouer hir heade offeringe remembraunce offeringe gelousy shall laye vpon hir handes prest shal haue hande bytter cursinge water shal coniure wife saye vnto yf man haue lyē thou hast gone asyde thy huszbande defyle thy self shall bytter cursinge water hurte yf thou hast gone asyde thy huszbande thou art defyled man hath lyen besyde thy huszbande shall prest coniure wife curse shal saye vnto lorde sett curse coniuracion amonge thy people lorde make thy thye rotte thy wombe berst go cursed water thy body ye wombe berst thy thye rotte wife shal saye amen amen prest shall wryte curse byll wash water shall geue wife bytter cursinge water drynke whā cursinge water gone yt bytter vnto shal prest take gelousy offerynge wyues hande waue meat offerynge lorde offre vpon altare namely shall take handfull meat offerynge hir remēbraunce burne vpō altare geue wife water drinke whā hath dronken water yf defyled haue trespaced agaynst hir huszbande shal cursinge water go bytter hir wombe shal berst hir thye shall rotte wife shal curse amonge hir people yf wife defyled cleane shall harme maye childe lawe gelousy whan wyfe goeth asyde hir huszbande defyled whan ye sprete gelousy kyndleth man gelous ouer wyfe yt brynge lorde ye prest wt acordinge vnto lawe ye man shalbe giltlesse synne wife shall beare hir myszdede vi chapter lorde talked moses sayde speake vnto child israel saye vnto whan man woman separateth selues vowe vowe abstinence vnto lorde shal absteyne wyne strōge drynke 〈…〉 vyneger wyne stronge drynke shal drynke ner pressed grape shall nether eate fresh ner drye grape longe abstinence endureth morouer shall eate nothinge made vyne tre wyne cornel vnto hulle longe vowe abstynence endureth shall rasoure come vpon heade tyll tyme absteyneth vnto lorde holy shall let heer heade growe stonde bare openly tyme ouer yt absteyneth vnto lorde shal go deed nether shal defyle ye death father mother brother sister abstinence god vpon heade ye whole tyme abstinence shall holy vnto lorde yf chaunce eny man dye sodenly shal ye heade abstynence defyled therfore shal shaue heade daye clensynge vpon seuenth daye vpon ye eight daye shall brynge troo turtill doues two yonge pigeon vnto prest ye dore tabernacle wytnesse prest shall make one syn offerynge burnt offerynge make attonement defyled vpon ye deed shal halowe heade daye maye holde tyme abstinence vnto lorde shall brynge lambe yeare olde trespace offerynge ye day afore shal lost abstinence defyled lawe absteyner whan tyme abstinence shal brought dore tabernacle wytnesse shal brynge offeringe vnto lorde euen lambe yeare olde without blemysh burnt offeringe lambe yeare olde without blemysh syn offerynge ramme wt blemish health offerynge maū de wt vnleuended cake fyne floure myngled oyle swete wafer anoynted oyle meat offeringes drynkofferynges prest shall brynge lorde shal make syn offerynge burnt offerynge ye ramme shal make health offerynge vnto lorde ye maunde vnleuended bred meat offerynge drink offeringe shal make also shall shaue heade absteyners abstinence dore tabernacle wytnesse shall take heade heer abstinence cast vpon fyre vnder ye healthofferynge sodden shulder ramme shall take vnleuended cake maunde swete wafer laye vpon handes absteyner hath shauen abstinence shal waue lorde holy prest waue brest heueshulder maye absteyner drynke wyne lawe absteyner voweth offeringe vnto lorde abstynence besydes hande get hath vowed shall acordinge lawe abstinence lorde talked moses sayde speake vnto aaron sonnes saye thus shal ye saye vnto childrē israel whan ye blesse eccli 3 • b lorde blesse kepe lorde make face shyne vpō mercifull vnto lorde lift vp countenaunce vpon geue peace shal put name vpō childr •• israel maye blesse vii chapter whan moses set vp habitacion anoynted exo 40 b sanctifyed apparell therof anoynted halowed altare also vessel offred captaynes israel ruler father house captaynes amonge ye kynreds stode ouer thē nombred brought offerynges lorde sixe couered charettes twolue ox euery two captaynes charett oxe euery one brought habitacion lorde sayde vnto moses take maye serue mynistracion tabernacle wytnesse geue vnto leuites vnto euery one acordinge office toke moses charettes ox gaue vnto leuites two charettes foure ox gaue vnto ye child gerson acordinge office foure charettes eight ox gaue vnto child merari acordinge office vnder hande ithamar sonne aaron prest vnto child kahath gaue nothynge num 4 b 2 6 b holy office vpon must beare vpō shulders captaines offred dedicacion altare daye whan anoynted offred giftes altare ye lorde sayde vnto moses let euery captayne brynge offerynge vpon daye dedicacion altare first daye nahasson sonne aminadab trybe iuda offred g • fte gifte syluer charger worth hundreth thyrtie sycles syluer boule worth seuentye sycles sycle sanctuary full fyne • loure myngled oyle meat offeringe golden spone worth ten sycles golde boule twolue spones golde euery charger conteynynge hūdreth thirtie sycles syluer euery boule seuentye sycles ye summe syluer vessel two thousande foure hundreth sycles sycle sanctuary twolue spones golde full incense conteyned euery one ten sycles sycle sanctuary summe golde spones hundreth twentye sycles summe catell burntofferinges twolue bullockes twolue rammes twolue lābes yeare olde meat offeringes twolue goates synn offeringes summe catell health offeringes foure twē tye ox thre score rammes thre score goates thre score lābes yeare olde dedicacion altare anoynted whan moses wente tabernacle wytnes exo •• c yt might commoned withall herde voyce speakynge vnto frō mercy seate vpō arke witnes betwixte two cherubins thence cōmoned withall viii chapter lorde talked moses sayde speake aaron saye vnto exo▪ 25 whan thou settest vp ye lāpes thou shalt set thē maye seuē geue light aboue vpō ye candilsticke aaron dyd set ye lampes vpō ye candilsticke ye lorde cōmaunded moses worke ye cādilsticke beatē golde ye shaft floures therof acordynge ye visiō lorde shewed moses euen made candelsticke lorde spake vnto moses sayde take leuites frō amonge child israel clense thus shalt thou thou mayest clense thou shalt sprenkle purifienge water vpon lett rasure go ouer whole body washe clothes cleane shall take yonge bullocke meat offerynge fyne floure myngled oyle another yonge bullocke shalt thou take synofferinge thou shalt brynge leuites tabernacle wytnesse gather together whole congregacion ye child israel brynge leuytes lorde child israel shall laye handes vpon leuites aaron shal waue ye leuites lorde child israel maye mynistre seruyce lorde leuites shall laye handes vpon heedes bullockes one shalbe made synn offerynge burnt offeringe vnto lorde make attonement leuites thou shalt set leuites aaron sonnes waue lorde shalt thou separate ye child israel maye myne thē shall go maye seruyce tabernacle witnesse thus shalt thou clense thē waue gifte child israel num 3 b haue taken vnto openeth matrix namely first borne child israel euery first borne amonge child israel myne exo 13 luc 2 men catell sen tyme smote first borne lande egipte sanctified vnto toke leuites first borne amonge childrē israel gaue gifte vnto aarō sonnes amonge child israel yt shulde seruyce child israel tabernacle witnesse make attonemēt child israel plage amonge child israel yf wyll come nye ye sanctuary moses aaron whole congregaciō childrē israel dyd wt leuites lorde commaū ded moses purified leuites waszshed clothes aaron waued lorde made attoment might cleane wente office tabernacle witnesse aaron sonnes lorde commaū ded moses concernynge leuites euen dyd lorde spake vnto moses sayde belongeth vnto leuites 〈…〉 fyue twentye yeare aboue shal go office tabernacle witnesse frō fyftie yeare forth shal ceasse waitinge seruyce therof shall mynister nomore shal appoynte brother waite serue tabernacle wytnesse office shal execute thus shalt thou leuites seruyces euery one maye wayte vpon awne charge ix chapter annd lorde spake vnto moses wildernesse sinai ye first moneth seconde yeare departed lande egipte▪ sayde 〈…〉 let child israel kepe easter season euen vpon fourtene daye moneth euen season shall kepe acordynge statute lawes therof moses spake ye childrē israel yt shulde kepe easter kep easter vpō fourtene daye first moneth euen wildernes sinai acordinge lorde cōmaunded moses euen dyd child israel certayne men defyled deed man coulde kepe easter vpon daye came moses aaron daye sayde vnto defiled deed mā wherfore shulde despysed must bringe oure giftes season amonge child israel moses sayde vnto stonde styll wil heare lorde commaundeth lorde spake vnto moses sayde speake vnto child israel saie whā eny man defyled deed coarse gone farre ouer felde 〈…〉 amonge youre kynszfolkes yet shall kepe easter seconde moneth vpō ye fourtene daye euen shal eate vnleuended bred sowre sawse shall leaue none vntyll mornynge 〈…〉 ner breake eny bone therof shal kepe acordinge ye maner ye easter cleane gone iourney negligent kepe easter soule shal roted amōge people brought gifte lorde season shal beare synne whan dwelleth straunger amonge shal kepe easter also vnto lorde shal holde acordinge ye ordinaunce lawe ye easter statute shal vnto alike straunger borne londe ye daye yt habitacion set vp •• c • • 8 b • 9 cloude couered vpō tabernacle witnesse euen symilitude fyre vpon habitacion vntill mornynge came passe allwaye yt cloude couered daye symilitude fyre night whan cloude takē vp habitacion child israel wente iourney loke place cloude abode childrē israel pitched tentes acordinge worde lorde toke child israel iourney acordinge worde pitched tentes longe cloude abode vpon habitacion laye styll whan cloude taried many dayes vpon habitacion childrē israel wayted vpon lorde wente iourney whan chaunced cloude abode vpō ye habitacion eny space dayes pitched acordinge worde lorde worde lorde wente iourney whan cloude euenynge vntyll mornynge taken vp wē te iourney whether takē vp daye night iourneyed whan taried vpon habitacion two dayes moneth longe season laye child israel iourneyed whan taken vp wente iourney acordinge mouth lorde laye mouth lorde iourneyed yt kepte lordes watch acordinge worde lorde moses x chapter lorde spake vnto moses sayde make two trompettes beaten syluer thou mayest vse call cōgregacion together whan hoost shal breake vp whan blowe shall whole congregacion gather selues together vnto dore tabernacle witnesse whan blowe one captaynes ruler ouer thousandes israel shal gather selues together vnto whan ye trompe shal hoostes lye east syde breake vp whan ye trompe seconde tyme hoostes lye south syde shal breake vp ye shall trompe whan shal take iourneys iudic • whan ye congregacion gathered together ye shal blowe trompe blowinge wt trompettes shal sonnes aaron prest shall yor lawe euer amonge youre posterity whan ye go battayll youre londe agaynst youre enemy yt vexe ye shall trompe trompettes ye maye remembred lorde yor god delyuered youre enemy like wyse whan ye mery youre feast dayes youre new monethes ye shal blowe trompettes ouer youre burntsacrifices health offeringes yt maie remembraunce vnto youre god lorde youre god vpon twentye daye seconde moneth seconde yeare arose cloude habitacion witnesse childrē israel wente iourney wyldernesse sinai num 33 c deut 1 cloude abode wyldernesse paran first brake vp acordinge worde lorde moses namely baner hoost iuda wente forth first army num 1▪ ouer hoost nahasson sonne aminadab ouer hoost trybe child isachar nathaneel sonne zuar ouer hoost trybe child zabulon eliab sonne elon habitacion taken downe num 4 child gerson merari bare habitacion wente baner hoost ruben army ouer hoost elizur sonne sedeur ouer hoost trybe child simeon selumiel sonne zuri sadai eliasaph sonne deguel ouer hoost trybe child gad wente kahathites forwarde also bare sanctuary caused ye habitacion set vp agaynst came wente baner hoost child ephraim army ouer hoost elisama sonne amihud gamaliel sonne pedazur ouer hoost trybe child manasse abidan sonne gedeoni ouer hoost trybe child ben iamin wente baner hoost child dan armyes hoostes vp ahieser sonne ammi sadai ouer hoost pagiel ye sonne ochran ouer hoost trybe child asser ahira sonne enan ouer hoost trybe child nephthali thus childrē israel wēte forth armyes moses spake vnto brother lawe hobab sonne raguel madian go vnto place ye lorde sayde wil geue come v therfore wil ye best lorde hath promysed good vnto israel answered wil go wt wil go myne awne londe vnto kynred sayde oh nay leaue v thou knowest best v pytche wyldernesse thou shalt oure eye yf thou goest v loke good lorde doth vnto v wil vnto departed mount lorde thre dayes iourney arke lordes couenaunt wente thre dayes iourney shewe thē shulde rest ye cloude lorde ouer daye tyme whan wēte ye tētes whan arke wente forth moses sayde psal 67 aryse lorde let thine enemy scatered let hate flye whan rested sayde come agayne lorde vnto multitude thousandes israel xi chapter whan ye people waxed vnpaciēt displeased sore ye eares ye lorde exo 16 deut 9 whan lorde herde wrath waxed whote fyre ye lorde burnt amōge yt cōsumed vttemost ye hoost thē cryed people vnto moses moses prayed vnto lorde ye fyre quenched place called tabera fyre lorde burnt amonge comon sorte people yt amōge fell lustinge sat wepte wt child israel sayde wyll geue v flesh eate remembre fish ate egipte naught cucumber melouns lekes onyons garleke oure soule dryed awaye oure eye se nothinge manna manna like coriāder sede loke vpon like bedellion 〈…〉 people ranne gathered grounde milles beate morters baked pānes made cake taist like oyle cake whan ye dew fell vpon tētes night ye manna fell therwith whan moses herde people wepe amōge kynreds euery one tēt dore wrath lorde waxed exceadinge whote greued moses also moses sayde vnto lorde vexest thou thy seruaunte fynde fauoure ye sight yt thou layest ye burthen people vpō haue thē cōceaued people begotten thou shuldest saye vnto cary thine armes nurse beareth childe vnto londe thou hast sworne vnto father shal get flesh geue people wepe saye geue v flesh maye e • te able beare people alone heuy yf thou wylt deale thus wt kyll yf haue founde fauoure thy sight se wrechednesse lorde saide vnto moses gather vnto 〈…〉 seuentye men amonge elder israel thou knowest yt elder ye people officer ouer brynge tabernacle witnesse set wil come downe talke euen take thy sprete vpon putt vpon maye beare burthen people yt thou beare alone vnto ye people thou shalt saye sāctifye yor selues agaynst tomorow 〈…〉 yt ye maye eate flesh youre wepynge come eares lorde ye saye shal geue v flesh eate well ease egipte 〈…〉 therfore shal lorde geue flesh eate one daye two fyue ten twentye dayes longe moneth longe tyll go youre nose tyll ye lothe euen ye haue refused lorde amonge haue wepte 〈…〉 sayde wherfore wente egipte moses sayde sixe hundreth thousande fote men people amō ge 〈…〉 thou sayest wyll geue flesh eate moneth lōge shal shepe ox slayne ynough shal fish see gathered together sufficient lorde sayde vnto moses 〈…〉 lordes hande shortened shalt thou se whether wordes shall fulfilled dede moses wēte tolde people ye worde lorde gathered seuentye men amonge eldest people set rounde aboute tabernacle came lorde downe cloude spake vnto toke sprete yt vpon put vpon seuentie elder whan sprete rested vpon prophecied ceassed hoost remayned yet two men one called eldad ye medad sprete rested vpō wrytten vp also yet gone vnto tabernacle prophecied hoost ran lad tolde moses sayde eldad medad prophecie hoost answered iosua ye sonne nun moses seruaunte chosen sayde lorde moses bydde moses sayde vnto art thou gelous sake 〈◊〉 2 f 〈◊〉 14 wolde god yt people ye lorde coulde prophecie ye lorde wolde geue sprete moses elder israel gat hoost wente wynde ye lorde 〈◊〉 16 c caused quayles come see scatred thē ouer hoost dayes iourney dayes iourney rounde aboute ye hoost two cubytes hye aboue ye earth people stode vp daye yt night nexte daye gathered quayles gathered leest gathered ten homer kylled rounde aboute hoost 〈◊〉 77 c whyle ye flesh yet betwene tethe euer vp wrath lorde waxed whote amonge people 〈…〉 slewe exceadinge greate slaughter therfore place called graues lust voluptuous people buried lustgraues toke people iourney vnto hazeroth abode hazeroth num •• • xii chapter miriam aaron spake agaynst moses wife morian exo 2 • taken deu 24 b takē morian wife sayde doth lorde speake onely thorow moses speaketh also v lorde herde eccli 45 moses meke man aboue men vpon earth haistely spake lorde vnto moses aaron miriam go ye thre vnto ye tabernacle wytnesse wente thre came lorde downe cloudy piler psal 98 b stode dore tabernacle called aaron miriam wēte sayde heare wordes yf eny man prophet lorde vnto wil shewe self vision wil speake vnto dreame wt seruaunt moses heb 3 faithfull house exo 33 • mouth mouth speake vnto seyth lorde fashion thorow darke wordes licknesses wherfore ye afrayed speake agaynst seruaunt moses ye wrath lorde waxed whote ouer turned awaye ye cloude also departed tabernacle beholde2 pa • 6 miriam become leporus snowe aaron turned vnto miriam sawe leporous sayde vnto moses oh lorde put synne vpon v haue foolishly committed synned one commeth deed mother wombe hath eaten vp half hir flesh allready moses cried vnto lorde sayde oh god heale lorde sayde vnto moses yf hir father spytte hir face shulde ashamed seuen dayes leu 1 • 1 • let shut ye hoost seuē dayes yt let receaued agayne miriam shut hoost seuē dayes people wente farther tyll miriam receaued againe afterwarde departed people hazeroth num 3 • c pitched ye wildernesse paran xiii chapter lorde spake vnto moses sayde deut 1 sende forth men spye ye 〈1 page duplicate〉 〈1 page duplicate〉 lande canaan wil geue vnto ye child israel euery trybe father man let soch captaynes amonge moses sent thē wildernes paran acordinge worde lorde soch heades amonge child israel name samma sonne zacur trybe ruben saphat sonne hori trybe simeon caleb ye sonne iephune trybe iuda igeal sonne ioseph trybe isachar hosea sonne nun ye trybe ephraim palti sonne raphu trybe ben iamin gadiel sonne sodi ye trybe zabulon gaddi sonne susi trybe ioseph manasse ammiel sonne gemalli trybe dan sethur ye sonne michael trybe asser nahebi sonne vaphsi trybe nephtali guel sonne machi trybe gad name men moses sent forth spye lande hosea sonne nun moses called iosua whan moses sent thē forth spye lande canaan sayde vnto thē go vp southwarde get vp mountaynes loke vpon londe people dwell therin whether stronge weake fewe many maner lande dwell whether good bad maner city dwell whether fenced walles maner lande whether fatt leane whether tree therin good corage bringe frutes londe euen aboute tyme grape first rype wente vp spyed lande ye wildernes zin vntyll rehob mē go vnto hemath wente vp also towarde south came vnto hebron ahiman sesai thalmai child enack hebron buylded seuen yeare zoan egipte came ryuer escol cut downe cluster grape deut 1 • caused two beare vpon staffe pomgranates also fygges place called ryuer escol cluster grape child israel cut downe whan spyed lande turned bake againe fourtye day wente came moses aaron whole congregacion ye child israel ye wyldernesse paran euē vnto cades brought worde agayne whole congregacion stode let se frute lande tolde sayde came ye lande whither ye sent v floweth mylke hony frute therof sauynge stronge people dwell therin city exceadinge stronge greate sawe child enack also amalechites dwell south countre hethites iebusites amorites dwell vpon mountaynes cananites dwell see aboute iordane howbeit caleb stylled ye people agaynst moses sayde vnto let v go vp conquere lande able ouercome men wente vp sayde 〈…〉 able go vp agaynst people stronge v lande searched brought vp euell reporte amonge childrē israel saide lāde haue gone thorow spye eateth vp indweller therof people sawe therin men greate stature sawe giauntes also yee giauntes child enack semed oure sighte ye greshoppers dyd sighte xiiii chapter whole cōgregacion toke cryed de •• ▪ 〈…〉 psal 〈…〉 people wepte yt night childrē israel murmured agaynst moses aaron whole congregacion sayde vnto oh dyed lande egipte might dye yet wyldernesse wherfore bryngeth lorde v lande oure wyues shulde fall thorow swerde ouer child praye better go agayne egipte sayde one another let v make captayne go egipte agayne moses aaron fell vpō face ye whole cōgregacion multitude childrē israel 〈◊〉 46 b •• ch 2 f iosua ye sonne nun caleb ye sonne iephune also spyed lande rente clothes spake whole cōgregacion child israel londe yt haue walked thorow spye good lande yf lorde haue lust vnto v shal brynge v londe geue v lāde floweth mylke hony anye wyse rebell ye agaynst lorde • eut 10 feare ye people lande wil eate thē vp bred defence departed frō • om • lorde wt v ye afrayed people bad stone wt stone appeared glory lorde tabernacle witnesse vnto child israel lorde sayde vnmoses longe shal people blaspheme longe wil beleue tokēs haue shewed amonge wil smyte pestilence destroye thē • xo 32 c wil make greater mightier people • eu 9 moses sayde vnto ye lorde shal ye egipcians heare wt thy power hast thou brought people amōge thē shal tolde inhabiters lande also haue herde yt thou lorde art amonge people yt thou art sene face face thy cloude stondeth ouer • xo 13 thou goest cloudy piler daye tyme fyrie piler night season yf thou shuldest slaye people one man heythen haue herde good reporte • xo 32 c shulde saye lorde able brynge people londe sware vnto therfore hath slayne wyldernes let power lorde greate acordinge thou hast spoken sayde lorde longe sufferaunce greate mercy forgeueth synne trespace leaueth man innocent vysiteth myszdede father vpon child thirde fourth generacion gracious vnto synne people acordinge thy greate mercy like thou hast forborne people also euer egipte vnto place lorde sayde haue forgeuē thou hast saide truly lyue ye worlde shal full glory nu 26 • deut 1 • 2 c ye men haue sene glory token dyd egipte wildernesse tempted ten tymes haue herkened vnto voyce shall one se londe sware vnto father nether shal eny haue blasphemed se iosu 14▪ seruaūt caleb another maner sprete hath folowed wil brynge lande hath gone thorow sede shal conquere ye amalechites also cananites dwell lowe countrees tomorow turne get wyldernesse waye towarde reed see ye lorde spake vnto moses aaron sayde lōge shal euell multitude murmur agaynst haue herde murmuringe childrē israel yt haue murmured agaynst tell therfore nu 32 b trulye lyue sayeth ye lorde wil vnto euen ye haue spoken myne eares youre carcase shal lye wildernesse ye num 1 nombred twentye yeare aboue haue murmured agaynst shall come lande cōcernynge lift vp hāde yt wolde let dwell therin saue caleb ye sonne iephune iosua sonne nun youre child ye sayde deut 1 f shalbe spoyle wyll brynge yt shal knowe lande ye haue refused ye youre carcase shall lye wildernesse yor child shal wander wildernesse fourtye yeares beare yor whordome tyll yor carcase waisted wildernesse acordinge nombre ye fourtye dayes wherin ye spyed londe exe 4 daye yeare yt fourtye yeares ye shall beare youre myszdede ye maye knowe whan drawe hande euen lorde haue sayde wil dede vnto euell congregacion haue lift vp themselues agaynst wildernesse shal consumed shal dye dyed plaged lorde mē1 cor 10 • moses sent spye lāde came agayne made whole cōgregacion murmur agaynst brought vp myszreporte lande euell iosua sonne nun caleb ye sonne iephune left alyue men wente spye lande moses spake wordes vnto child israel thē toke people greate sorowe arose early ye mornynge wente vp toppe ye mountayne sayde •• ut 1 • lo go vp place wherof lorde hath sayde haue synned moses sayde wherfore go ye maner beyonde ye worde lorde shall prospere go vp ye lorde amōge yt ye slayne yor enemy amalechites cananites ye shal fall thorow ye swerde ye haue turned yor selues lorde lorde shal blynded go vp toppe mountaine neuertheles arke lordes couenaunt moses came hooste came downe ye amalechites cananites dwelt vpon mountayne smote hewed euen vnto horma xv chapter lorde talked moses sayde speake childrē israel saye vnto whan ye come lande youre dwellinge shal geue wil sacrifice vnto lorde whether burnt offerynge offrynge speciall vowe frewyll offerynge youre feast offerynges ye maye make swete sauoure vnto lorde ox shepe • euit 2 〈◊〉 • b yt wil offre gifte vnto ye lorde shal brynge meat offeringe tēth deale fyne floure myngled oyle fourth parte hin wyne ye drynk offerynge fourth parte hin also burnt offeringe eny offeringe whan lambe offred whā ramme offred thou shalt make meat offerynge two tēth deales fyne floure myngled oyle thirde parte hin ye thirde parte hin wyne also drynk offeringe shalt thou offre swete sauor vnto lorde yf thou wilt offre oxe burnt offerynge speciall vowe offerynge health offeringe vnto lorde thou shalt brynge oxe meat offrynge euen thre tenth deales fyne floure mingled half hin oyle half hin wyne drynk offrynge offerynge swete sauoure vnto lorde thus shalt thou oxe ramme lambe goate acordinge nombre offerynges therafter shall nombre meat offerynges drynk offerynges also one youre selues shall maye offre sacrifice swete sauoure vnto lorde yf dwell straunger amōge youre kynszfolkes wil offerynge vnto lorde swete sauoure shal ye let one statute whole cōgregacion vnto straungers perpetuall statute shal vnto youre posterity straunger euē ye ye lorde one lawe one ordinaunce shalbe vnto straunger dwelleth lorde talked moses sayde speake child israel saye vnto whan ye come lande yt shal brynge 〈…〉 ye eate bred londe ye shal heue vp heue offerynge vnto lorde namely cake firstlinges youre dowe shall ye geue heue offerynge 〈…〉 heue offerynge barne euen shal ye geue firstlinges youre dowe also vnto lorde heue offerynge amonge youre posterity whan ye thorow ignoraunce ouer se eny commaundementes 〈…〉 lorde hath spoken moses yt lorde hath commaunded moses daye lorde beganne commaunde youre posterity cōgregacion ought ignorauntly thē shal whole congregacion offre yonge bullocke amonge greate catell burnt offerynge swete sauoure vnto lorde meat offerynge drynk offerynge maner goate syn offerynge shal prest make attonement whole congregacion child israel shalbe forgeuen ignoraunce shal brynge giftes offerynge vnto lorde syn offerynge lorde ignoraunce shalbe forgeuen whole congregacion childrē israel straunger also yt dwelleth amonge moch people soch ignoraunce yf one soule synne thorow ignoraunce 〈…〉 shal brynge goate yeare olde syn offerynge prest shall make attonement soch ignoraunt soule syn offeringe ignoraunce lorde maye reconcyle shal forgeuen shal one lawe ye shal ye ignoraunce vnto borne amonge child israel straunger dwelleth amonge 〈…〉 yf soule ought presumptuously whether one youre selues straunger hath despysed lorde ye soule shalbe roted amōge people hath despysed worde lorde hath left commaundement vndone soule shall vtterly perishe synne shalbe vpon whyle child israel wyldernesse founde man gatherynge stickes vpon sabbath daye founde gatherynge stickes brought vnto moses aaron whole congregacion 〈◊〉 • 4 c put preson declared shulde done vnto lorde sayde vnto moses man shall dye death whole congregacion shal stone without hoost whole cōgregacion brought ye hoost stoned dyed ye lorde commaunded moses ye lorde sayde vnto moses speake childrē israel 〈◊〉 22 b saye vnto thē yt make gardes vpon ye quarter garmentes amonge yor posterity put yalowe rybandes vpon gardes ye quarter ye gardes shal serue yt ye maye loke vpon thē remembre cōmaundementes lorde ye order youre selues ye meanynge youre awne hert ner go awhorynge youre awne eye therfore shal ye remembre commaundementes holy vnto youre god lorde youre god brought lande egipte yor god euen lorde youre god xvi chapter corah sonne iezehar sonne kahath sonne leui eccli 4 • • dathan abiram sonne eliab sonne peleth ye sonnes rubē stode vp agaynst moses certayne men amonge childrē israel two hundreth fyftie captaynes congregacion councelers famous men gathered selues agaynst moses aarō sayde vnto ye make moch doo exo 19 • congregacion holy euery one lorde amonge lifte ye youre selues vp aboue congregacion lorde whan moses herde yt fell vpō face saide vnto corah company tomorow shal ye lorde shewe holy come vnto whō euer choseth ye shal come vnto take ye censor thou corah ye cōpanye fyre therin put incense theron tomorow lorde euer lorde choseth shal holy ye make moch doo ye child leui moses sayde vnto corah heare ye childrē leui ynough vnto num • • yt ye god israel hath separated frō ye multitude israel yt ye shulde come nye seruyce dwellynge place lorde stonde people mynister vnto hath caused thy brother childrē leui come nye vnto ye seke presthode also thou thy cō pany conspyre agaynst lorde aaron ye shulde murmur moses sent call dathā abirā ye sonnes eliab saide wil come vp litle yt thou hast brought v ye lande egipte yt floweth wt mylke hony kyll v ye wildernesse thou must raigne ouer v also goodly well hast thou brought v londe floweth wt milke hony geuē v feldes vyniardes possession wilt thou put men eye come vp moses wroth saide vnto ye lorde turne ye vnto meatofferinges haue takē moch asse frō thē nether haue hurte eny thē moses sayde vnto corah tomorow thou ye companye ye lorde thou aaron take euery one censer put incense therin come lorde euery one censer two hundreth fiftye censer thou aaron take either censer euery one toke censer put fyre therin layed incense theron came dore tabernacle witnes moses aaron also corah gathered ye whole congregaciō agaynst thē dore tabernacle witnes ye glory lorde appeared ye whole congregacion ye lorde spake vnto moses aaron sayde separate youre selues frō congregaciō yt maye shortly consume fell vpon face sayde god thou god spretes flesh yf one man haue synned wilt thou therfore wroth ouer whole congregacion lorde spake vnto moses saide speake congregaciō saye come vp ye dwellynge corah dathan abiram moses stode vp wente vnto dathan abiram elder israel folowed spake ye cōgregaciō saide departe frō ye tentes vngodly mē touche nothinge yt yt ye perishe eny sinnes gat vp dwellynge corah dathan abiram dathan abirā came stode dore tentes wyues sonnes child moses sayde hereby shal ye knowe lorde hath sent workes haue done myne awne hert yf men dye comon death men vysited men vysited hath lorde sent yf lorde make new thinge earth open hir mouth swalowe haue yt go downe quycke hell thē shal ye knowe se men haue blasphemed lorde whā spokē wordes deu 11 nu 26 b psal 10 • b ye groūde cloue asunder vnder thē earth opened hir wouth swalowed thē wt house mē yt wt corah substaūce wente downe quycke hell earth closed vpō perished amonge ye congregaciō israel yt aboute thē fled ye crye thē sayde ye earth swalowe v also morouer fyre came frō lorde consumed two hundreth fyftye men offred incense lorde spake vnto moses sayde speake eleasar ye sonne aaron ye prest yt take vp ye censer ye burninge scater ye fyre censer synners halowed thorow soules yt maye beatē thinne plate fastened vpon ye altare offred ye lorde halowed shalbe token vnto ye childrē israel eleasar prest toke ye brasen censer yt burnt offred bet thē plate fasten thē vpon ye altare remēbraunce vnto ye child israel yt straunger ye sede aaron come nye offre incense lorde yt happē vnto vnto corah companye acordynge lorde sayde vnto moses nexte morow murmured ye whole congregacion ye childrē israel moses aarō saide ye haue slayne ye people ye lorde whan cōgregaciō gathered agaynst moses aarō turned thē towarde ye tabernacle witnes beholde thē ye cloude couered ye tabernacle ye glory ye lorde appeared moses aarō wēte ye tabernacle witnes ye lorde spake vnto moses sayde get cōgregacion wil shortly consume thē fell vpon face moses sayde vnto aaron take cēser put fyre therin frō altare laye incēse theron go soone cō gregacion make attonement wrath gone lorde plage begōne amonge people aaron dyd moses sayde ranne myddest amonge ye congregaciō beholde ye plage begōne burnt incēse made attonemēt people 〈…〉 stode betwene deed lyuynge plage ceassed fourtene thousande seuē hundreth deed plage besydes dyed aboute busynesse corah aaron came agayne vnto moses dore tabernacle witnesse plage ceassed xvii chapter ye lorde spake vnto moses sayde speake child israel take thē twolue staues euery captayne father house one wryte euery man name vpon staffe aaron name shalt thou wryte vpon staffe leui euery heade father house shal haue staffe laye thē tabernacle witnesse witnesse testifie vnto loke shall chose staffe shal florishe yt maye stylle grudginges child israel grudge agaynst moses spake vnto childrē israel captaynes gaue twolue staues euery captayne staffe ye house father aaron staffe amonge staues also moses layed staues lorde tabernacle witnesse morow whā moses wēte ye tabernacle witnesse foūde yt 〈◊〉 45 c 〈◊〉 aarōs rodde house leui florished brought forth blossom bare allmondes moses brought forth ye staues frō ye lorde ye childrē israel might se toke euery mā staffe lorde sayde vnto moses bringe aarōs staffe againe wytnesse yt maye kepte tokē child rebellion murmuringes maye ceasse frome lest dye moses dyd ye lorde cōmaunded ye childrē israel sayde vnto moses beholde cōsume awaie destroied perishe cōmeth nye ye dwellynge place ye lorde dyeth shal thē vtterly cōsume awaie xviii chap lorde sayde vnto aaron thou thy sonnes thy father house wt shal beare myszdede ye sāctuary thou thy sonnes wt shall beare myszdede yor presthode 〈…〉 thy brother trybe leui ye father shal come nye ioyned vnto maye mynistre vnto ye thou thy sonnes wt shal mynistre ye tabernacle witnesse shal wayte vpō ye seruyce vpon ye seruyce whole tabernacle nye vnto vessel ye sāctuary altare shall come yt ye dye howbeit shal ioyned vnto wayte vpō mynistracion tabernacle witnesse seruice tabernacle shal straunger come nye vnto therfore wayte vpon seruyce sanctuary vpon seruyce altare come wrath vpon child israel lo haue takē yor brethrē leuites frō amonge child israel youre gifte presente vnto ye lorde ye seruyce ye tabernacle witnes ye yi sonnes ye shal waite vpon youre prestes office ye maye ministre maner busynes altare within vayle yor prestes office geue vnto gifte seruyce yf straunger come nye shall dye lorde sayde vnto aaron beholde haue geuen heue offerynges child israel halowe haue geuen vnto thy sonnes perpetuall dewtye shalt thou haue holy thinges offer giftes meat offeringes syn offerynges wt trespace offerynges geue shal holy vnto ye sonnes holy place shalt thou eate male shall eate therof shal holy vnto heue offerynge giftes waue offerynges child israel haue geuen vnto also leu 7 thy sonnes thy doughters perpetuall dewtye cleane thy house shal eate therof fat oyle • ye fat wyne corne firstlinges geue vnto lorde haue geuen vnto ye first frutes londe bringe vnto lorde shal thine euer cleane thine house shal eate therof dedicate thinges israel shal thine breaketh matrix amonge flesh brynge vnto lorde whether man beest shalbe thine thou cause firstborne mā redemed thou cause first borne vncleane beestes redemed also shal redeme whan moneth olde shall geue lowse money euen fyue sycles sycle sanctuary exo • 0 b leu 27 eze 45 • sycle worth twentye geras first frutes oxe lambe goate shalt thou cause redemed holy bloude shalt thou sprenkle vpon altare fat shalt thou burne offerynge swete sauoure vnto ye lorde flesh shalbe thine like ye wauebrest ye right shulder thine also heue offeringes ye childrē israel halowe vnto ye lorde haue geuen vnto thy sonnes thy doughters perpetuall dewtie shalbe salted couenaūt euer ye lorde vnto thy sede lorde sayde vnto aarō thou shalt inheret nothinge londe deut 18 • ze 44 ner haue eny porciō amonge ye porcion thine enheritaunce amōge child israel vnto child leui haue geuen tithe israel inheritaunce ye seruyce vnto tabernacle witnesse hē ce forth child israel come nye tabernacle witnes lade selues synne dye leuites shal seruyce tabernacle witnes shal beare synne perpetuall lawe amonge youre posterity io 13 b shall inheret none inheritaunce amonge child israel ye tithe childrē israel heue vnto ye lorde haue geuen vnto leuites heretage therfore haue sayde vnto shall inheret inheritaunce amonge child israel ye lorde talked wt moses saide speake leuites saye vnto whā ye take ye childrē israel ye tithe yt haue geuen thē yor inheritaū ce ye shal take heue offeringe vnto lorde euen tenth tithe yor heue offerynge shall ye reken though ye gaue corne barne fullnesse wynepresse thus shal ye geue heue offerynge vnto lorde yor tithe ye take child israel yt ye maie geue heue offerynge ye lorde vnto aarō ye prest yt ye geue ye tythes halowe vnto ye lorde gifte ye shall best saye thou vnto whan ye thus heue vp ye fat therof shal rekened vnto leuites increace barne increace wine presse ye maye eate place ye yor child youre rewarde youre seruyce tabernacle witnesse ye shal lade synne vpon whan ye heue fat therof vnhalowe halowed thinges child israel ye shal dye xix chapter lorde spake vnto moses aarō sayde custome shall lawe lorde hath cōmaunded sayde speake vnto ye child israel yt brynge vnto ye reed cow spot wherin blemysh vpon whō came neuer yock ye shal geue vnto eleasar prest 〈…〉 shall brynge without hooste cause slayne eleasar ye prest shal take hir bloude fynger sprenckle seuentymet straight towarde dore tabernacle witnesse 〈…〉 cause cow burnt hir szkynne hir flesh hir bloude also hir donge prest shal take ceder wodd ysope purple woll cast vpō cow burneth shal washe clothes bathe body water thē go hoost vncleane vntyll ye euē burnt shal wash clothes also water bathe body water vncleane vntyll ye euen one yt cleane shal gather vp 〈…〉 aszshes ye cow poure without hoost cleane place maye kepte sprenklinge water congregacion childrē israel syn offeringe gathered vp aszshes cow shall wash clothes vncleane vntyll euen shalbe perpetuall lawe vnto ye child israel straungers dwell amonge toucheth deed mā 〈…〉 shal vncleane seuen dayes shall purifie thirde daye seuenth daie shall cleane yf puryfye thirde daye seuenth daye thē shall cleane whā eny mā toucheth deed personne wil purifie defyleth dwellynge lorde soule shal roted israel sprenklinge water sprenkled vpon vncleane longe letteth pourged therof lawe whan mā dyeth ye tente euer goeth tente yt tente shal vncleane seuē day euery open vessel hath lydd couerynge vncleane euer toucheth one yt slayne wt swerde vpon ye felde eny deed deed man bone graue ye vncleane seuē dayes vncleane personne shal take ye aszshes burnt syn offeringe put springinge water theron vessell cleane man shall take 〈…〉 ysope dyppe water sprenkle vpon tente vpon vessel soules therin likewyse also vpon yt hath touched deed man bone slayne personne deed body graue cleane shal sprenkle vpon vncleane ye thirde daye seuēth daie purifye ye seuēth daye shal washe clothes bathe self wt water euen shalbe cleane yt vncleane wil purifye self ye soule shal roted ye cōgregacion hath defyled sanctuary lorde sprēkled wt sprē klinge water therfore vncleane shalbe perpetuall lawe vnto thē yt sprenkled wt sprēklinge water shall wash clothes also euer toucheth sprēklinge water shal vncleane vntill euen 〈◊〉 17 euer toucheth shalbe vncleane loke soule toucheth shalbe vncleane vntill euen xx chapter childrē israel came wt whole cōgregacion wildernesse zin first moneth 〈◊〉 3 〈◊〉 1▪ f people abode cades dyed miriam buried congregacion water gathered selues together agaynst moses aaron people chode moses sayde wolde god yt perished 〈…〉 whan oure brethrē perished lorde wherfore haue ye brought congregacion lorde wildernesse yt shulde dye oure catell wherfore haue ye brought v egipte place men sowe nether fygges ner vynes ner pomgranates water drynke moses aaron wēte frō congregacion vnto ye dore ye tabernacle witnesse fell vpon face glory lorde appeared vnto lorde spake vnto moses 〈◊〉 17 b 〈◊〉 10 sayde take staffe gather cōgregacion together thou thy brother aaron speake vnto rocke eye shall geue water thus shalt thou prouyde thē water rocke geue congregacion drynke catell also thē toke moses staffe ye lorde commaunded moses aaron gathered congregacion together rocke sayde vnto thē heare ye rebellion shal prouyde water rocke moses lift vp hande smote ye rocke wt staffe two tymes 〈◊〉 77 b came ye water abūdantly yt cōgregacion dranke catell also lorde sayde vnto moses aaron • eut 1 f 〈◊〉 3 • ye beleued sanctifye mē ye childrē israel ye shal bringe congregacion londe shal geue thē ye water strife child israel stroue wt lorde sanctified vpon moses sent messaungers frō cades vnto ye kynge ye edomites iudic 11 c worde sendeth ye gen 25 c brother israel thou knowest ye trauayle happened vnto v oure father wente downe egipte haue dwelt egipte longe tyme egipcians dealte euell v father cryed vnto ye lorde herde oure voyce sent angell hath brought v egipte beholde cades ye cite without border ye londe num 21 c 1 mac 5 c let v go thorow thy londe wyl go thorow ye feldes ner vynyardes ner drynke water foū taynes wyl go hye strete turne nether ye right hande ner ye lefte tyll come past ye border thy countre edomite answered thou shal go eze • 5 abd 1 b wyl come agaynst ye ye swerde child israel saide vnto wil go ye comō hye waye yf oure catell drynke thy water deut 2 wil paye wil nothinge passe thorow fote onely sayde thou shalt go thorow edomites came mightie people strō ge hande thus ye edomites denied graū te israel passage thorow border lande israel turned awaye child israel brake vp frō cades num 33 came whole congregacion vnto mount hor lorde spake vnto moses aaron mount hor harde vpon coastes ye lande ye edomites sayde let aarō gathered vnto people shal come ye lande yt haue geuen vnto ye child israel ye dishobedient vnto mouth water strife take aaron eleasar sonne brynge vp vnto mount hor strype aaron vestimentes put thē vpon eleasar sonne shall aaron gathered vnto people dye dyd moses lorde cōmaunded wente vp vnto mount hor ye sight whole congregacion moses toke aaron clothes put thē vpon eleasar sonne deut 10 b 33 g aaron dyed euen aboue vpon mount moses eleasar came downe mount whan whole congregacion sawe aaron awaye mourned thirtie day thorow whole house israel xxi chapter whan arad kynge cananites dwelt towarde south herde nu 33 israel came ye waie yt spyes founde fought agaynst israel toke presoners vowed israel vowe vnto ye lorde sayde yf thou wylt geue people vnder hande wyll vtterly destroye city lorde herde ye voyce israel delyuered cananites vtterly destroyed wt city also iudic 1 called place horma deut 2 departed fro mount hor ye waye towarde reed see might go aboute lande edomites soules people faynted waie spake agaynst god agaynst moses num 11 wherfore hast thou brought v lande egipte slaye v wildernesse nether bred ner water oure soule lotheth lighte meate sent lorde fyrie serpentes amonge people bote peple dyed moch people israel thē came vnto moses sayde haue synned haue spoken agaynst lorde agaynst exod 8 b 3 13 b act 8 c praye thou vnto lorde take awaye serpentes v moses prayed people sayde lorde vnto moses make brasen serpente set vp token euer bytten loketh vpon shal lyue made moses serpent brasse ioh 3 b 4 1 • set vp token whan serpent bytten eny man behelde brasen serpente recouered child israel departed pitched oboth num 33 e oboth wente pitched igim abarim wyldernesse ouer agaynst moab eastsyde thence departed pitched ryuer sared th •• ce depa • ted pitched syde arnon wyldernesse commeth coastes amorites arnon border betwixte moab ye amorites wherfore spoken boke warres lorde go violence ryuer arnon founteyne riuer boweth downewarde dwell ar leaneth theron border moab thence came well well wherof lorde spake vnto moses gather people together wil geue water sange israel songe sange one another ouer well well prynces dygged noble amonge people haue digged thorow ye teacher staues wildernes wente vn mathana mathana vnto nahaliel nahaliel bamoth frō bamoth vnto valley lieth ye felde moab toppe pisga turneth towarde wyldernesse israel sent messaungers vnto sihō kynge amorrites caused saye vnto let go thorow ye lande wyl turne ye feldes ner vynyardes nether drynke water welles ye hye strete wil go till past border thy countre howbeit sihon wolde geue child israel licence go thorow coastes londe gathered people together wente agaynst israel wyldernesse whan came iaheza fought agaynst israel neuerthelesse israel smote edge swerde conquered lande arnon vnto iabock vnto child ammon border child ammon strōge israel toke city dwelt city ye amorites namely heszbon townes belonginge therto heszbon cite sihons kynge amorites foughten kynge moabites conquered londe vntyll arnon wherfore sayde prouerbe come vnto heszbon let v buylde prepare ye cite sihon fyre gone heszbon flamme cite sihon hath consumed ar ye mo • bite citisens ye toppe arnon wo vnto moab thou people camo art vndone sonnes put flighte doughters brought captyue vnto sihon kynge amorites glory come naught heszbon vnto dibon waisted vnto nopha reacheth vnto mediba thus dwelt israel lande amorites moses sent spyes vnto iahesar toke townes belongynge therto cōquered amorites yt therin turned 〈◊〉 3 wente vp waye towarde basan og kynge basan wēte agaynst wt people fight edrei ye lorde sayde vnto moses feare haue geuen wt lande people thy hande thou shalt thou dyddest sihon kynge amorites dwelt heszbon smote sonnes people yt remayned none cōquered londe afterwarde wēte ye child israel pitched ye felde moab beyonde iordane iericho xxii chapter whan balac ye sonne ziphor sawe israel done vnto amorites moabites sore afrayed people yt greate moabites stode feare child israel sayde vnto ye elder madianites shal heapelicke vp aboute v euē oxe licketh vp grasse felde balac ye sonne ziphor kynge moabites tyme sent messaungers vnto 〈◊〉 23 b 〈◊〉 • 3 balaam sonne beor interpreter dwelt water lande ye child people shulde call caused saye vnto beholde come egipte people couereth ye face ye earth lyeth ouer agaynst come therfore curse people mightie yf peraduenture might able smyte dryue lande wote thou blessest blessed thou cursest cursed elder moabites wente ye elder madianites rewarde ye soyth sayenge handes came vnto balaam tolde wordes balaac saide vnto thē tary night bringe worde agayne euen lorde shal saye vnto ye prynces ye moabites abode balaam god came vnto balaam sayde men ye balaam sayde vnto god balac ye sonne ziphor kynge moabites hath sent vnto beholde people come egipte couereth face earth come therfore curse thē yf peraduēture maye able fighte dryue thē god sayde vnto balaam go curse people blessed rose balaam vp mornynge sayde vnto prynces balac get vnto youre londe lorde wyll • suffer go prynces ye moabites gat thē vp came balac saide balaam refuseth come wt v sent balac yet greater cōpany prynces honorable thē whan came balaam tolde balac ye sonne ziphor sendeth ye worde oh refuse come vnto wyll promote vnto hye honoure wil euer thou sayest vnto come praye curse people balaam answered sayde vnto ye seruaū te balac nu 24 c yf balac wolde geue house full syluer golde yet coulde go beyonde ye worde lorde god litle greate neuertheles tary ye night yt maye wete lorde wil saye vnto came god balaam night saide vnto yf men come call get vp go thē shal saye vnto shalt thou rose balaam vp mornynge sadled asse wente wt prynces ye moabites wrath god waxed whote wēte angell ye lorde stode waye withstōde rode vpō asse two seruauntes wt ye asse sawe ye angell ye lorde stōdinge ye waye swerde drawen hāde ye asse turned syde ye waye wēte felde balaam smote yt shulde go waye stode angell lorde ye pathe vynyardes walles sydes whan ye asse sawe angell lorde wrenshed vnto wall thrust balaams fote vnto wall smote agayne thē wē te angell lorde farther stode narow place waye turne nether righte hāde ner ye lefte whan asse sawe angell lorde fell downe vnder balaam balaams wrath furious smote asse staffe opened lorde mouth ye asse sayde vnto balaam haue done vnto thou hast smytten thre tymes balaam sayde vnto ye asse thou hast mocked oh yt swerde hande wolde kyll asse sayde vnto balaam thine asse thou hast rydden vpon ye tyme vnto daye euer wonte vnto sayde opened lorde eye balaam yt sawe ye angell lorde stondinge ye waye drawē swerde hā de enclyned selfe bowed downe wt face angell lorde sayde vnto wherfore hast thou smyttē thine asse thre tymes beholde come resiste ye yt waye frowarde cōtrary vnto ye asse sawe auoyded fro thre tymes el yf turned asyde fro slayne saued asse alyue sayde balaam vnto ye angell ye lorde haue synned wyst thou stodest waye agaynst yf displease ye wil turne agayne angell ye lorde saide vnto go mē thou shalt speake nothinge el yt shal saye vnto ye balaam wente forth wt prince balac whan balac herde yt balaam came wente mete cite moabit • yt lieth coaste arnon ye vttemost border sayde vnto dyd sende yt call wherfore camest thou vnto thinkest thou yt able promote ye vnto honor balaam answered lo come vnto ye num 23 c saye eny thinge el thē yt god putteth mouth yt must speake balaam wente balac came vnto cite vttemost border lande balac slewe ox shepe sent balaam p ••• ce xxiii chapter mornynge balac toke balaam wēte vp hye place baal thēce might se vnto vttemost parte ye people balaam sayde vnto balac buylde seuen altares prouyde seuen bullockes seuē rammes balac dyd balaam sayde balac balaam offred euery altare bullocke ramme balaam sayde vnto balac stonde thou yt burnt offerynge wil go yf happly lorde wil mete call yt maye tell euer sheweth wente waye sayde ye lorde mett balaam balaam saide vnto seuen altares haue prepared offred euery altare bullocke ramme lorde put ye worde balaams mouth sayde go agayne vnto balac saye wise whan came agayne vnto beholde stode burnt offerynge ye prynces moabites toke vp parable sayde balac kynge moabites hath caused • et syria moūtaynes towarde east sayde come curse iacob come defye israel shall curse god curseth shal defye ye lorde defyeth frō ye toppe ye stonye rockes se hilles beholde beholde ye people shal dwell thēselues shal rekened amōge heithē tell dust iacob nombre fourth parte israel soule die ye death ye righteous ende ende thē saide balac vnto balaam doest thou vnto caused fet ye curse myne enemy beholde thou blessest thē answered saide 〈…〉 must kepe speake yt lorde putteth mouth balac saide vnto come wt yet vnto another place frō whence thou mayest se ye vttemost parte se curse toke vp fre place euē vnto toppe pisga buylded seuen altares offered euery altare bullocke ramme sayde vnto balac stonde thy burnt offrynge whyle go yonder th • lorde mett balaam put worde mouth sayde go agayne vnto bala • saye wyse whan came agayne beholde stode burnt • rynge prynces moabites balac sayde vnto hath lorde sayde toke vp parable sayde ryse vp balac heare marke testimony wt thine eares thou sonne ziphor • 1 〈◊〉 10 b god man yt shulde lye ner man childe yt eny thinge shulde repente shulde saye shulde speake make good beholde brought hither blesse blesse go backe fro weerynesse sene iacob nether eny laboure israel lorde god wt kynges trompet amō ge thē 〈◊〉 24 b god hath brought thē egipte strēgth vnicorne sorcerye iacob soyth sayer israel whan tyme cōmeth shal saide vnto iacob israel god doth beholde people shall ryse vp lyonesse heue vp self lyon shal lye downe tyll eate pray drynke bloude slayne sayde balac vnto balaam thou shalt nether curse ner blesse balaam answered sayde vnto balac haue tolde yt lorde speaketh yt must balac saide vnto oh come wil brynge yt another place yf maye happly please god yt thou mayest curse thē brought vp toppe mount peor yt boweth towarde wyldernesse balaam sayde vnto balac buylde seuen altares prouyde seuen bullockes seuen rammes balac dyd balaam sayde offered euery altare bullocke vnd ramme xxiiii chapter whan balaam sawe yt pleased lorde shulde blesse israel wente dyd seke witch set face straight towarde wyldernesse lifte vp eye sawe israel num 2 • laye acordinge trybes sprete god came vpon toke vp parable sayde nu • 4 c thus sayeth balaam sonne beor thus sayeth man whose eye opened thus sayeth heareth wordes god sawe vision ye allmightie fell downe eye opened goodly thy tētes iacob thy habitacions israel euen brode valley garden water syde ye tentes lorde hath plā ted ceder tree vpon ye water water shal flowe boket sede shalbe greate water kynge shalbe hyer agag kyngdome shalbe exalted nu 23 god hath broughte hī egipte strength vnicorne shal eate vp heithen enemy grynde bone poulder shute thorow arowes ge 49 • hath layed downe lyon lyonesse wyll rayse vp blessed yt blesseth cursed curseth thē balac furious ī wrath balaam smote hādes together sayde vnto haue called yt thou shuldest curse myne enemy beholde thou hast blessed thē thre tymes get hēce ye place thoughte yt wolde promote vnto honoure lorde hath kepte backe worshipe balaam answered tolde thy messaungers thou sendedst vnto sayde nu 22 c yf balac wolde people tyme toke vp parable sayde thus sayeth balaam sonne beor nu • 4 • thus sayeth ye man whose eye opened thus sayeth heareth wordes god yt hath knowlege ye hyest euē yt sawe ye visiō ye allmightie fell downe eye opened shal se shal beholde nie hāde matt 2 • shal starre come iacob cepter shall come vp israel 2 • • shal smyte ye ruler moabites ouercome child seth 2 • edom shalbe possession seir shalbe enemy possessiō israel shal manfully iacob shal come yt hath dominion shall destroye remnaunt city whā sawe ye amalechites toke vp parable sayde exo 17▪ amalec first amōge house thrust thē thorow man israel woman euē thorow bely ceassed plage child israel cor 10 slayne plage foure twentye thousande ye lorde spake vnto moses saide phineas sonne eleasar sonne aaron ye prest • cli 45 c • ac • f hath turned wrath awaie childrē israel thorow gelousy sake amonge yt shulde cōsume childrē israel gelousy wherfore saye • beholde geue 〈…〉 couenaunt peace shal haue sede euē couenaunt euer lastinge presthode gelous god sake made attonement child israel man israel slayne madianit • sh woman called simri sonne salu captayne house father simeonites madianitish woman also slayne called coszbi ye doughter zur ruler people kynred amonge madianites lorde spake vnto moses sayde vexe madianites smyte 〈…〉 haue vexed wyles wherby haue bigyled thorow peor thorow sister coszbi doughter captayne ye madianites slayne daye plage peors sake plage came xxvi chapter whan giltye bloude shed lorde sayde vnto moses vnto eleasar ye sonne aaron ye prest take summe whole cōgregacion childrē israel twentye yeare aboue father house 〈…〉 yt able go forth warre israel moses eleasar prest spake vnto felde moabites besyde iordane ouer iericho namely vnto thē twentye yeare olde aboue lorde cōmaunded moses ye childrē israel came egipte ruben ye first borne sonne israel 〈…〉 childreē ruben hanoch cōmeth ye kynred hanochites pallu • cōmeth kynred palluites hesron fiftye men became tokē child corah dyed childrē simeon kynreds nemuel 〈…〉 whō cōmeth kynred ye nemuelites iamin cōmeth ye kynred ye iaminites iachin whō cō meth kynred iachinites serum cōmeth summe child israel sixe hundreth thousande eccli 16 • thousande seuen hundreth thirtye ye lorde spake vnto moses sayde vnto shalt thou deuyde lōde enheritaunce acordinge nombre ye name • um 32 f • • aaron borne nadab leui 10 num • 3 abihu eleasar ithamar nadab abihu dyed whan offred straunge fyre ye lorde summe thē thre twentye thousande num 3 f male frō fyue monethes aboue nombred amōge childrē israel enheritaunce geuen thē amonge child israel ye summe ye childrē israel whō moses eleasar prest nombred felde moabites besyde iordane ouer agaynst iericho amonge one summe child israel num 1 f moses aaron prest nombred wildernesse sinai ye lorde sayde vnto thē nu 14 c yt shulde dye wildernesse one lefte saue caleb sonne iephune iosua sonne nun xxvii chapter doughters nu 26 nu 36 • osu 17 zelaphead ye sonne hepher ye sonne gilead sonne machir sonne manasse amonge kynreds manasse sonne ioseph whose name mahela noa hagla milca thirza came stode moses eleasar prest ruler whole congregacion euen dore ye tabernacle witnesse sayde oure father deed wildernesse company yt rose vp agaynst ye lorde cōgregacion corah nu 16 dyed awne synne sonnes wherfore shulde father name perishe amonge kynred though h • ue sonne geue v possession also •• ge oure father brother moses broughte cause ye lorde lorde sayde vnto doughters zelaphead haue spokē righte thou shalt geue thē possession inhere • amonge father brother shalt turne father enheritaunce vnto saye vnto childrē israel whan mā dyeth hath sonne ye shall turne enheritaunce vnto doughter yf haue doughter ye shal geue vnto brethrē yf haue brother ye shal geue vnto father brother yf haue father brethrē ye shal geue vnto nexte kynszfolke belōge vnto kynred yt maye possesse shalbe ordynaunce perpetuall lawe vnto child israel lorde cōmaunded moses lorde sayde vnto moses 〈…〉 get vp mount abarim beholde lōde shal geue vnto childrē israel whan thou hast sene thou shalt gathered vnto ye people 〈…〉 aaron ye brother gathered ye dishobedient vnto worde wyldernesse zin ye strife cōgregacion whan ye shulde haue sanctified thorow water 〈…〉 water stryfe cades wyldernesse zin moses spake vnto lorde sayde let lorde god spretes flesh set mā ouer congregacion maye go leade thē yt congregacion lorde shepe without shepherde lorde sayde vnto moses 〈…〉 take vnto iosua sonne nun man sprete put thine handes vpon set eleasar prest whole congregacion geue charge sighte beutyfye thy bewty whole congregacion child israel maye obediēt vnto shal stonde eleasar prest shall • e councell maner 〈…〉 lighte lorde mouth moses sayde cōmaunde ye childrē israel saye vnto thē offerynge bred offerynge swete sauoure shal ye kepe due season ye maie offre vnto 〈…〉 saye vnto thē offerynges ye shal offre vnto lorde lambes yeare olde without blemysh euery daye two daylie burnt offerynge one lambe mornynge euen therto tenth deale epha fyne floure meat offerynge 〈…〉 myngled beatē oyle fourth parte hin daylie burnt offerynge ye offred vpon moūt sinai swete sauoure sacrifice vnto lorde drynk offeringe ye fourth parte hin lambe shalbe poured sanctuary gifte vnto lorde lambe shalt thou prepare euē like meat shal holy cō uocacion also worke bondage shal ye therin ye shal offre burnt offerynge swete sauoure vnto lorde two yonge bullockes ramme leui 23▪ • seuen lambes yeare olde meat offerynges thre tenth
