ge kynges iuda nether bene cleued vnto lorde departed backe kepte commaundementes lorde cōmaunded moses lorde wt whither euer wēte forth behaued selfe wysely resisted kyn assiria subdued vnto 〈…〉 smote philistynes also vnto gasa border castels vnto stronge city fourth yeare ezechias kynge iuda yt seuenth yeare oseas sonne ela kynge israel came salmanasar kynge assiria vp agaynst samaria • 17 layed sege vnto wanne thre yeares sixte yeare ezechias nyenth yeare oseas kynge israel thē samaria wonne kynge assiria caried israel awaye vnto assiria set halah habor water gosan city meedes herkened vnto voyce lorde god transgressed couenaunt moses seruaunt lorde commaunded thē nether herkened vnto eny ner done fourtēth yeare kynge ezechias dyd sennacherib ye kynge assiria come vp agaynst stronge city iuda2 par 32 eccli 48 • sa 36 cōquered thē sent ezechias kynge iuda ye kynge assiria vnto lachis sayenge haue offended turne back fro loke thou layest vnto wil beare thē kynge assiria layed vnto ezechias kynge iuda thre hundreth talentes syluer thirtie talentes golde 4 1 • ezechias gaue ye syluer yt foū de ye house lorde treasure ye kynges house ye tyme brake ezechias kynge iuda dores tēple ye lorde plate golde selfe caused laye ouer thē gaue thē vnto kynge assiria kynge assiria sent thartan2 par 32 chefe chamberlayne chefe butler lachis kynge ezechias greate power vnto ierusalem wē te vp whan came stode styll condyte ouer pole lyeth waye vpō fuller londe called vnto kynge thē came forth vnto eliachim sonne helchias stewarde sobna scrybe ioah sonne assaph secretary chefe butler sayde vnto thē tell kynge ezechias thus sayeth ye greate kynge euē kynge assiria presumpcion yt thou trustest vnto thinkest thou yt thou hast yet councell power fighte vnto trustest thou thou art fallen fro beholde puttest thou thy trust broken staffe rede egipte leaneth vpon shall go hande pearse thorow euen pharao kynge egipte vnto put trust yf ye wolde saye vnto put oure trust ye lorde oure god whose hye place altares ezechias hath takē downe sayde vnto iuda ierusalē altare ierusalē shal ye worshippe make multitude therfore vnto lorde kynge assiria wil geue ye two thousande horse let se yf thou able man wilt thou endure smallest prynce lordes subiectes trustest thou vnto egipte charettes horsmen thinkest thou came vp hither without ye lorde destroye city lorde hath commaunded go vp londe destroye sayde eliachim sonne helchia sobna ioah vnto chefe butler speake thy seruauntes syriās language vnderstonde speake vnto v iewes speche eares people vpon wall neuertheles ye chefe butler sayde vnto thē hath lorde sent vnto thy lorde speake wordes yee euen vnto men syt vpon wall maye eate owne donge drynke owne stale wt chefe butler stode cried loude voyce iewes language spake sayde heare worde greate kynge kynge assiria thus sayeth kynge let ezechias disceaue able delyuer fro hāde let ezechias make trust lorde sayenge lorde shall delyuer v cite shal geuen handes ye kynge assiria folowe ye ezechias thus sayeth kynge assiria blessynge come forth vnto shal euery man eate vyne fygge tre drynke well tyll come selfe fetch londe like youre awne lōde wherin corne wyne bred vynyardes oyle tree oyle hony shal ye lyue dye folowe ye ezechias disceaueth sayeth lorde shal delyuer v • sa 10 b haue goddes heythen delyuered euery one londe hande kynge assiria goddes hemath arphad goddes sepharuaim hena iua haue delyuered samaria fro hande one god amonge goddes londes hath delyuered londe fro hande lorde shulde delyuer ierusalem fro hande people helde peace gaue answere kynge commaunded sayde answere nothinge came eliachim sonne helchia ye stewarde sobna scrybe ioah sonne assaph secretatary vnto ezechias rente clothes tolde wordes chefe butler xix chapter whan ezechias ye kynge herde rente clothes 〈…〉 put sackcloth wente ye house lorde sent eliachim stewarde sobna scrybe eldest prestes clothed sackcloth vnto prophet esay ye sonne amos saide vnto thus sayeth ezechias daye trouble defiaunce blasphemy childrē come byrth strength delyuered yf happly lorde thy god wil heare wordes ye chefe butler lorde kynge assiria hath sent blasphemie ye lyuynge god defye soch wordes lorde thy god hath herde therfore lifte thou vp thy prayer remnaunt yet lefte behynde whā kynge ezechias seruauntes came esay esay sayde vnto speake thus vnto youre lorde thus sayeth lorde feare thou wordes yt thou hast herde wherwith kynge assirias seruauntes haue blasphemed beholde wil put another mynde yt shall heare tydinges go agayne awne countre 〈…〉 awne londe wil cause fall thorow swerde whan ye chefe butlar came agayne founde kynge assiria fightinge agaynst libna herde departed lachis herde taracha kynge morians beholde gone forth fighte turned back sent messaungers ezechias caused saye vnto let thy god disceaue thou trustest sayest ierusalem shal geuē hāde kynge assiria beholde thou hast herde kynges assiria haue done vnto londes dāned shalt thou delyuered haue ye goddes ye heithen delyuered thē father destroyed gosan haran reseph childrē eden thalassar ye kynge hemath ye kynge arphad ye kinge ye cite sepharuaim hena iua whan ezechias receaued letter messaungers red wente vp vnto house lorde layed abrode lorde made prayer lorde sayde lorde god israel thou syttest vpō cherubins thou onely art god amonge ye kyngdomes earth thou hast made heauen earth enclyne thine eare lorde heare open thine eye beholde heare wordes sennacherib hath sent hither blaspheme lyuynge god true lorde kynges assiria haue destroyed heythen londe swerde haue cast goddes fyre goddes ye worke mēs hondes wodd stone therfore haue destroyed lorde helpe thou v hande kyngdomes vpon earth maye knowe thou lorde art god alone sent esay sonne amos vnto ezechias sayenge thus sayeth lorde god israel thou hast made thy prayer vnto concernynge sennacherib ye kynge assiria haue herde lorde hath spoken agaynst hath despysed ye mocked virgin thou doughter sion hath shakē heade doughter ierusalem 〈◊〉 1 b 〈◊〉 • 5 〈◊〉 9 hast thou despysed blasphemed ouer hast thou lifte vp thy voyce euē agaynst ye holy one israel hast thou lifte vp thine eye thou hast blasphemed ye lorde thy messaungers sayde thorow multitude charettes haue gone vp toppes mountaynes vpon sydes libanus haue hewen downe hye ceders chosen pyne tree come vttemost habitacion wod carmel belongeth vnto haue dygged dronke vp straunge water ye sol fete haue dryed vp see hast thou herde haue done longe agoo haue prepared begynnynge haue caused come contencious stronge city mighte fall waist heape stone dwell therin shal faynte fearfull shamed 〈◊〉 • 6 shal grasse vpon felde ye grene herbe hay vpon house toppes wythereth afore growne vp knowe thy habitacion thy ingoynge thou ragest agaynst moch thou ragest agaynst seynge thy presumpcion come vp myne eares therfore wyll put rynge thy nose brydle bytt thy lippes wyll brynge agayne euen waye thou camest let token vnto ezechias yeare eate yt fallen▪ seconde yeare soch groweth selfe ye thirde yeare sowe reape plante vynyardes eate frute therof doughter iuda escaped remayneth shall hence forth take rote beneth beare frute aboue remnaunt shal go forth ierusalem yt escaped shall go fro mount sion gelousy lorde zebaoth shall brynge passe therfore thus sayeth lorde concernynge ye kynge assyrian shall come cite shall shute arowe therin nether shal come eny shylde nether shall dygge eny backe aboute shal go agayne waye came shall come cite sayeth lorde wyll defende cite helpe myne awne sake seruaunt dauids sake nighte wente angell lorde smote hoost assyrian hundreth fyue foure score thousande men whan gatt vp mornynge beholde laye full deed coarses tobi 1 sennacherib kinge assyria brake vp departed returned abode niniue worshipped ye house nesrach god awne sonnes adramalech sarazer smote swerde fled ye londe ararat asarhadon sonne kynge steade xx chapter tyme ezechias deedsicke prophet esay ye sonne amos came sayde vnto him2 par 32 • esa 38 thus sayeth ye lorde set thine house ordre thou shalt dye lyue turned face wall prayed vnto ye lorde sayde remembre lorde haue walked faithfully perfecte hert haue done yt good thy syghte ezechias wepte sore whan esay gone halfe cite ye worde ye lorde came sayde turne back tell ezechias ye prynce people thus sayeth ye lorde god thy father dauid haue herde thy praier considered ye teares beholde wil heale ye thirde daye shalt thou go ye house lorde fiftene yeares wil adde vnto ye life wyll delyuer cite kynge assyria cite wil defende myne awne sake seruaūt dauids sake esay sayde bringe hither quantite fygges whan broughte layed vpon sore healed ezechias sayde vn esay ye token lorde wyll heale shal go vp house ye lorde thirde daye esay sayde token shalt thou haue lorde lorde shal acordynge hath sayde shall shadowe go ten degree forwarde shal turne ten degree backwarde ezechias sayde easy thinge shadowe go ten degree downewarde yt mynde go ten degree backwarde cryed prophet esay vnto lorde eccli 48 e shadowe wente backe ten degree achas dyall descended afore tyme merodach baladan sonne baladan kynge babilon esa 39 sent letter presentes vnto ezechias herde ezechias bene sicke ezechias reioysed shewed house rote syluer golde spyces best oyle house ordinaunce founde treasure nothinge house domynion ezechias shewed came esay prophet vnto kynge ezechias sayde vnto haue men sayde whence came vnto ezechias sayde came farre countre euen babilon sayde haue sene thyne house ezechias sayde haue sene house nothynge 〈◊〉 haue shewed sayde esay vnto ezechias heare worde lorde beholde 4 24 c and▪ 2 • b iere 32 c tyme commeth shall caryed awaye vnto babilon whatsoeuer thy father haue layed vp vnto daye shall nothinge lefte sayeth lorde dan 1 yee child come thou shalt beget shalbe taken awaye chamberlaynes kynge babilons palace ezechias sayde vnto esay good lorde hath spoken sayde morouer let peace yet faithfulnesse tyme saye ezechias power dyd pole water condyte wher conueyed water cite beholde wrytten cronicles kynges iuda 2 par 32 f ezechias fell slepe father manasses sonne kynge steade xxi chapter manasses twolue yeare olde whan made kinge 〈…〉 reigned fyue fyftye yeare ierusalem mother name hephziba dyd euell ye sight lorde euen abhominaciōs heithen lorde expelled child israel waxed fro warde 〈…〉 builded vp hye place father ezechias destroyed sett vp baal altares made groues achab kynge israel dyd worshipped hoost heauen serued buylded altares lordes house wherof lorde sayde wyll set name ierusalem courtes house lorde buylded altares vnto hoost heauē 〈…〉 caused sonne go thorow fyre regarded byrdes cryenge token maynteyned soythsayers expounder token moch dyd euell sight lorde prouoked vnto wrath groue idol also made set house wherof lorde sayde vnto dauid salomon sonne house ierusalem 〈…〉 haue chosen trybes israel wil set name foreuer wyl cause ye fote israel remoued eny londe gaue vnto father yee obserue acordynge vnto haue charged lawe seruaunt moses cō maunded neuertheles wolde herken manasses disceaued yt dyd worse heithen lorde expelled ye child israel spake lorde seruauntes prophetes saide manasse kynge iuda hath gone abhominacions worse ye abhominacions amorites haue done hath caused iuda also synne agaynst god therfore thus sayeth lorde god israel 〈…〉 beholde wyll brynge soch plage vpon ierusalem iuda euer heareth eares shal glowe ouer ierusalem wyll stretch forth lyne samaria weighte house achab wyll wype ierusalem euen one wypeth platter wyl ouerthrowe ye remnaunt myne inheritaunce wil cast seater abrode wil delyuer hādes enemy spoyled rent enemy haue done yt euell sighte haue prouoked vnto wrath sence daye broughte father egipte vnto daye manasses also shed exceadinge moch innocēt bloude longe tyll ierusalē full euery syde synnes wherwith caused iuda synne yt dyd euell sighte lorde saie manasses dyd synnes commytted beholde wrytten cronicles kynges iuda manasses fell slepe father buried garden besyde house namely garden vsa amon sonne kynge steade 〈◊〉 33 two twentye yeare olde amon whan made kynge reigned two yeare ierusalem mother name mesumeleth ye doughter harus iatba dyd euell sighte lorde manasses father done walked waye father walked serued idol father serued worshipped forsoke lorde god father walked waye lorde seruauntes conspyred agaynst amon slewe kynge house people londe slewe yt cōspyred agaynst kynge amon people londe made iosias sonne kynge steade thinges amon dyd beholde wrytten cronicles kynges iuda buried graue vsas gardē iosias sonne kynge steade xxii chapter iosias eight yeare olde whā made kynge 〈◊〉 34▪ reigned one thirtie yeare ierusalem mother name iedida doughter adaia bascath dyd righte ye sighte lorde walked ye waye dauid father turned asyde nether righte hande ner lefte • par 34and eightenth yeare kynge iosias kynge sent saphan ye sonne asalia sonne mesulam scrybe ye house lorde sayde • 12 b go vp helchias hye prest money brought vnto ye house ye lorde tresholde kepers haue gathered ye people maye delyuered vnto maye geue workman appoynted house lorde geue vnto labourer house yt maye repayre decaye house namely vnto carpenter buylders mason yt bie timber fre stone repairinge house yt accomptes taken concernynge money vnder hande yt deale withall vpon credence helchias ye prest sayde vnto saphā scrybe 2 pa 34 • haue founde boke lawe house lorde helchias gaue boke vnto saphan might reade saphan scrybe bare vnto kynge brought worde agayne sayde thy seruauntes haue gathered together ye money yt founde house haue delyuered vnto workmē appoynted ye house lorde saphan scrybe tolde kynge sayde helchias prest hath delyuered boke saphan red kynge whan kinge herde wordes boke lawe rente clothes kynge cōmaunded helchias prest ahicam sonne saphan achbor sonne michaia saphan scribe asaia ye kynges seruaunt sayde go yor waye axe councell lorde iere 21 • people iuda concernynge wordes boke founde greate wrath lorde kyndled ouer v father haue herkened vnto wordes boke wrytten vnto v therin wente helchias prest ahicam achbor saphan asaia vnto hulda prophetisse ye wife sellū sonne thecua sonne harham keper ye clothes dwelt ierusalem seconde porte spake vnto sayde vnto thus sayeth ye lorde god israel tell man sent vnto thus sayeth lorde beholde wil brynge euell vpon place inhabiters therof euen wordes ye lawe kynge hath caused red haue forsaken brent incense vnto goddes prouoke vnto wrath workes handes therfore wrath kindled agaynst cite shall quenched tell vnto kynge iuda hath sent axe councell lorde thus sayeth lorde god israel thine hert departed frō wordes thou hast herde hast humbled thyselfe lorde heare haue spoken agaynst place inhabiters therof shall become desolacion curse hast rente thy clothes wepte haue herde sayeth lorde4 23 f therfore wyll gather vnto thy father yt thou shalt put thy graue peace thine eye shall se euell wyll brynge vpon place brought kynge worde agayne xxiii chapter kynge sent fotth elder iuda ierusalem resorted vnto • par 34 f kynge wente vp house lorde men iuda inhabiters ierusalem prestes prophetes people small greate • esd 8 wordes boke couenaunt founde house lorde red eares kinge stode vpon piler made couenaūt lorde • su 24 • shulde walke lorde kepe commaundementes witness ordinaunces hert soule yt shulde set vp wordes couenaunt wrytten boke people entred couenaunt 〈◊〉 cōmaunded helchias hye prest • prestes secōde course kepers thresholde yt shulde put temple vessel made baal groue hoost heauen brent without ierusalem valley cedron dust caryed vnto bethel put downe • ph 1 kemurims whō kynges iuda founded burne incense vpon hye place city iuda aboute ierusalem put downe also brent incense vnto baal sonne mone twolue token ye hoost heauen groue caused caryed house lorde ierusalem ye valley cedron brent valley cedron made dust cast dust vpon graues ye comen people brake downe whorekepers house house lorde wherin wemen made mansion groue caused prestes come city iuda suspended ye hye place prestes brent incense geba vnto berseba brake downe hye place porte ye dore gate iosua ye shreue cite lefte hande one goeth cite porte yet prestes hye place offred vpon altare lorde ierusalem ate vnleuended bred amonge brother suspended 〈…〉 tophet also valley child ennon noman shulde cause sonne doughter go thorow ye fyre vnto moloch put downe horse ye kynges iuda set vnto sonne intringe house lorde besyde chest netham melech chamberlayne paruarim charettes sonne brent fyre altares vpon rofe achabs perler kynges iuda made altares 〈…〉 manasses made two courtes house lorde dyd kynge breake downe rannefrom thence cast dust broke cedron hye place ierusalem righte hande mount mashith 〈…〉 salomon kynge israel buylded vnto astaroth abhomynacion sidon camo abhominacion moab malcom abhominacion child ammon kynge suspende brake pilers roted groues fylled place men bone 〈…〉 altare bethel hye place ieroboam sonne nebat made caused israel synne altare brake downe hye place brent hye place made dust brent vp groue iosias turned aboute sawe graues vpō mount caused bone fetched graues brent vpō altare suspended acordinge worde lorde 〈…〉 man god cryed tolde sayde titell se men cite sayde vnto graue man god came iuda cried thou hast done agaynst ye altare bethel sayde let lye man touche bone thus bone delyuered bone prophet came samaria put awaye also house hye place city samaria kynges israel made prouoke ye lorde vnto wrath dyd acordinge done bethel ye prestes hye place offred vp vpon altares 〈…〉 brent men bone theron came agayne ierusalem 〈…〉 kynge commaūded people sayde kepe easter vnto lorde youre god 〈…〉 wrytten boke couenaunt easter kepte sence tyme iudges iudged israel tymes kynges israel kynges iuda eightenth yeare kynge iosias easter kepte vnto lorde ierusalem iosias expelled soythsayers expounder tokēs ymages idol abhominacions sene londe iuda ierusalem mighte set vp wordes lawe wrytten boke helchias ye prest foūde house ye lorde like kynge cōuerted vnto ye lorde wt hert wt soule strength acordinge lawe moses came vp soch another yet turned lorde indignacion greate wrath wherwith displeased ouer iuda prouocacion wherwith manasses prouoked ye lorde sayde 〈◊〉 • 4 wil put iuda presence also euen haue put awaye israel cite haue chosen wyl cast namely ierusalem house wherof sayde name shalbe saye iosias dyd beholde wrytten cronicles kynges iuda tyme wēte pharao necho ye kynge egipte vp agaynst kynge assyria water euphrates • par 35 kynge iosias wente agaynst dyed megiddo whā sene seruauntes caried deed frō megiddo brought ierusalē buryed graue people londe toke iechonias ioahas sonne iosias anoynted made kynge father steade thre twentye yeare olde ioahas whā made kynge reigned thre monethes ierusalē mother name hamutal ye doughter ieremia libna dyd yt euell ye sight ye lorde euen father done pharao necho toke presoner reblatha londe hemath yt shulde reigne ierusalem raysed taxe vpō londe hundreth talētes siluer one talente golde pharao necho made eliachim ye sonne iosias kynge father iosias steade turned name ioachim iere 22 b ioahas toke brought egipte dyed ioachim gaue siluer golde vnto pharao yet taxed londe yt might geue ye syluer acordynge pharaos cōmaundement euery one amonge people ye londe taxed abilite siluer golde geue vnto pharao fyue twentye yeare olde ioachim whan made kynge reigned eleuen yeares ierusalem mother name sebida ye doughter pedaia ruma dyd euell sight lorde euen father done xxiiii chapter tyme came vp nabuchodonosor ye kynge babilon ioachim subieccion vn iij yeare turned back rebelled agaynst ye lorde sent men warre vpon chaldea syria moab frō amonge childrē ammon caused thē come iuda destroie acordinge worde lorde spake seruauntes prophetes fortuned euē vnto iuda 4 23 • acordynge ye worde lorde wolde put awaye presence ye sinnes manasses dyd innocent bloude shed fylled ierusalem innocent bloude therfore wolde lorde reconcyled saye ioachim dyd beholde wrytten cronicles kynges iuda ioachim fell slepe father iere 36 ioachim sonne kynge steade kynge egipte came nomore londe kynge babilon conquered kynge egiptes ryuer egipte vnto ye water euphrates eightene yeare olde ioachim whan made kynge reigned thre monethes ierusalē mother name nebustha doughter elnathan ierusalem dyd euell sighte lorde euen father done tyme wente seruauntes nabuchodonosor kynge babilon vp ierusalem came vpon cyte ordinaunce warre whan nabuchodonosor seruauntes came cite layed sege vnto ioachim ye kynge iuda wente forth kynge babilon mother seruauntes ruler chamberlaynes kynge babilon receaued eight yeare reigne 4 20 c esa 29 b toke forth frō thence treasure house lorde ye kynges house brake golden vessell yt salomon kynge israel made house lorde acordynge lorde sayde caryed awaye ierusalem ruler mightie men euen ten thousande presoners carpenter smithes lefte none behynde poore people londe deu 28 ier 24 caryed ioachim awaye vnto babilon kynges mother kinges wyues chamberlaynes ye mightie men londe led awaye presoners also ierusalem vnto babilon seuen thousande best men thousande carpenter smythes stronge men warre ier 37 kynge babilon made matania vncle kynge steade turned name sedechias ier 52 one twentye yeare olde sedechias whan made kynge reigned eleuen yeare ierusalem mother name amithal doughter ieremia libna dyd euell sight lorde euē ioachim dyd thus fortuned vnto ierusalē thorow wrath lorde tyll cast frō presence sedechias fell awaye frō kynge babilon xxv chapter fortuned ye nyenth yeare reigne vpon tenth daye tenth moneth 〈…〉 nabuchodonosor kynge babilon came power agaynst ierusalem laied sege vnto buylded stronge holdes rounde aboute thus cite beseged vnto eleuenth yeare kynge sedechias ye nyenth daye fourth moneth honger stronge cite 〈…〉 people londe nothinge eate cite broken vp men warre fled night waye porte betwene two walles goeth kynges gardē caldees laye aboute cite fled waye playne felde neuertheles power caldees folowed kynge toke plaine felde iericho men warre scatered abrode toke kynge led vp kynge babilon vnto reblatha 〈…〉 gaue iudgmēt vpon slewe ezechias child eye put sedechias eies bounde cheynes caryed vnto babilon vpon seuenth daye fyfth monet ninetenth yeare nabuchodonosor kynge babilon came nabusaradan chefe captayne kynge babilons seruaunt vnto ierusalem brent ye house lorde kynges house house ierusalem greate house brent fyre power caldees chefe captayne brake downe walles rounde aboute ierusalem people yet lefte cite fallē vnto kinge babilon comen people nabusaradan chefe captayne caryed awaye poorest people dyd chefe captaine leaue ye londe wynegardeners plowman brasen pilers house lorde seates brasen lauer house lorde dyd ye caldees breake downe caried metall vnto babilon pottes shouels fleshokes spones ye brasen vessell occupied seruyce caried awaye ye chefe captayne toke awaye ye censor basens yt golde syluer two pilers one lauer seates yt salomon made ye house lorde metall ornamentes coulde weyed 〈◊〉 7 b eightene cubytes hye one piler ye knoppe theron brasse also thre cubytes hye rope pomgranates vpon knoppe rounde aboute brasse maner piler also rope chefe captayne toke seraia prest first course sophony prest seconde course thre dorekepers one chamberlayne cite appoynted ouer ye men warre fyue men euer kynge founde cite sophar captayne taught people ye londe fighte thre score men ye people londe founde cite dyd nabusaradan ye chefe captayne take broughte kynge babilon vnto reblatha kynge babilon slewe reblatha ye londe hemath thus iuda caried awaye awne londe 〈◊〉 2 b ouer remnaunt people londe iuda nabuchodonosor kynge babilon lefte behynde set godolias ye sonne ahicam ye sonne saphan whā captaynes soudyers men herde kynge babilon made godolias gouernoure came godolias vnto 〈…〉 mispa namely ismael ye sonne nathanias iohanna ye sonne carea seraia ye sonne tanhometh netophatite iesanias ye sonne maechati wt men godolias sware vnto men sayde vnto 〈◊〉 4 • c feare ye ye officer caldees tary londe submytte youre selues vnto kynge babilon ye shal prospere 〈◊〉 41 seuēth moneth came ismael sonne nathanias sonne elisama kynges kynred ten men slewe godolias iewes caldees mispa people gat vp small greate captaynes hoost came egipte afrayed ye caldees howbeit seuen thirtieth yeare ioachim kynge iuda caried awaye seuen twenty daye twolueth moneth euilmerodach kynge babilon first yeare reigne lifte vp heade ioachim ye kynge iuda preson spake louyngly vnto set trone aboue ye trones ye kynges babilon chaunged clothes captiuyte ate allwaye longe lyued appoynted porcion euer geuē daylie kynge longe lyued ende fourth boke kynges first boke cronicles called paralipomenon boke conteyneth chap iii rehearsynge generacions chap iii dauid sonnes chap iiii register child iuda chap v register childrē simeō chap vi register rubenites chap vii register child leui chap viii child isachar ben iamin chap ix trybe ben iamin chap x nombre israelite caried awaye vnto babilon chap xi battayll philistynes agaynst saul sonnes chap xii dauid anoynted kynge kyngdome chap xiii dauids worthy men warre came vnto trybes chap xiiii trybes called fetched awaye arke chap xv hiram sendeth tymber vnto dauid dauids wyues ouercommeth philistynes chap xvi dauid appoynteth leuites beare arke chap xvii arke set tabernacle sacrifice thankesgeuynge chap xviii god forbyddeth dauid buylde temple kynges reigned lōde edom euer reigned eny kynge amonge child israel bel • sonne beor name cite dinhaba whan bela dyed iobab sonne serah bosra kynge steade whan iobab dyed h • sam ye londe themanites elieser elioenai amri ieremoth abia anathot alameh child becher rekened kinreds heades house father valeaunt men twentie thousande two hundreth child iedieel bilhan childrē bilhan ieus ben iamin ehud baera wyues hodes wyfe begat iobab zibea mesa malcham ieus sachia mirma child heades father husim begat ahitob elpaal childrē elpaal eber miseam samed buylded ono lod vyllages therof bria sama heades valeaunt men executynge offyce house god leuites child merari semaia sonne hasub2 esd 11 c sonne asrikam sonne hasabia bakbakar carpenter galal mathania ye sonne micha ye sonne sichri sonne assaph obadia sonne semaia sonne galal ye sonne elkana dwelt vyllages netophatites porter sallum acub talmon ahiman brother sallum chefest2 esd 11 c hither child leui kepte watch eastsyde kinges gate army sallum sonne core sonne abiassaph sonne corah brother father house corahytes worke seruyce kepe thresholdes tabernacle father hoost lorde kepe intraunce phineas sonne eleasar prynce ouer lorde bene sacharia sonne meselemia keper dore tabernacle witnesse chosen kepers thresholdes euen two hundreth twolue nombred vyllages dauid samuel seer foū ded thorow faith child shulde kepe house lorde namely kepe watch ye house tabernacle dorekepers appointed towarde foure wyndes towarde east towarde west towarde north num 3 • towarde ye south brethrē vyllages might come allwaye seuenth daye vnto foure maner chefe dorrkepers leuites committed ouersight chestes treasure ye house god nighte season also remayned aboute house god dewtye geue attendaunce open euery mornynge ouersight mynistrynge vessell bare vessell thē appoynted ouer vessell ouer holy vessell ouer fine wheate floure ouer ye wyne ouer oile ouer frankencense ouer swete odoures ye prestes child made exo 30 incense vnto mathithia one leuites fyrst sonne sallum corahite ye pannes cōmytted certayne kahathites brother appointed ouer shewbred prepare euery sabbath daye heades singer amō ge father leuites chosen ouer chestes daye night worke withall heades ye father amonge ye leuites kinreds dwelt ierusalem 1 par 9 gibeon dwelt ieiel father gibeon wiues name maecha fyrst sonne abdon zur ci baal ner nadab gedor ahaio sacharia mikloth mikloth begat simeam dwelt also aboute brother ierusalem amonge ner begat ci ci begat saul saul begat ionathas malchisua abinadab esbaal sonne ionathas meribaal meribaal begat micha child micha pithon melech thaherea ahas begat iaera iaera begat alemeth asmaueth simri simri begat moza moza begat binea whose sonne raphaia whose sonne eleasa whose sonne azel azel sixe sonnes whose name asrikam bochru iesmael searia obadia hanan child azel xi chapter philistynes foughte agaynst israel1 31 israel fled philistynes ye wounded fell vpon mount gilboa philistynes folowed vpon saul sonnes smote ionathas abinadab malchisua ye sonnes saul battayll sore agaynst saul archer came vpon wounded archer sayde saul vnto weapenbearer drawe thy swerde thrust thorow vncircumcysed come deale shamefully neuertheles weapenbearer wolde sore afrayed toke saul swerde fell therin whan weapenbearer sawe saul deed fell vpon swerde also dyed thus died saul thre sonnes housholde together whan men israel ye valley sawe saul sonnes deed lefte city fled philistynes came dwelt therin morowe came philistynes spoyle slayne founde saul 〈…〉 sonnes lyenge vpon mount gelboa stryped toke heade harnesse sent aboute ye londe philistynes caused shewed idoles people weapens layed house god styckte vp heade vpon house dagon whan iabes gilead herde euery thinge philistynes done vnto saul gat vp many men armes toke body saul sonnes broughte vnto iabes buryed bone vnder oke iabes fasted seuen dayes thus dyed saul trespace commytted agaynst lorde 〈…〉 kepte worde lorde 〈…〉 axed councell soythsayer axed lorde therfore slewe turned kyngdome vnto dauid xii chapter israel resorted dauid vnto hebron sayde beholde 〈…〉 ye bone thy flesh afore tyme whan saul reigned thou leddest israel lorde thy god hath sayde vnto thou shalt kepe people israel thou shalt prynce ouer people israel elder israel came kynge vnto hebron dauid made couenaunt hebron lorde anoynted dauid kynge ouer israel 〈…〉 acordynge worde lorde samuel dauid israel wēte vnto ierusalem iebus iebusites dwelt lōde citesyns iebus saide vnto dauid thou shalt come hither howbeit dauid wāne ye castell siō ye cite dauid dauid sayde 〈…〉 euer smyteth ye iebusites first shal prynce captayne thē ioab ye sonne zer • ia clymmed vp first made captayne dauid dwelt ye castell therfore called ye cite dauid buylded ye cite roūde aboute fro millo forth euery syde ye remnaunt ye cite ioab buylded repayred dauid wēte forth grewe lorde zebaoth wt ye chefe amōge ye mightie mē dauid dealt valeauntly wt kyngdome wt israel make kynge acordinge worde ye lorde ouer israel ye nombre dauids mightie men iesabeam sonne hachmoni chefest amōge thirtie lifte vp speare smote thre c one tyme eleasar sonne dodo ahohite amōge thre mightie man wt dauid whā blasphemed philistynes gathered thē selues ye batayll euē ther▪ pece londe full barly people fled philistynes stode myddes londe rescued smote philistynes lorde gaue greate health thre chefest thirtie wēte downe rocke vnto dauid caue adullam 〈◊〉 23 c philistynes hoost laye valley rephain dauid castell philistynes people bethleem dauid desyrous sayde wolde geue drynke water well bethleem vnder gate thē brake thre philistynes hoost drue water well bethleem vnder gate caried broughte vnto dauid neuertheles wolde drynke poured vnto lorde sayde god let farre fro yt shulde drynke bloude men ye parell life parell life haue broughte therfore wolde drynke dyd thre worthy abisai brother ioab chefest amonge thre lifte vp speare smote thre hundreth famous amonge thre thirde honorable two yet came vnto thre benaia sonne ioiada sonne ishail cabzeel2 23 • man greate actes smote two lyon moabites wente downe smote lyon myddes well tyme snowe smote man egipte also fyue cubites greate stature hande speare like weuers lome yet wente downe staffe toke speare hande slewe awne speare dyd benaia sonne ioiada famous man amonge thre worthy awncient amonge thirtie vnto thre came howbeit dauid made secrete councell valeaunt worthy asahel brother ioab elhanam vncles sonne bethleem samoth harodite helez pelonite ira sonne ekes thecoite abraser anathothite sibechai husathite ilai ahohite matheraithe netophatite heled ye sonne baena ye netophatite ithai ye sonne ribai gibeath childrē ben ianim benaia pirgathonite hura broke gaas abiel arbathite asmaneth baherunite eliahba saalbonite child hasem ye gisonite ionathas sonne sage hararite ahiam sonne sachar hararite eliphal sonne vr hepher macherathite ahia pelointe hezro carmel naerai sonne aszbai ioel brother nathan mibehar sonne hagri zeleg ammonite naherai berothithe wapenbearer ioab sonne zernia ira iethrite gareb iethrite vrias hethite sabad sonne ahalai adina sonne sisa rubenite captayne rubenites thirtie vnder hanam ye ieroham gedor gaddites resorted vnto dauid castell wyldernesse mightie worthy men armes hādled speares swerdes face like liōs swifte roe vpon ye mountaynes fyrst eser seconde obadia thyrde eliab fourth masmanna ye fyfth ieremia sixte athai seuēth eliel eight iohanna nyenth elsabad tenth ieremia ye eleuenth machbanai child gad heades hoost leest ouer hundreth ye greatest ouer thousande fyrst moneth wente ouer iordane whan full shore valley eauen towarde east towarde west came child ben iamin also iuda vnto castell dauid dauid wente forth vnto answered sayde vnto yf ye come peace helpe hert shal yf ye come vpō disceate mine aduersaries yet vnrighte god oure father loke vpon rebuke neuertheles sprete endued amasai captayne amonge thirtie sayde thine dauid holde thou sonne isai peace sayde vnto congregacion israel yf lyke yf lorde oure god let v sende forth euery syde oure brother countrees israel prestes leuites city haue suburbes yt maye gathered together vnto v let v fetch arke oure god agayne vnto v saul tyme axed thē sayde whole cōgregacion shulde done pleased people well dauid gathered israel together sihor egipte tyll man come vnto hemath fetch arke god kiriath iearim dauid wente vp wt israel kiriath iearim lieth iuda brynge thence arke god lorde sytteth vpō cherubins name named caused arke god caried vpō new cart house abinadab vsa brother droue cart dauid israel played strength god songes harpes psaltery tabrettes cymbales trompes whan came barne floore chidon vsa stretched hande holde arke ox wente asyde waxed wrath lorde fearce ouer vsa smote euer haue walked israel spake euer eny iudges israel commaunded kepe people sayde wherfore ye buylde house cedre tymber shalt thou speake vnto seruaunt dauid thus sayeth lorde zebaoth toke pasture behynde shepe thou shuldest prynce ouer people haue bene whither euer thou wētest haue roted thine enemy haue made name acordinge name greate men vpō earth people israel wyll appoynte place wyl plante maye dwell nomore remoued childrē wickednes shal oppresse nomore like afore tyme whan cōmaunded iudges ouer people israel wyl subdue thine enemy declare vnto lorde wyl buylde house • 7 c psal 111 b whan thy dayes fulfilled thou departest hence ye father wyl rayse vp ye sede shall euē one thy sonnes kyngdome wyl stabliszshe shal buylde house wyl make seate sure euer wyl father shal sonne wyl withdrawe mercy haue withdrawen frō wyll set house kyngdome euer seate shalbe sure euermore whā nathan spoken vnto dauid acordinge wordes vision kynge dauid came sat downe lorde sayde lorde god house yt thou hast broughte thus farre god hast thou thoughte yet litle hast spoken thy seruauntes house yet longe come thou lorde god hast loked downe vpon aboue euen one man loketh vpon another shal dauid saye vnto yt thou bryngest ye seruaunt soch honoure thou knowest thy seruaunt lorde thy seruauntes sake acordinge thy hert hast thou done greate thinges thou mightest shewe greate thinges vnto thy seruaunt lorde deut 32 f none lykel god thou haue herde oure eares deut 4 people vpon earth thy people israel god wente delyuer people make selfe name thorow greate terrible thinges cast heythen thy people thou hast delyuered egipte ye people israel hast thou made ye people euer thou lorde art become god lorde let worde verified euer thou hast spoken ouer thy seruaunt ouer house thou hast spoken let thy name endure magnified euer maye sayde lorde zebaoth god israel god israel house thy seruaunt dauid maye stablyszshed thou lorde hast opened eare ye seruaunt thou wilt buylde house therfore hath thy seruaunt founde confydence make prayer lorde thou art god hast promysed soch good vnto thy seruaunt begynne blesse house thy seruaunt maye euermore loke thou blessest lorde blessed euer xix chapter smote dauid philistynes subdued 〈…〉 toke gath vyllages therof hande philistynes smote moabites likewyse moabites subdued vnto dauid gaue trybute smote hadad eser also ye kynge zoba hemath whan wente set vp power water euphrates dauid toke thousande charettes seuen thousande horsmen twē tye thousande fote men dauid lamed charettes kepte hundreth charettes ouer syriās came damascon helpe hadad eser kynge zoba howbeit dauid smote two twentie thousande syrian layed men warre damascon syria syrian subdued vnto dauid broughte trybute lorde helped dauid whither euer wente dauid toke shyldes golde yt hadad esers seruaūtes broughte thē ierusalē tibehath chun city hadad eser toke dauid moch brasse 〈…〉 wherof salomon made brasen lauer pilers brasen vessel whā thogu kynge hemath herde 〈…〉 yt dauid smytten ye power hadad eser sent sonne hadorā vnto kynge dauid salute blesse foughtē wt hadad eser smyttē hī thogu warre wt hadad eser vessel golde syluer brasse dyd kynge dauid consecrate vnto lorde syluer golde taken heythē namely edomites moabites ammonite philistynes amalechites abisai sonne zeru ia smote eightene thousande edomites salt valley 〈◊〉 8 c layed mē warre edomea edomites subdued vnto dauid ye lorde helped dauid whither euer wente thus dauid reigned ouer israel executed iudgment righteousnes vnto people ioab sonne zeru ia captayne ouer hoost iosaphat sonne ahilud chaunceler sadoc sonne achitob ahimelech ye sonne abiathar prestes sauesa scrybe benaia sonne ioiada ouer chrethians plethians 〈◊〉 8 c dauids sonnes chefe ye kynges hande xx chapter dyed nahas ye kynge childrē ammon 〈◊〉 10 sonne kynge steade sayde dauid wil mercy vpon hanun sonne nahas father dyd mercy vpon sent messaungers comforte ouer father whā dauids seruauntes came londe child ammon vnto hanun comforte prynces child ammon sayde vnto hanun thinkest thou dauid honoureth thy father thy sighte hath sent cōforters vnto yee seruauntes come vnto search ouerthrowe spye londe toke hanun seruauntes dauid shoue cut halfe garmentes euē loynes let thē go wente waye sent men tell dauid neuertheles sent mete ye men put greate shame kynge sayde abyde iericho tyll youre beerdes growne come agayne whan childrē ammon sawe stynked ye sighte dauid hanun child ammon sent thousande talētes syluer hyre charettes horsmen mesopotamia maecha zoba hyred two thirtie thousande charettes ye kynge maecha people came pitched tentes medba child ammon gathered selues together city came battayll whan dauid herde sent ioab thither hoost men armes childrē ammon gone forth prepared selues battayll gate cite kynges yt come kepte asyde felde whā ioab sawe battayll agaynst behynde chose best yonge men israel prepared selfe agaynst ye syrian ye residue people put vnder hande abisai brother shulde prepare selues agaynst child ammon sayde yf ye syriās mightie helpe thou yf childrē ammon strōge ye shall helpe take good corage vnto let v quyte oure selues manly oure people city oure god neuertheles lorde pleaseth ioab made forth ye people fighte agaynst ye syrian fled whan child ammon sawe yt syrian fled fled also abisai brother wente cite ioab came ierusalem whan syrian sawe smyttē israel sent messaungers broughte forth ye syrian beyonde water sophach chefe captayne hadad eser wente whā tolde dauid gathered israel together wente ouer iordane whan came set ye battayll araye agaynst dauid prepared selfe ye battayll agaynst ye syrian foughte ye syriās fled israel dauid slewe syrian seuen thousande charettes fortye thousande fote men sophach chefe captayne slewe also whan hadad esers seruauntes sawe smyttē israel made peace wt dauid seruauntes syrian wolde helpe childrē ammon nomore xxi chapter whan ye yeare came aboute tyme ye kynges vse go forth2 11 • ioab broughte power hoost destroyed londe child ammon came layed sege vnto rabba dauid abode ierusalem 2 1 • • ioab smote rabba brake downe dauid toke kynges crowne heade founde weighte talent golde theron precious stone set vpō dauids heade moch spoyle caried cite people therin broughte thē forth parted sunder wt sawes hokes betel yron thus dyd dauid vnto ye city childrē ammon dauid departed againe people vnto ierusalem afterwarde arose warre gasar philistynes sibechai ye husathire smote sibai one child rephaim subdued arose warre agayne wt philistynes thē elhamah ye sonne iair smote lahemi ye brother goliath ye gathite whose speares staff life weeuers l • afterwarde battayll gath man greate stature yt sixe fyngers sixe toe make foure twentye borne also rapha spake despytefully vnto israel ionathas sonne simea dauids brother smote childrē rapha gath fell thorow ye hande dauid seruauntes xxii chapter sathan stode agaynst israel entysed dauid nombre israel 〈◊〉 24 dauid sayde vnto ioab ye ruler people go yor waye nombre israel berseba vnto dan brynge nombre thē maye knowe ioab sayde lorde make people hundreth tymes mo lorde kynge lordes seruauntes doth lorde axe therafter wherfore shal trespace come vpon israel neuertheles kynges worde preuayled agaynst ioab ioab wente forth walked thorow israel came ierusalem delyuered vnto dauid ye nombre people tolde israel thousande tymes thousande hundreth thousande men drue swerde iuda foure hundreth thousande seuētye thousande men drue swerde leui ben iamin nombred amonge kynges worde abhominable vnto ioab displeased god righte sore smote israel dauid sayde vnto god haue synned greuously haue done take awaye trespace thy seruaunt haue done vnwysely lorde spake vnto gad dauids seer sayde go speake dauid saye thus saieth lorde thre thinges laye chose ye one yt maye vnto whā gad came dauid spake vnto thus sayeth lorde chose ye ether thre yeare derth thre monethes flye thine aduersaries swerde thine enemy yt maye ouertake thre dayes ye swerde lorde pestilēce londe yt angell lorde maye destroye ye coastes israel loke answere shal geue vnto yt sent dauid sayde vnto gad greate trouble yet wyl rather fall ye hande lorde mercy exceadynge greate wil fall handes men dyd lorde cause pestilence come israel fell israel thre score ten thousande mē god sent angell ierusalē destroye euen destruccion lorde considered repēted euell sayde vn angell ye destroyer ynough holde thy hande angell lorde stode besyde ye barne arnan ye iebusite dauid lifte vp eye sawe angell ye lorde stondinge betwene heauē earth naked swerde hande stretched ouer ierusalem dauid ye elder beynge clothed sack cloth fell vpō face dauid sayde vnto god caused people nombred hath synned done euell shepe haue done▪ lorde god let thine hande agaynst agaynst father house agaynst thy people plage angell sayde vnto gad shulde speake vnto dauid dauid shulde shulde go vp set vp altare barne arnan iebusite dauid wente vp acordinge ye worde gad spake name lorde whā arnan turned sawe angell foure sonnes hyd thēselues arnan throszshed wheate whan dauid came arnan arnan loked aware dauid wēte forth barne worshipped dauid face grounde dauid sayde vnto arnan geue rowme barne buylde altare vnto lorde therin ye full money shalt thou geue plage maye ceasse people arnan sayde vnto dauid take vnto let lorde kynge pleaseth beholde oxe geue burnt offerynge vessel oxe wheate meat offerynge geue neuertheles kynge sayde vnto arnan ye full money wyl bye thine wyl take lorde offre burnt offerynge naughte dauid gaue arnan ye rowme sixe hundreth sycles golde weight buylded dauid altare vnto ye lorde offred burnt offerynges slayn offerynges whan called vpō lorde herde thorow fyre heauē vpon ye altare burnt offerynge ye lorde sayde vnto angell shulde put swerde sheeth tyme whā dauid sawe lorde herde vpon corne floore arnan ye iebusite dyd sacrifice ye habitacion ye lorde moses made wyldernes altare burnt offerynges tyme hye place gibeon dauid coulde go thitherto seke god feared swerde lordes angell dauid sayde 〈◊〉 3 shal ye house god ye lorde altare burnt offerynges fo • israel xxiii chapter dauid cōmaunded gather together straungers ye londe israel appoynted mason hewe stone buyldinge house god dauid prepared moch yron nales dores porte soch thinges naled together moch brasse weyed cedre tree innumerable zidon tyre brought dauid moch cedre tymbre dauid thoughte salomō sonne childe tender house shal buylded vnto lorde shal greate name prayse maye exalted londes therfore wyl prouyde dauid made greate prouysion death called salomon sonne commaunded buylde house lorde god israel sayde vnto sonne 〈◊〉 7 minded buylde house vnto name lorde god worde ye lorde came vnto sayde thou hast shed moch bloude strycken many battayls therfore shalt thou buylde house vnto name moch thou hast shed moch bloude vpon earth beholde sonne shal borne vnto shal quyete man wyl cause rest al enemy euery syde name shalbe salomon wyll geue peace rest vpon israel longe lyueth shal buylde house vnto name shal sonne wyll father wyl stablyshe ye seate kyngdome vpō israel euer sonne lorde shal wyth thou shalt prospere thou mayest buylde house vnto lorde thy god acordynge hath spoken lorde also shal geue wyszdome vnderstondynge shal commytte israel vnto thou mayest kepe lawe lorde thy god shal thou prospere yf thou take hede ordynaunces lawes lorde commaunded moses vnto israel stronge take good corage vnto feare faynt harted beholde haue pouerte prouyded house lorde hundreth thousande talentes golde thousande tymes thousande talentes syluer brasse yron without nombre moch tymbre stone haue prepared thou mayest get therof thou hast many workman also meson carpenter stone tymber maner men haue vnderstondinge worke golde syluer brasse yron without nombre yet get vp doynge lorde shal dauid commaunded ruler israel helpe salomon sonne sayde lorde youre god hath geuen rest euery syde hath delyuered inhabiters londe youre handes londe subdued lorde people geue ouer youre hert therfore youre soule seke lorde youre god get vp buylde sanctuary vnto lorde god arke couenaunt lorde holy vessel god maye brought house shalbe buylded vnto name lorde dauid made salomon sonne kynge ouer israel whan himselfe olde lyued ynough xxiiii chapter dauid gathered ruler israel together prestes leuites nombre ye leuites thirtie yeare olde aboue ye nombre thē strōge men frō heade heade eight thirtie thousande foure twentie thousande dyd diligence worke ouer ye house lorde sixe thousande officer iudges foure thousande porter foure thousande songe prayses vnto ye lorde instrumentes made synge prayse dauid made ordinaunce amonge child leui namely amōge gerson kahath merari gersonites vnder lorde promysed multiplye israel starres szkie 1 par 22 howbeit ioab sonne zeruia begonne nombre perfourmed came wrath vpon israel cause therfore came nombre ye cronicles kynge dauid ouer kynges courtes haue chosen sonne wil father wyll stablishe kyngdome euer yf constant commaundementes lawes daye sight israel congregacion lorde eares oure god se ye obserue seke commaundemētes lorde yo god ye maye possesse good londe ye youre child maie haue ye inheritaunce therof euer thou sonne salomō knowe thou god thy father serue thy hert desyre thy soule lorde searcheth hertes vnderstondeth thoughtes ymaginacions yf thou seke thou shalt fynde yf thou forsake shall refuse euer take hede lorde hath chosen buylde house sāctuary stronge make dauid gaue salomon sonne • patrone porche house celles perlers ynnermer chā bers house mercyseate mynde namely courte lordes house oratory rounde aboute treasure ye house god treasure soch thinges halowed ordinaunces prestes leuites ye busynesse offyces house lorde golde gaue ye golde weigh • maner vessel euery offyce siluer ornamentes weight maner vessell euery offyce weigh • golden candilstickes golden lampes euery candilstycke lampes weight likewyse siluer candilstickes gaue weight candilsticke lampes acordynge requyred euery candilstycke gaue golde also ye table shewbred euery table weight▪ syluer lykewise syluer table pure golde fleshokes b • sen censor golden cuppes vnto euery cuppe weight • uer cuppes vnto euery cuppe weighte altare incense weighte pure golde patrone charett golden cherubins mighte sprede selues couer arke couenaunt lorde geuen wrytinge hande lorde make vnderstonde workes patrone dauid sayde vnto salomō sonne thou manly stronge make feare fayntharted lorde god god shal shall withdrawe hande ner fayle tyll thou haue fynished euery worke seruyce house lorde beholde course prestes leuites offyces house god euery worke willinge haue wisdome offyces haue prynces people euery thinge thou hast xxx chapter kynge dauid sayde vnto congregacion god hath chosen salomon one sonnes yet yonge tender worke greate man palace lorde god yet haue abilite prep • red vnto house god golde vessel golde syluer syluer brasse brasse yron thē yron wod wod onix stone set rubyes stone dyuerse coloures precious stone marble stone multitude besydes good wyl yt haue house god haue myne awne proper good thre talētes golde ophir seuen talētes pure syluer geue vnto holy house god besyde yt haue prepared ouerlaye ye walles house yt ought golde maye golde ought syluer maye syluer maner worke hande craftesmen fre wyllinge fyll hande daye vnto lorde prynces father ye prynces trybes israel captaynes ouer thousandes ouer hundred ruler ouer kynges busynes fre wyllinge gaue ye mynistracion house god fyue talentes golde ten gulden ten talentes syluer eightene talētes brasse hundred talētes yron euer foū de stone gaue treasure house lorde vnder hāde iehiel gersonite ye people glad fre wyllinge gaue wt good wyll euen hert vnto lorde dauid also ye kynge reioysed greatly praysed god sayde whole congregacion praysed thou lorde god israel oure father vnto belongeth worshippe power glory victory thankes heauen earth thine thine ye kyngdome thou art exalted aboue prynces thine rich honoure ye thou reignest ouer thy hande consisteth power might thy hāde make euery man greate stronge thāke oure god prayse ye name thy glory people shulde able fre wyll offre done commeth thy hande haue geuen 〈◊〉 47 b 〈◊〉 11 c pilgrems straū gers oure father oure life vpon earth shadowe abydinge lorde oure god abundaunce haue prepared buylde house vnto thy name came thy hande thine alltogether knowe god thou tryest hert vnfaynednes acceptable vnto therfore haue geuē vnfayned hert euē good wyll haue ioye se thy people present offre fre wyll vnto lorde god oure father abraham isaac israel kepe thou euermore soch purpose thoughtes ye hertes thy people prepare thou hertes vnto graunte sonne salomon perfecte hert maye kepe thy cōmaundementes thy testimony thy statute maye buylde palace haue prepared dauid sayde vnto whole cōgregacion prayse lorde yor god cōgregacion praysed ye lorde god father bowed selues worshipped lorde kynge offred sacrifice vnto lorde ye nexte morow offred burnt offerynges bullockes rāmes lābes wt drynk offerynges plenteously offred amonge israel ate dranke daie lorde greate ioye made salomon sonne dauid kynge ye seconde tyme anoynted ye prynce lorde • reg • sadoc prest 3 2 • thus sat salomon vpon seate ye lorde kynge father steade prospered israel obeyed ye ruler mightie men kynge dauids child submytted themselues vnto kynge salomon ye lorde made salomon excellent greate ye sighte israel 3 4 gaue soch glorious kyngdome none ouer israel dauid bene kynge ouer israel ye tyme kynge ouer israel fortye yeares hebron reigned seuen yeare ierusalem thre thirtie yeare dyed good age full dayes rich honoure salomon sonne kynge steade actes kynge dauid ye first last beholde wrytten amonge actes samuel seer amonge actes prophet nathan amō ge actes gad seer kyngdome power tymes passed vnder vpon israel vpon kyngdomes earth ende first boke buylde faszshion chap iiii ornamentes temple chap v arke broughte temple c chap vi salomon speaketh vnto people prayseth god beseketh heare soch make prayer temple chap vii fyre commeth heauen consumeth sacrifice kynge people offre lorde appeareth vnto salomon promyseth heare chap viii salomon buyldeth city subdueth heythen captaynes wife chap ix quene saba bringeth presentes vnto salomon receaueth giftes salomon dyeth chap x roboam oppressynge people maketh fall awaye chap xi lorde wil suffre roboam kynge iuda bē iamin fighte agaynst israel buyldeth city chap xii roboam forsaketh lawe lorde kynge egipte commeth vpon lorde delyuereth chap xiii abia ieroboam warres chap xiiii xv kynge asa chap xvi baesa cōmeth vp asa agreeth therfore rebuked chap xvii reigne iosaphat chap xviii iosaphat maketh frendshippe achab helpeth fight chap xix iehu rebuketh iosaphat helpynge vngodly iosaphat amendeth lyueth well chap xx moabites ammonite syrian edomites go forth agaynst iosaphat prayeth vnto god helpeth chap xxi iosaphat dyeth ioram sonne made kynge slayeth brother forsaketh lorde edom falleth awaye iuda god punysheth ioram chap xxii ochosias made kinge taketh parte achabs sonne chap xxiii ioiada maketh ioas kynge commaundeth slaye athalia chap xxiiii whyle ioiada lyueth kynge ioas doth well death forsaketh lorde zacharias reproueth cōmaundeth stone death awne seruauntes kyll vpon bed chap xxv kynge amasias smyteth edomites worshippeth idol therfore prophet reproueth wyll nedes fight kynge israel ouercommeth taketh chap xxvi kynge osias wyse called vsia azarias buyldinges became leper presumpcion chap xxvii iothams reigne buyldinges warres chap xxviii wicked kynge achas chap xxixxxxxxxi verteous kynge ezechias noble actes chap xxxii sennacherib layeth sege ierusalem ezechias comforteth people sennacherib threateneth lorde delyuereth iuda ezechias sicke recouereth chap xxxiii reigne manasses amendment wickednes kynge ammon sonne chap xxxiiiixxxv reigne vertuous actes kynge iosias death chap xxxvi thre monethes reigneth ioachas reigneth eliachim wyse called ioachim nabuchodonosor carieth vnto babilon steade reigneth ioachim sonne thou hast done greate mercy vnto father dauid • nd hast made kynge steade lorde god let ye worde thou hast p • omysed vnto father dauid verified 〈…〉 thou hast made kynge ouer people many nō bre dust vpon earth graunte wyszdome therfore knowlege yt maye go people able iudge greate people thine sayde god vnto salomon moch thou art mynded hast desyred rich ner good ner honor ner soules thine enemy ner longe life hast requyred wyszdome knowlege iudge people ouer haue made kynge wyszdome therfore knowlege geuen morouer rich good honoure wyll geue soch one thou hath bene amōge kynges nether shal came salomon hye place gibeon vnto ierusalē ye tabernacle witnesse 〈…〉 reigned ouer israel salomon gathered charettes horsmen thousande foure hundreth charettes twolue thousande horsmen appoynted charet city kynge ierusalem kynge broughte passe moch syluer golde ierusalē stone many ceders molberyes tree valley horse broughte vnto salomon egipte kynges marchauntes fetched kena moneye came vp broughte egipte charet sixe hūdreth syluer pēs horse hundreth fiftye thus broughte also vnto kynges hethites kynges ye syrian ii chapter salomon thoughte buylde house vnto name lorde house kyngdome tolde thre score ten thousande men beare burthen foure score thousande hewed tymber vpō mount thre thousande sixe hundreth officer ouer 〈◊〉 5 salomon sent vnto hiram kynge tyre sayenge 〈…〉 thou dyddest father sendedst ceder tree builde house dwell euen thou wt also beholde wyl buylde house vnto name lorde god sanctifie burne good incense allwaye prepare ye shewbred burnt offerynges mornynge euenynge sabbathes new mones solempne feastes ye lorde oure god euermore israel house wyl buylde shal greate oure god greater goddes able buylde house heauen heauens heauens maye cōprehende shulde buylde house onely intent burne incense sēde therfore wyse mā worke golde syluer brasse yron scarlet purple yalow sylke soch one graue carued worke wyse men iewry ierusalem father dauid ordeyned sende tymber ceder pyne tre costly wodd libanus knowe ye seruauntes hewe tymber vpon libanus beholde seruauntes shalbe ye seruauntes prepare moch tymber house wyl buylde shalbe greate maruelous goodly beholde wyl geue vnto carpenter thy seruauntes hewe tymber twētye thousande quarter beaten wheate twentye thousande quarter barlye twentye thousande batthes wyne twentye thousande batthes oyle sayde hiram kynge tyre wrytinge sent vnto salomon lorde loueth people therfore hath made ye kynge ouer hiram sayde morouer praysed ye lorde god israel made heauen earth hath geuē kynge dauid wyse prudent sonne soch one hath vnderstondinge buylde house vnto lorde house realme therfore sende wyse man hath vnderstondynge 3 • b euen hiram abi sonne woman doughters dan father tyre worke golde syluer brasse yron stone tymber scarlet yalowe sylke lynnen purple carue maner thinges make cō nynge thinge euer geuen thy wyse men wyse men lorde kynge dauid ye father let lorde sende wheate barlye oyle wyne vnto seruaūtes acordinge hath sayde wyll hewe ye tymber vpon libanus moch thou nedest wyll brynge flotes see vnto iapho whence thou mayest brynge vp ierusalem salomon nombred straungers londe israel acordinge nombre whan dauid father nombred founde hundreth fiftye thousande thre thousande sixe hū dreth made thre score ten thousande beares burthen foure score thousande hewer vpō ye mount thre thousande sixe hundreth ouerseers helde ye people worke iii chapter salomon beganne buylde house lorde ierusalem vpon mount moria • par • 2 shewed vnto dauid father dauid prepared rowme vpon corne floore arnan iebusite seconde daye seconde moneth fourth yeare reigne begāne buylde layed salomon foundacion buylde house god first length thre score cubytes bredth twentye cubites porche wydenes house twentye cubites longe height hundreth twentye ouerlayed ynsyde pure golde greate house syled pyne tre ouerlayed best golde made palme tree throwne worke theron ouerlayed house precious stone beutifye golde golde paruaim balkes postes aboue walles dores ouerlayed golde caused cherubins carued walles made also house holy whose length twentye cubites acordinge wydenesse house bredth twentye cubites likewyse ouerlayed best golde sixe hundreth talentes nales gaue fiftye sicles golde weight ouer layed chamber golde made also house holy two cherubins carued worke ouerlayed golde length wynges cherubins one wynge fyue cubytes touched wall house wynge fyue cubytes also touched wynge cherub euen one wynge cherub fyue cubites likewyse touched wall house wynge fyue cubites also touched wynge cherub wynges cherubins spred twentye cubites wyde stode vpō fete face turned house warde made vayle also yalow sylke scarlet purple lynworke made cherubins theron house made two pilers fyue thirtie cubites longe knoppes aboue theron fyue cubytes made throwne worke quere put aboue vpon pilers made hundreth pomgranates put wrythren worke set vp pilers temple one righte honde lefte righte honde called iachin lefte honde called boo iiii chapter made brasen altare also twentye cubytes longe twentye cubytes brode ten cubites hye 〈…〉 made molten lauer ten cubites wyde frō one syde rounde aboute fyue cubytes hye metelyne thirtie cubites mighte comprehende aboute ymages bullockes vnder aboute lauer ten cubites wyde two rowes knoppes yt molten withall stode vpon bullockes thre turned towarde north thre towarde west thre towarde south thre towarde east lauer aboue vpon hynder partes ynsyde thicknesse hand bredth edge like edge cuppe floured rose conteyned thre thousande batthes made ten kettels wherof set fyue righte hande fyue lefte waszshe soch thinges belonged burnt offerynge mighte thrust therin ye lauer made prestes wash ten golden candelstickes made also ought set temple fyue righte hande fyue lefte made ten table set temple fyue righte hande fyue lefte made hundreth basens golde made courte likewyse prestes greate courte dores courte ouerlayed ye dores brasse lauer set righte syde towarde south east hiram made cauldrous shouels basens hiram fynished worke made kynge salomon house god namely two pilers roundel knoppes aboue vpon pilers wrythen rope couer roundel ye knoppes aboue vpō pilers foure hundreth pomgranates wrythē rope two rowes pomgranates euery rope couer roundel knoppes aboue vpon pilers made stole also ye kettels vpon stole lauer twolue bullockes vnder pottes shouels fleshokes vessel made hiram abif pure metall kynge salomon vnto house lorde coaste iordane dyd kynge cause molten thicke earth betwene suchoth zaredatha salomon made vessel many weight ye metall soughte salomen made ornamentes house god namely golden altare table shewbreds theron candelstickes lampes pure golde burne quere acordinge maner floures lampes snoffers golde pure golde knyues basens spones pottes pure golde intraunce dores within vnto holy dores house temple golde thus ye worke fynished salomon made house lorde v chapter salomon broughte yt father brynge vp arke couenaunt lorde cite dauid sion resorted vnto kynge men israel feast seuenth moneth ye elder israel came ye leuites toke arke broughte vp tabernacle witnesse 〈…〉 holy vessel tabernacle ye prestes leuites broughte vp kynge salomon cōgregacion israel gathered vnto arke offred shepe ox many man coulde nombre ner reken thus prestes broughte arke ye couenaunt lorde vnto hir place quere house euen ye holy vnder wynges cherubins cherubins spred wynges ouer place arke cherubins couered arke staues therof aboue staues longe yt knoppes sene arke quere outsyde sene vnto daye nothinge arke saue two table moses put therin horeb whan lorde made couenaunt childrē israel tyme departed egipte whan prestes wente sanctuary ye prestes founde sanctified selues course kepte leuites vnder asaph heman iedithun child brother beynge clothed lynnen songe cymbales psaltery harpes stode towarde east parte altare hundreth twentye prestes blewe wt trompettes yf one dyd trompet synge though voyce bene herde praysinge geuynge thankes vnto lorde whan voyce arose ye trompettes cymbales instrumentes musick praysinge lorde gracious mercy endureth euer house lorde fylled ynsyde cloude yt prestes coulde stonde mynister cloude glory lorde fylled house god vi chapter sayde salomon lorde sayde3 reg • wolde dwell darck cloude haue buylded house habitacion vnto seate yt thou mayest dwell euer kynge turned face blessed congregacion israel whole cōgregacion israel stode sayde praysed lorde god israel promysed mouth vnto father dauid hande hath fulfylled whā sayde 2 7 〈◊〉 8 c sē ce tyme broughte people londe egipte haue chosen cite ye trybes israel buylde house name nether haue chosen eny man prynce ouer people israel • par 7 c ierusalem haue chosen name dauid haue electe prynce ouer people israel whan father dauid mynded buylde house vnto name lorde god israel lorde sayde vnto dauid father thou wast mynded buylde house vnto name thou hast done well howbeit thou shalt buylde house thy sonne shall come thy loynes shal buylde house vnto name thus hath ye lorde perfourmed worde spake come vp father dauids steade syt vpon seate israel euen lorde sayde haue buylded house vnto name ye lorde god israel haue put ye arke wherin couenaunt ye lorde made childrē israel stode altare lorde presence whole congregacion israel spred handes salomon made brasen pulpit set myddes courte fyue cubites longe fyue cubites brode thre cubites hye vpon stode fell downe vpon knee presence whole cōgregacion israel helde handes towarde heauē sayde • reg 8 c lorde god israel god like nether heauen ner vpon earth thou kepest couenaunt mercy thy seruauntes walke hert thou hast kepte promes wt father dauid thy seruaunt thy mouth thou saydest thy hande hast thou fulfylled come passe daye lorde god israel make good vnto father dauid yi seruaunt thou hast promysed sayde thou shalt want man syt vpon seate israel yf thy child kepe waye yt walke lawe like thou hast walked lorde god israel let yi worde verified thou hast promysed vnto dauid thy seruaunt thinkest thou god dede dwelleth amonge men vpon earth • sa 66 • 23 • cto 7 e beholholde heauen ye heauens heauens maye cōteyne shulde house haue buylded turne vnto prayer thy seruaunt supplicaciō lorde god thou mayest heare thankesgeuynge prayer thy seruaunt maketh thine eye open ouer house daye night euen ouer place wherin thou saydest thou woldest set thy name thou mayest heare prayer thy seruaunt shall make place heare therfore intercession thy seruaunt thy people israel euer shall desyre place heare thou place thy habitacion euē heauen whan thou hearest mercifull whan eny mā synneth agaynst neghboure ooth put vpon ought sweare ooth commeth thine altare house heare thou heauen se yt thy seruaunt haue righte thou rewarde vngod • recōpence waye vpon awne heade iustifye righteous geue acordinge righteousnes whan thy people israel smyttē enemy whyle haue synned agaynst yf turne vnto knowlege thy name make prayer intercession house • heare thou heauen mercifull vnto synne thy people israel brynge agayne londe yt thou hast geuen father 〈…〉 whan heauen shut vp rayne moch haue synned agaynst yf make prayer place knowlege thy name turne synnes whan thou hast brought lowe heare thou heauen mercifull vnto synne thy seruauntes thy people israel thou mayest teach good waye wherin shulde walke let rayne vpon thy londe thou hast geuen thy people possesse whan derth pestilence drouth ••• blastinge greshopper catirpiller londe whan enemye layeth sege porte lōde whan eny plage disease happeneth euer thē maketh prayer peticion amonge eny maner men amonge thy people israel yf eny man fele plage disease spredeth handes vnto house heare thou heauen euen ye 〈…〉 seate thy habitacion mercifull geue euery man acordinge wayes moch thou knowest hert thou onely knowest hert child men maye feare waye walke thy wayes longe lyue londe thou hast geuen vnto oure father whan eny straunger thy people israel commeth farre countre thy greate name mightie hande stretched arme commeth make prayer house heare thou heauē euen seate thy habitacion ye straunger calleth vpō nacions vpon earth maye knowe thy name feare thy people israel maye knowe yt house haue buylded named thy name whan thy people go forth ye battayll agaynst enemy waye thou shalt sende shall praye vnto 〈◊〉 6 b towarde waye cite thou hast chosen towarde house haue buylded vnto thy name heare thou thē prayer peticion heauen helpe righte whan synne agaynst 〈◊〉 1 b man synneth thou wroth geue ouer enemyes cary awaye captyue countre farre nye yf turne within hertes londe presoners conuerte make intercession vnto londe captiuyte saye haue synned done amysse haue bene vngodly turne selues vnto ye hert soule londe captiuyte wherin presoners make prayer towarde waye owne londe thou gauest vnto father towarde ci • e thou hast chosen towarde house haue buylded vnto thy name heare thou prayer supplicacion heauen euen seate thy dwellynge helpe righte mercifull vnto thy people haue synned agaynst god let thine eye opē let thine eares geue hede vnto prayer place 〈◊〉 • 31 aryse lorde god vnto thy restinge place thou arke thy strength let thy prestes feast seuen dayes also thre twentyeth daye seuenth moneth let people go vnto tentes ioyfull mery hertes good lorde done vnto dauid vnto salomō people israel thus fynished salomō house ye lorde kinges house yt came hert make house lorde awne house prosperously lorde appeared vnto salomon nighte season sayde vnto haue herde thy prayer • par • chosen place vnto selfe house sacrifyce beholde whan shut heauē yt raine commaunde greshopper cō sume londe cause pestilence come amonge people humble people named name yf praye seke face turne euell wayes thē wyl heare heauen wyll forgeue sinne heale londe shal myne eye open myne eares shal attente vnto prayer place thus haue chosen house sanctifyed name maye euer myne eye hert shal allwaye yf thou walke thy father dauid walked thou commaunde kepe myne ordinaū ce lawes wyll stablishe seate thy kyngdome acordynge promysed thy father dauid sayde thou shalt wante man lorde ouer israel yf ye turne backe forsake myne ordynaunces commaundemētes haue layed go youre waye serue goddes worshippe thē wyll rote • ome 〈◊〉 • hem londe haue geuen house haue sanctifyed vnto name wil cast awaye presence geue ouer byworde fabell amōge nacions euery one goeth shall astonnyed hye house shall hysse saye • eu 2 • 〈◊〉 22 wherfore hath lorde dealte thus londe house shall sayde euen haue forsaken lorde god father brought londe egipte haue cleued vnto goddes worshipped serued thē therfore hath brought euell vpon thē viii chapter twentye yeares wherin salomon buylded house lorde awne house buylded cyties also hiram gaue vnto salomon
