fynished house lorde prepared wente salomon vnto ezeon geber 〈…〉 vnto eloth see syde londe edomea hiram sent shippes seruauntes knowlege see wente salomōs seruauntes vnto ophir fetched thence foure hundreth fyftye talentes golde broughte vnto kynge salomon ix chapter whan quene rich arabia herde fame salomon 〈…〉 came greate tryne ierusalem camel bare spyces golde precious stone proue salomon darke sentence whan came vnto salomon spake vnto deuysed hir mynde kynge tolde hir matter salomon nothinge secrete tolde whan quene riche arabia sawe wyszdome salomon ye house buylded meates table dwellinges seruauntes ye office mynisters garmentes butler apparell parler wente vp house lorde coulde longer refrayne sayde vnto kynge true haue herde londe thy behaue oure thy wyszdome howbeit wolde beleue wordes tyll came selfe sawe myne eye beholde halfe thy greate wyszdome hath bene tolde ye fame haue herde happye thy men happie thy seruauntes yt allwaye stonde heare thy wyszdome praysed lorde thy god soch pleasure vnto hath set vpon seate kynge vnto lorde thy god thy god loueth israel set vp euer therfore hath ordeyned yt kynge ouer thou shuldest mayntayne iustice equyte gaue ye kynge hundreth twentye talentes golde moch spyce precious stone mo soch spyces quene riche arabia gaue vnto kynge salomō hirams seruauntes seruauntes salomon broughte golde ophir broughte costly tymber also precious stone costly tymber dyd salomon cause make stare house lorde kynges house harpes psaltery musician soch tymber sene londe iuda kynge salomon gaue quene riche arabia desyred axed moch broughte vnto kynge returned departed hir londe hir seruauntes golde broughte vnto salomon one yeare sixe hundreth sixe thre score talentes besydes ye chap men marchauntes broughte kynges arabian lordes ye londe broughte golde syluer vnto salomon kynge salomon made two hundreth speares beaten golde yt sixe hundreth peces beaten golde came vpō one speare thre hundreth shildes beaten golde thre hundreth peces beaten golde came one shylde kynge put thē house wod libanus kynge made greate seate yuery ouerlaied pure golde seate sixe steppe fotestole golde festened vnto seate two leanynge postes vpon sydes seate two lyon stode beside leanynge postes stode twolue lion vpō syxe steppe side realmes hath soch one bene made kynge salomon drynkynge vessel golde vessel house wod libanus pure golde syluer rekened nothinge salomon tyme kynges shippes wente vpon see seruauntes hirā came thre yeare brought golde syluer yuery ape pecockes thus kynge salomon greater kynges vpon earth rich wisdome kynges ye earth desired se salomon face heare wysdome god geuen hert brought yearly euery mā present iewels siluer golde raymēt harnesse spyces horse mule salomon foure thousande charethorses twolue thousande horsmen • 4 • put charetcities kynge ierusalem lorde ouer kynges water vnto londe philistynes coaste egipte kynge brought passe moch syluer ierusalem stone many ceders molbery tree valley horse broughte vnto egipte countres saye salomon first last beholde writtē cronicles prophet nathan prophecy ahia silo ye actes ieddithe seer ioroboā ye sonne nebat salomō reigned ierusalē ouer israel fortie yeares salomon fell slepe wt father buried cyte dauid father roboā sonne kīge ī steade x chapter eoboam wente vnto sichem israel come vnto sichem • 12 make kinge whan ieroboā sonne nebat herde egipte • •• g whither fled kynge salomon came agayne egipte sent called ieroboam came israel spake roboam sayde thy father made yocke greuous make thou lighter ye harde bondage thy father ye heuy yocke layed vpon v wyll submytte oure selues vnto sayde vnto come agayne ouer thre dayes ye people wente waye roboam kynge axed coūcell elder stonde salomon father whyle lyued sayde youre councell maye geue people answere spake vnto sayde yf thou louynge vnto people deale gently geue good wordes shal allwaye obedient vnto neuerthelesse forsoke councell elder geuen toke councell yt yonge men growne vp wt stode sayde vnto thē youre councell maye answere people haue spoken vnto saide make oure yock lighter yt thy father layed vpon v yongemen yt growne vp spake vnto sayde thus shalt thou saye vnto people haue talked spoken thy father made oure yock heuy make thou yock lighter thus shalt thou saye vnto litle finger shalbe thicker father loynes yf father hath layed heuy yock vpon wyl make youre yock father chastened wt scourge wyl beate scorpion whan ieroboam people came roboam thirde daye acordynge ye kinge sayde come againe thirde daie kynge gaue thē harde answere roboā kynge forsoke ye councell elder spake vnto thē ye yonge men councell sayde yf father haue made yor yock heuy wil make yet heuyer father chastened wt scourge wyl beate wt scorpiōs thus kynge folowed ye people minde determyned god yt ye lorde might stablishe worde • 11 e spake ahia silo vnto ieroboā ye sonne nebat whan israel sawe kynge wolde consente vnto them▪ ye people answered kynge sayde porcion haue dauid inheritaū ce sonne isai let euery man israel get tent loke thou thy house dauid israel wente vnto tentes roboam reigned ouer child israel dwelt city iuda roboam sent forth adoram rent gatherer child israel stoned death kynge roboā strengthed himselfe vpon charet flye vnto ierusalem thus fell israel awaie frō house dauid vnto daye xi chapter whan roboam came ierusasalem gathered together house iuda ben iamin euen hū dreth foure score thousande chosen men armes fyghte agaynst israel mighte brynge kyngdome agayne vnto roboam ye worde lorde came semaia man god sayde speake roboam sonne salomon kynge iuda israel yt iuda ben iamin saye thus sayeth lorde ye shal go vp ner fyght agaynst youre brother let euery man go home agayne dede herkened vnto wordes ye lorde wēte forth agaynst ieroboā roboā dwelt ierusalem buylded vp stronge city iuda namely bethleē etan tekoa bethzur socho adullā gath maresa siph adoraim laches aseka z • rega aialon hebron fensed city iuda ben iamin made stronge set prynces therin prouyded vytayles oyle wyne city prepared shildes speares made stronge iuda ben iamin vnder prestes leuites also came vnto israel border therof lefte suburbes possession camt iuda vnto ierusalem ieroboam sonnes expelled shulde execute offyce ye presthode vnto ye lorde himselfe foū ded prestes ye hye place felde deuels calues caused make came men trybes israel gaue ouer hertes seke ye lorde god israel came ierusalē offre vnto lorde god father strengthed ye kingdome iuda mātayned roboam sonne salomon thre yeare longe walked ye waye dauid salomon thre yeares roboam toke mahelath ye doughter ieremoth ye sonne dauid wife abihail doughter eliab ye sonne isai bare sonnes ieus semaria saham toke maecha doughter absalom bare abia athai sisa selomith roboam loued maecha doughter absalom better wyues concubynes eightene wyues thre score cō cubynes begat eight twentye sonnes thre score doughters roboam set abia sonne maecha heade prynce amonge brother thoughte make kynge wyse mightie sonnes countrees iuda ben iamin stronge city gaue plenteousnes fode desyred many wyues xii chapter bvt whā kyngdome roboam confirmed stablyshed forsoke lawe lorde israel fyfth yeare roboam wēte sisack kynge egipte vp agaynst ierusalem transgressed agaynst lorde thousande two hundreth charettes thre score thousande horsmen people innumerable came egipte libya • chim ethiopia wanne strōge city iuda came ierusalem came semaia ye prophet vnto roboam ye ruler iuda gathered together ierusalem sisack sayde vnto thus sayeth ye lorde ye haue lefte therfore haue lefte also sisacks hande thē ruler israel kynge submytted selues sayde lorde righteous whā lorde sawe yt hūbled themselues ye worde lorde came semaia sayde haue humbled selues therfore wyl destroye wyl geue litle delyueraunce indignacion fall vpon ierusalem sisack shalbe subdued vnto yt maye knowe serue serue kyngdomes worlde thus wēte sisack kynge egipte vp ierusalem toke treasure house lorde treasure kynges house caried awaye toke shyldes golde 3 par 9 b salomon caused make steade wherof kynge roboā made shyldes stele commytted thē vnto chefe fotemen kepte dore kynges house oft kynge wente house lorde ye fote men came bare brough • • hem againe ye fote men chāber moch submytted himselfe ye wrath ye lorde turned frō destroied yet good iuda thus roboam kinge stablished ierusalem reigned one fortye yeare olde roboam whā made kynge reigned seuentene yeare ierusalem cite 2 par 7 b lorde chosen trybes israel set name mother name naemaan ammonitisse euell prepared hert seke lorde actes roboam fyrst last wrytten actes semaia prophet iddo seer noted warres roboam ieroboam together longe lyued roboam fell slepe father buryed cite dauid abia sonne kynge steade xiii chapter eightenth yeare kynge ieroboam abia kynge iuda reigned thre yeare ierusalem mother name michaia doughter veiel gibea warre betwene abia ieroboam abia prepared himselfe battayll foure hū dreth thousande stronge chosen men warre ieroboam made himselfe ready fight agaynst wt eight hundreth thousande chosen men strength abia gatt vp vpon hyll zemaraim lyeth vpon mount ephraim sayde herken vnto thou ieroboam israel knowe ye lorde god israel hath geuen dauid ye kyngdome israel euer vnto sonnes salt couenaunt ieroboā sonne nebat seruaunt salomon dauids sonne gat vp fell awaye lorde resorted vnto vagaboundes child belial haue strengthed selues roboā sonne salomō roboam yonge fearfull hert coulde resiste thinke ye set youre selues kyngdome lorde amonge sonnes dauid moch greate multitude haue ye golden calues • 12 yt ieroboam made goddes • pa 11 haue ye expelled prestes lorde child aaron leuites haue made prestes youre awne euen people londes euer commeth fyll hande yonge bullocke seuen rammes shal preste vnto goddes v ye lorde oure god whō forsake prestes minister vnto lorde child aaron leuites busines euery mornynge euery euenynge kyndle burnt offerynges vnto lorde swete incense prepare shewbred vpō pure table golden candilsticke lampes kyndled euery euenynge wayte vpō lorde oure god ye haue forsaken beholde god captayne oure hoost v prestes num 10 blowynge trompettes trompe agaynst ye child israel fight agaynst lorde god yor father ye shal prospere neuertheles ieroboam made preuy watch euery syde come vpon behynde iuda ye preuy watch behynde whā iuda turned beholde battayll thē behynde cryed vnto ye lorde prestes tromped trompettes whā euery man iuda gaue shoute god plaged ieroboam israel abia iuda child israel fled iuda god gaue handes abia people dyd greate slaughter vpon fell wounded israel fyue hundreth thousande chosen men thus child israel subdued tyme child iuda comforted put trust ye lorde god father abia folowed vpon ieroboam wanne city frō bethel vyllages therof iesana wt hir vyllages ephron village therof ieroboam came nomore strength longe abia lyued lorde smote dyed whan abia strengthed toke fourtene wyues begat two twentye sonnes sixtene daughter saye abia wayes doynges wrytten storye prophet iddo abia fell slepe father buryed 〈◊〉 cite dauid asa sonne 〈◊〉 steade tyme londe 〈◊〉 rest ten yeares xiiii chapter asa dyd good • right sighte lorde god put awaye straunge •• tare hye place brake p • ler hewed downe groues sayde vnto iuda shulde seke lorde god father ye lawe commaundementes hye place ymages put awaye 〈◊〉 city iuda kyngdome ha • rest builded strōge city iuda whyle londe quietnes whyle warre agaynst 〈◊〉 yeares ye lorde gaue rest sayde vnto iuda let v buylde vp city fense rounde abo • te walles towres porte barres londe yet v haue soughte • e lorde oure god hath geuen v rest euery syde buylded wente prosperously thē ▪ asa hoost mē bare •• de speares iuda thre c thousande ben iamin two hūdreth fo • score thousande bare shyldes coulde shute wt bowes mightie stronge men serah moryan came thē wt hoost thousande time thousande thre hundreth charettes came vnto maresa asa wente forth agaynst prepared selues battayll valley zephat • beside maresa asa called vpon ye lorde god sayde 〈…〉 lorde differēce wt ye helpe fewe many helpe v lorde oure god oure trust thy name come forth multitude lorde oure god let man preuayle agaynst lorde smote moriās asa iuda fled asa ye people folowed vpon vnto gerar moriās fell none remained alyue smytten lorde hoost caried exceadinge moch spoyle thence smote cyties aboute gerar fearfulnesse lorde came vpon spoyled city moch spoyle smote tentes catell also toke many shepe camel came agayne ierusalem xv chapter sprete god came vpō asarias sonne obed wente forth asa sayde vnto heare asa iuda ben iamin lorde whyle ye yf ye seke wylbe founde yf ye forsake shal forsake also neuertheles shal many dayes israel 〈…〉 shalbe true god prest teach lawe whan turne trouble vnto lorde god israel seke shalbe founde tyme shall well goeth shal greate vproures vpon yt dwell earth one people shall smyte another one cite another god shal vexe wt maner trouble ye stronge let youre handes feble youre worke hath rewarde whan asa herde wordes propheciēge asarias sonne obed prophet toke corage vnto put awaye abhominacions ye londe iuda ben iamin city wonne vpon mount ephraim renued lordes altare stode porche lorde iuda ben iamin gathered selues together straungers ephraim manasses simeon fell many vnto israel whan sawe lorde god resorted vnto ierusalem thirde moneth fyftenth yeare reigne asa daye offred vnto lorde spoyle broughte seuen hū dreth ox seuen thousande shepe entred ye couenaunt wolde seke lorde god father hert soule euer wolde seke ye lorde god israel shulde dye small greate man woman sware vnto lorde loude voyce shoutinge trompettes shawmes iuda glad ouer ooth sworne hert soughte whole wyll founde lorde gaue rest euery syde asa ye kynge put downe mother mynistracion founded groue vnto miplezeth asa roted hir miplezeth beate sunder brent broke cedron hye place put downe israel yet hert asa perfecte longe lyued loke father halowed selfe halowed broughte ye house god syluer golde ornamētes warre vnto fyue thirtieth yeare reigne asa xvi chapter sixe thirtieth yeare ye reigne asa3 15 c wente baesa kynge israel vp agaynst iuda buylded rama let asa kynge iuda yt shulde go asa toke forth treasure house lorde syluer golde kynges house sent vnto benadad ye kynge syria dwelt damascon caused saye vnto couenaunt betwene betwene father thy father therfore haue sent ye syluer golde thou mayest breake ye couenaunt baesa kynge israel maye departe fro benadad herkened vnto kynge asa sent hoost agaynst city israel smote eio • dan abel maim corne city nephtali whan baesa herde lefte buyldinge rama ceassed worke kynge asa toke iuda vnto caried awaye ye stone tymber wherwith baesa buylded buylded geba mizpa withall tyme came hanani seer vnto asa kynge iuda sayde vnto thou hast trusted vnto kynge syria put thy trust lorde thy god therfore power kynge syria escaped thy hāde 2 par 14 c moryans lybians greate multitude exceadinge many charettes horsmen yet gaue lorde thy hande whan thou dyddest put thy trust eye lorde loke rounde aboute londes strength yt hert thou hast done vnwysely therfore shalt thou haue warre hēce forth asa wroth ye seer put preson murmured ouer thinge asa oppressed certayne people ye tyme actes asa first last holde wrytten boke ye kynges iuda israel asa diseased fete nyne thirtieth yeare reigne endured ther ouer eccli 3 • b nether soughte lorde sicknesse trusted vnto phisicians thus fell asa slepe father dyed one fortieth yeare reigne buried awne sepulcre caused grauen selfe cite dauid layed vpon bed fylled swete odoures maner spyces made ye apotecaries craft made greate burnynge xvii capter iosaphat sonne kynge steade waxed mightie israel put men warre stronge city iuda set officer londe iuda city ephraim asa father wonne lorde wt iosaphat walked olde wayes father dauid soughte baalim god father walked commaundementes • workes israel therfore dyd lorde stablyshe kyngdome hāde iuda gaue presentes vnto iosaphat greate rich worshippe whan hert coraged wayes lorde put downe styll hye place groues iuda thirde yeare reigne sent prynces benhail obadia zacharias nethaneel michaia teach city iuda leuites semaia nethania sebadia asahel semiramoth ionathan adonia tobia tob adonia ye prestes elisama ioram taughte iuda boke lawe ye lorde wt wente aboute ye city iuda taughte people feare lorde came vpon ye kyngdomes countrees laye aboute iuda yt foughte agaynst iosaphat philistynes broughte presentes trybute syluer vnto iosaphat arabian broughte seuen thousande seuen hundreth rammes seuen thousande seuen hundreth goates thus increased iosaphat grewe euer greater buylded castels corne city iuda dyd moch city iuda valeaunt mightie men ierusalem ye ordinaunce thorow house father ruler ouer thousandes iuda 〈…〉 captayne wt thre hūdreth th ••• sande mightie men nexte vnto ••• hanan ye chefe two h ••• dreth foure score thousande nexte 〈◊〉 amasia sonne sichri fre ••• linge ye lorde two hundreth thousande valeaunt men child ben iamin eliada mightie man two hundreth thousande ready bowes shyldes nexte vnto iosabad hundreth foure score thousande harnessed men warre ••• ted vpon kynge besydes kynge layed strōge city thor •• iuda xviii chapter iosaphat greate rich worshippe made frendshippe 〈◊〉 achab 〈…〉 two yeares wente downe achab vnto samaria achab caused many shepe oxē slayne ye people counceled go vp vnto ramoth gilead achab kynge israel sayde vnto iosaphat kynge iuda go vnto ramoth gilead sayde vnto thou people thy people wyll go vnto battayll iosaphat sayde vnto kynge israel axe councell praye daye worde lorde kynge israel gathered prophetes together euen foure hundreth men saide vnto them▪ shal go battayll vnto ramoth gilead shal let alone sayde go vp god shal delyuer kynges hāde iosaphat sayde ye • one prophet lorde yt maye axe kynge israel sayde vnto iosaphat yet one man maye axe ye lorde hate prophecieth good allwaye euell namely micheas sonne iemla iosaphat sayde let kynge saye kynge israel called one chamberlaynes sayde brynge hither soone micheas sonne iemla kynge israel iosaphat kynge iuda sat either vpon seate arayed garmentes euen place dore porte samaria sat ye prophetes prophecied sedechias sonne cnaena made horne yron sayde thus sayeth lorde shalt thou puszshe syrian tyll thou brynge naughte prophetes prophecied likewyse sayde go vp vnto ramoth gilead thou shalt prospere ye lorde shal delyuer kynges hande messaunger wente call micheas spake vnto sayde beholde ye wordes prophetes one acorde good kynge let thy worde praye one speake thou good also micheas sayde truly lorde lyueth loke god sayeth vnto yt wyl speake whan came kynge kynge sayde vnto micheas shulde go vnto ramoth gilead battayll shulde let alone saide go vp ye shal prospere shal geuē youre handes ye kynge sayde vnto charge ye yet agayne thou tell nothinge ye trueth name lorde saide sawe israel scatered abrode vpō mountaynes shepe yt haue shepherde lorde sayde haue lorde let euery one turne home agayne peace thē sayde kynge israel vnto iosaphat dyd tell yt wolde prophecie good euell sayde therfore heare ye worde lorde 〈…〉 sawe lorde syt vpon seate hoost heauen stondinge righte hande lefte lorde sayde wo wyll disceaue achab kynge israel maye go vp fall ramoth gilead whan one sayde thus another came forth sprete stode ye lorde sayde wyl disceaue lorde sayde vnto wherwith sayde wyll go forth false sprete mouth prophetes sayde thou shalt disceaue shalt able go thy waye beholde 〈◊〉 4 b lorde hath geuen false sprete mouth thy prophetes lorde hath spokē euell agaynst stepte forth sedechias sonne cnaena smote micheas vpon cheke sayde waye sprete ye lorde departed fro speake thorow micheas sayde beholde thou shalt se whan thou commest ye ynmost chamber hyde kynge israel sayde take micheas let remayne wt amon ruler cite ioas sonne melech saye thus sayeth kynge put man preson fede wt bred water trouble tyll come agayne peace micheas saide yf thou commest agayne peace hath lorde spoken thorow sayde herken ye people kynge israel iosaphat ye kynge iuda wente vp vnto ramoth gilead ye kynge israel sayde vnto iosaphat chaunge thy clothes come battayll thine araye ye kynge israel chaunged rayment came battayll kynge syria commaunded ruler charettes ye shal fighte nether agaynst small ner greate onely agaynst kynge israel whan ruler charrettes sawe iosaphat thoughte ye kynge israel wēte aboute fighte agaynst iosaphat cryed lorde helped god turned whan ruler charettes sawe ye kynge israel turned back certayne man bended bowe harde shot kynge israel betwene mawe longes thē sayde vnto charet man turne thine hāde cary hoost wounded battayll sore daye kynge israel stode vpon charet agaynst syrian vntyll euenynge dyed whā sonne wente downe xix chapter bvt iosaphat kynge iuda came home agayne peace vnto ierusalem iehu ye sonne hanani seer wēte forth mete sayde vnto kynge iosaphat shuldest thou helpe vngodly loue hate lorde cause ye wrath vpō lorde neuertheles good founde thou hast put groues londe hast prepared thine hert seke god iosaphat abode ierusalem wente agayne amonge people berseba vnto moūt ephraim broughte agayne lorde god father set iudges thorow londe stronge city iuda certayne euery cite sayde vnto iudges take hede ye ye execute iudgment man lorde iudgmēt therfore let feare lorde bewarre lorde oure god vnrighteousnes ner respecte personnes ner acceptinge giftes ierusalem dyd iosaphat ordeyne certayne leuites prestes awnciēt father israel ye iudgment lorde ouer matter lawe caused dwell ierusalem commaunded sayde se ye thus feare lorde faithfulnes perfect hert cause come vnto youre brother dwell city betwene bloude bloude betwene lawe commaundement betwene statute ordinaunces ye shal enforme yt synne lorde wrath come vpon youre brother thus ye shal offende beholde amaria prest chefe ouer cause ye lorde sabadia sonne ismael prynce house iuda kynges matter ye haue officer likewyse leuites take good corage vnto doynge lorde shalbe good xx chapter came childrē moab child ammon certayne amanim wt fighte iosaphat came tolde iosaphat sayde cōmeth greate multitude agaynst beyonde see syria beholde hazezon thamar engaddi iosaphat afrayed set face seke ye lorde caused fast proclamed iuda iuda came together seke lorde ye city iuda came seke lorde iosaphat stode amōge ye cōgregacion iuda ierusalem house ye lorde new courte sayde lorde god oure father art thou god heauen hast domynion kyngdomes heythen thy hande strength power man withstōde hast thou god expelled inhabiters londe thy people israel hast geuē vnto sede abraham thy louer euer haue dwelt haue buylded sanctuary vnto ye name therin sayde yf come eny plage swerde iudgmēt pestilence derth vpon v wyll stonde house euen thy name house wyll crye vnto oure trouble thou shalt • shalt saue v beholde child ammon moab mount seir vpon 〈…〉 thou woldest suffre child israel go whan wente londe egipte fayne departe thē destroye beholde deale contrarely v come thrust v inheritaunce thou hast geuen v possession oure god wylt thou iudge v strength withstonde greate multitude commeth agaynst v knowe shulde oure eye loke vnto iuda stode lorde child wyues sonnes vpon iehasiel sonne zacharias sonne benaia sonne iehiel sonne mathania leuite ye child assaph came sprete lorde myddes congregacion sayde geue hede thou iuda ye inhabiters ierusalem thou kynge iosaphat thus sayeth lorde vnto ye afrayed nether feare ye greate multitude ye fighte god tomorow shal ye go downe vnto thē beholde go vp si ye shal fynde reed see broke wyldernes ieruel ye shall fighte cause ye steppe forth stonde se health lorde feare iuda ierusalem afrayed tomorow go ye forth agaynst lorde shal thē iosaphat bowed selfe wt face earth iuda inhabiters ierusalem fell lorde worshipped lorde leuites ye childrē kahathites child corahites arose prayse lorde god israel wt loude voyce hye gat vp early ye mornynge wēte forth wyldernesse thekoa whan goynge iosaphat stode sayde herkē vnto iuda ye indweller ierusalē put youre trust lorde yor god ye shal safe geue credence vnto prophetes ye shall prospere gaue councell vnto ye people appoynted syngers vnto ye lorde gaue prayse bewtye holynes go harnessed mē saye geue thankes vnto lorde mercy endureth euer whan beganne geue thankes prayse 〈◊〉 7 f 〈◊〉 14 c lorde caused hynder watch come agaynst iuda come vpon childrē ammon moab mount seir smote stode child ammon moab agaynst mount seir damne destroye whan destroyed mount seir one helped another destroye selues also whan iuda came mispa vnto wyldernes turned towarde multitude beholde deed body laye vpō earth none escaped iosaphat came people deuyde spoyles founde amonge moch goodes rayment precious iewels toke coulde beare thre dayes deuydinge spoyle moch fourth daye came together valley blessynge blessed lorde therfore place called valley blessinge vnto daye euery man iuda ierusalem turned back agayne iosaphat go ierusalē ioye ye lorde geuen gladnesse enemy entred ierusalem psaltery harpes trompettes vnto house lorde came feare god ouer kyngdomes londes whan herde lorde foughte agaynst ye enemy israel thus ye kyngdome iosaphat quyetnes god gaue rest euery syde iosaphat reigned ouer iuda fyue thirtie yeare olde whan made kynge reigned fyue twentye yeare ierusalem mother name asuba doughter silhi walked waye father asa departed asyde doynge yt righte sighte lorde sauynge ye hye place put downe people yet prepared hert god father saye iosaphat first last beholde wrytten actes iehu ye sonne hanani noted vp boke kynges israel • •• g afterwarde dyd iosaphat kynge iuda agree wt ahasia kynge israel vngodly doynges agreed make shippes go vpon see made shippes ezeon gaber elieser sonne dodana maresa prophecied agaynst iosaphat sayde thou hast agreed ahasia therfore hath lorde broken thy workes ye shippes broken mighte go vpon see xxi chapter iosaphat fell slepe wt father 3 2 • buried wt father cite dauid ioram sonne kynge steade brethrē sonnes iosaphat asaria iehiel zacharias asaria michael sephatia child iosaphat kynge iuda father gaue many giftes syluer golde iewels wt stronge city iuda kyngdome gaue vnto ioram first borne whan ioram came vp ouer father kyngdome gotten power slewe brethrē swerde certayne ruler also israel 4 •• two thirtie yeare olde ioram whan made kynge reigned eight yeare ierusalē walked waye ye kynges israel euen house achab dyd achabs doughter wife dyd euell sighte lorde neuertheles ye lorde wolde destroie house dauid couenauntes sake 2 •• made wt dauid acordinge sayde yt wolde geue child lanterne euermore ye tyme fell ye edomites awaye iuda made kynge ouer selues ioram gone ouer captaynes charettes gotten vp night season slayne edomites euery syde ruler charettes therfore fell ye edomites awaye iuda vnto daye ye tyme fell lybna awaye also forsoke lorde god father made hye place also mountaynes iuda caused ierusalē go awhorynge disceaued iuda came wrytinge vnto frō prophet elia sayenge thus sayeth lorde god thy father dauid thou hast walked wayes thy father iosaphat nether ye wayes asa kynge iuda walkest waye kynges israel makest iuda ierusalem go awhorynge whordome house achab hast slayne thy brother also thy father house better thē thou beholde lorde shal smyte wt greate plage thy people thy child thy wyues thy substaunce thou thy selfe shalt haue moch sicknesse thy bowel tyll thy bowel go forth daye daye disease ye lorde raysed vp agaynst ioram sprete philistynes arabian lye besyde morians wente vp iuda waysted caried awaye substaunce founde kynges house sonnes wyues yt one sonne lefte saue ioahas yōgest sonne dyd ye lorde smyte bowel soch sicknesse coulde healed whyle endured daye daye whan tyme two yeares expyred bowel wente wt sicknesse dyed euell disease made burninge ouer dyd vnto father two thirtie yeare olde whā made kynge reigned eight yeare ierusalē walked well buried cite dauid amōge sepulcres kynges xxii chapter ierusalem made ochosias yōgest sonne kynge steade 〈◊〉 8 men warre came wt hoost arabian slayne ye first therfore reigned ochosias sonne ioram kynge iuda two fortye yeare olde ochosias whan made kynge reigned one yeare ierusalem mother name athalia doughter amri walked also ye wayes house achab mother entysed yt vngodly therfore dyd euell ye sighte lorde euen ye house achab councell geuers father death destroye walked councell wente ioram sonne achab kynge israel battayll vnto ramoth gilead agaynst hasael kynge syria syriās smote ioram yt turned back healed iesreel woundes geuen rama whan foughte hasael kynge syria 〈…〉 asarias sonne ioram kynge iuda wēte downe vyset ioram ye sonne achab iesreel laye sicke ordeyned god vnto ochosias shulde come ioram go forth ioram agaynst iehu ye sonne nimsi 〈…〉 lorde anoynted rote house achab whan iehu wolde auēged ye house achab founde certayne ruler iuda ye childrē ochosias brother serued ochosias slewe 〈…〉 soughte ochosias ouertoke whā hyd samaria broughte vnto iehu slewe buried sayde sonne iosaphat soughte ye lorde hert man house ochosias mighte kynge whan athalia mother ochosias sawe yt hir sonne deed gat hir vp 〈…〉 destroyed kynges sede house iuda iosabeath ye kynges sister toke ioas ye sonne ochosias stale awaye frō amonge kynges childrē yt slayne put norse chamber thus iosabeath kynge iorams douhgter wyfe ioiada prest hyd athalia yt slayne ochosias sister hyd house god sixe yeares moch athalia quene londe xxiii chapter bvt seuenth yeare ioiada bolde 〈…〉 toke ruler ouer hundred namely asaria ye sonne ieraham ismael ye sonne iohanan asaria ye sonne obed maeseia ye sonne adaia elisaphat ye sonne sichri couenaunt wente aboute iuda broughte ye leuites together city iuda chefe father israel come vnto ierusalem cōgregacion made couenaunt kynge house god sayde vnto beholde kynges sonne shal kynge 〈…〉 euē lorde spake cō cernynge child dauid therfore yt ye shal thirde parte entre sabbath shalbe amonge prestes leuites dorekepers thresholdes one thirde parte kynges house one thirde parte grounde porte people shalbe courtes house lorde man go house lorde excepte prestes leuites mynister shal go halowed let ye people wayte vpon lorde leuites shal get rounde aboute ye kynge euery one weapen hande el goeth ye house let dye shall wt kynge whā goeth leuites iuda dyd ioiada ye prest commaunded euery one toke men entred sabbath wt yt wente sabbath ioiada ye prest suffred two company parte asunder ioiada ye prest gaue captaynes ouer hundred speares shyldes kynge dauids weapens house god set people euery one wt weapen hande righte corner house vnto lefte corner altare house warde aboute kynge broughte forth kynges sonne set crowne vpon heade gaue 〈◊〉 17 wytnesse made kynge ioiada wt sonnes anoynted sayde god saue kynge whan athalia herde noyse ye people yt ranne together praysed ye kynge wente forth people ye house lorde loked beholde ye kynge stode place ye intraunce ruler trompettes aboute ye kynge people londe glad blewe trompes syngers yt coulde playe wt maner musicall instrumentes rēte hir clothes sayde sedicion sedicion neuertheles ioiada ye prest gat forth captaynes ouer hundred ruler hoost sayde vnto brynge forth betwene ye walles euer foloweth shal slayne ye swerde prest cōmaunded shulde slayne ye house lorde layed handes whan came intraunce horsgate kynges house put death ioiada made couenaunt betwene people kynge yt shulde people lorde wē te people house baal destroyed brake downe altares ymages slewe mathan prest baal altare ioiada appoynted ye officer house lorde amōge prestes leuites 〈…〉 dauid ordeyned ye house lorde offre burnt sacrifice vnto ye lorde wrytten 〈…〉 lawe moses wt ioye songes made dauid ye porter set ye gate ye house ye lorde yt none shulde entre defiled wt eny maner thinge toke captaynes ouer hūdreds mightie men lordes ye people people londe brought kinge downe house lorde broughte thorow hye porte kynges house caused kinge sit vpon seate royall people lōde glad cite rest athalia slayne swerde xxiiii chapter ioas seuen yeare olde whan made kynge4 12 • reigned fortie yeare ierusalē mother name zibea berseba ioas dyd right sight lorde longe ioiada prest lyued ioiada gaue two wiues begat sonnes doughters afterwarde deuysed ioas renue house lorde gathered together prestes leuites sayde vnto thē go forth vn city iuda gather money israel repayre ye house god yearly righte soone leuites made haist kynge called ioiada pryncipall sayde vnto lokest thou vnto leuites yt bringe iuda ierusalem ex 50 b colleccion moses seruaunt lorde appoynted gathered amōge israel tabernacle witnes yt vngodly athalia hir sonnes haue waisted house god halowed house lorde haue bestowed baalim commaunded kynge make chest set without intraunce house lorde caused proclamed iuda ierusalē shulde bringe lorde collecciō moses seruaūt god appointed vnto israel ye wildernes thē ye ruler glad ye people brought cast chest tyll full whan tyme yt leuites shulde brynge arke ye kinges cōmaundement whan sawe yt moch money therin came kinges scrybe yt appoynted chefe prest emptyed chest caried againe place thus dyd euery daye gathered moch money together ye kinge ioiada gaue vnto ye workmasters ye house lorde hired mason carpenter repayre house ye lorde men coulde worke yron brasse repayre house ye lorde labourer wrought ye repairinge ye worke wente forwarde thorow hande set house god bewtye made stronge whan perfourmed brought resydue money kynge ioiada wherof made vessel house lorde vessel ministracion burnt offeringe spones ornamentes golde siluer offred burnt offerynges allwaye house lorde longe ioiada lyued ioiada waxed olde lyued longe ynough dyed hundreth thirtie yeare olde whan dyed buried cite dauid amonge kynges done good vnto israel towarde god house death ioiada came ruler iuda worshipped kynge consented kynge vnto thē forsoke house lorde god father serued ye groues ymages came ye wrath lorde vpō iuda ierusalem trespace yet sent prophetes vnto thē yt shulde turne vnto lorde testified vnto thē wolde heare sprete god came vpon • 23 c zachary sonne ioiada prest stode ouer ye people sayde vnto thē thus sayeth god wherfore ye transgresse cōmaundementes lorde shall yor prosperite ye haue forsaken ye lorde therfore shal forsake neuertheles conspyred agaynst stoned ye kynges cōmaundement ye courte house • lorde ioas ye kinge thought mercy yt ioiada father done slewe sonne notwithstondinge whā dyed sayde lorde shal loke vpon requyre whan yeare gone aboute ye power syrian wente vp came iuda ierusalem destroyed ruler people sent spoiles vnto damascon power syrian came fewe men yet gaue ye lorde greate power hande forsaken ye lorde god father executed iudgment also vpon ioas whan departed frō lefte greate sickness neuertheles seruauntes conspyred bloude childrē ioiada prest slewe vpō bed dyed buryed cite dauid amonge sepulcres kynges conspyred sabad ye sonne simeath ammonitisse iosabad sonne simrith moabitisse sonnes summe gathered vnder buyldinge house god beholde wrytten storye boke kynges amasias sonne kynge steade xxv chapter fyue twentye yeare olde amasias whan made kynge reigned nyne twentye yeare ierusalem mother name ioadan ierusalem dyd yt right sighte lorde wt whole whan kingdome strēgth slewe seruaūtes slayne kinge father childrē slewe wrytten boke lawe moses 〈…〉 lorde cō maundeth sayeth father shal dye child nether shal child dye father euery one shal die awne synne amasias broughte iuda together set father house ruler ouer thousandes ouer hundred amonge iuda ben iamin nombred twentye yeare olde aboue founde thē thre hundreth thousande chosen men able go forth warre caryed speares shyldes israel appoynted hundreth thousande stronge men warre hundreth talentes siluer came man god vnto sayde kynge let hoost israel come wt lorde israel nether childrē ephraim yf thou commest shewe ye boldnes battaill god shal make fall thine enemy god hath power helpe cause fall amasias sayde vnto man god shal done ye hundreth talentes yt haue geuē ye soudyers israel mā god sayde lorde hath yet thē geue amasias separated men warre come ephraim yt shulde departed vnto place waxed wrath whote agaynst iuda wente agayne vnto place wrothfull displeasure amasias strēgthed himselfe caried people wente forth salt valley smote ten thousande child seir childrē iuda toke ten thousande thē alyue broughte vp toppe mountayne cast thē downe headlinges toppe mount barst sunder ye childrē men warre amasias sent awaye agayne shulde go battayll people fell city iuda samaria vnto beth horon smote thre thousande mē toke moch spoyle whan amasias came agayne slaughter edomites broughte goddes child seir made goddes worshipped brent incense vnto lorde wroth amasias sent vnto prophet sayde vnto sekest thou goddes people coulde delyuer folke ye hande whan talked kynge sayde vnto haue made ye kynges councell ceasse wilt thou smytten prophet ceassed sayde perceaue lorde mynded destroye ye thou hast done herkenest vnto councell 〈◊〉 14 b amasias ye kynge iuda toke coū cell sent vnto ioas sonne ioahas ye sonne iehu kynge israel sayēge come let v se one another ioas kynge israel sent vnto amasias ye kynge iuda sayenge hawthorne libanus sent vnto ye cedre tre libanus sayēge geue thy doughter vnto sonne wife wylde beest libanus ranne ouer ye haw thorne trode downe thou thinkest beholde haue smytten edomites therfore thine hert proude boaste byde home stryuest thou mysfortune thou mayest fall iuda wt neuertheles amasias consented broughte passe god yt mighte geuen handes enemy soughte goddes ye edomites wente ioas kynge israel vp sawe one another amasias kynge iuda beth semes lyeth iuda iuda smyttē israel fled euery one vnto tent ioas kynge israel toke amasias ye kynge iuda sonne ioas ye sonne ioahas beth semes broughte ierusalem brake downe wall ierusalē ye porte ephraim vnto corner porte euē foure hundreth cubites longe toke golde siluer ornamentes foū de ye house god obed edom treasure kynges house childrē pledge vnto samaria amasias sonne ioas kynge iuda liued death ioas sonne ioahas kynge israel fiftene yeare saye amasias first last beholde written ye boke kynges iuda mother name iechalia ierusalem right syght lorde father amasias done soughte god longe zacharias lyued taughte visyons god longe sought lorde god made prospere wente forth foughte agaynst philistynes brake downe ye walles gath walles iabne walles aszdod buylded city aboute aszdod amonge philistynes god helped agaynst philistine arabian agaynst gur baal agaynst meunites ye ammonite gaue osias presentes name came egipte exceadinge stronge osias buylded towres ierusalem vpon cornerporte valley gate corner made stronge buylded castels also wyldernesse dygged many welles many catell medewes playnes huszbandmen also wynegardeners mountaynes carmel delyted huszbandaye osias hoost men warre goynge forth battaill nō bred vnder hande ieiel scrybe maesa offycer vnder hāde hanania kynges ruler nombre chefe father amonge stronge mē warre two thousande syxe hundreth vnder hande hoost thre hundreth thousande seuen thousande fyue hundreth mete battayll strength armye helpe kinge agaynst enemy osias prepared hoost shyldes speares helmettes brestplates bowes slyngstones ierusalē made ordinaunce cōningly vpon towres pynnacles shute arowes greate stone fame came farre abrode specially helped tyll became mightie whan power greate hert arose awne destruccion trespaced agaynst lorde god wente temple lorde burne incense vpon altare incense asarias prest wente foure score prestes valeaunt men withstode kynge osias saide vnto 〈◊〉 18 belongeth vnto thy offyce osias burne incense vnto lorde vnto prestes belongeth euen vnto child aaron halowed burne incense go forth sanctuary thou offendest shall worshippe vnto god lorde osias wroth censoure hande 〈◊〉 4 • b whyle murmured prestes leprosy spronge foreheade presence prestes house lorde altare incense asarias chefe prest turned heade towarde dyd prestes beholde leper foreheade put thence yee made haist himselfe go forth plage came lorde thus became osias ye kynge leper vnto death dwelt full leprosye fre house put house lorde ioram sonne ouersight kynges house iudged people l • nde saie osias first last esay sonne amos hath wrytten osias fell slepe wt father buryed father pece grounde beside ye kynges sepulcres sayde leporous iotham sonne kynge steade xxvii chapter iotham fyue twentye yeare olde whan made kynge • 15 f reigned sixtene yeare ierusalem mother name ierusa daughter sadoc dyd righte sighte lorde osias father sauynge yt wente temple lorde people yet marred selues buylded hye porte house ye lorde wall ophel buylded moch buylded city vpon mountaynes iuda woddes buylded castels towres fought kinge child ammon ouer came childrē ammon gaue ye yeare hundreth talentes siluer ten thousande quarter wheate ten thousande barlye moch dyd child ammon geue also ye seconde thirde yeare thus became iotham mightye gyded wayes lorde god saye iotham warres vnd way beholde wrytten ye boke kinges israel iuda fyue twentye yeare olde whan made kynge reigned sixtene yeare ierusalē iothā fell slepe wt father buryed cite dauid achas sonne kynge steade xxviii chapter achas twentye yeare olde whan made kynge 〈…〉 reigned sixtene yeare ierusalem dyd righte sighte lorde dauid father walked wayes kinges israel made molten ymages vnto baalim brent incense valley child hennon brēt awne sonnes ye fire 〈…〉 abhominacions heithen whō lorde expelled childrē israel dyd sacrifice brent incense vpon hye place vpon hilles amō ge grene tree therfore dyd lorde god delyuer hande kynge syria smote caryed awaye greate multitude men presoners broughte damascon geuen also vnder hande kynge israel yt dyd greate slaughter vpon pecah sonne romelia smote iuda hundreth twentye thousande one daye valeaunt men euē forsaken ye lorde god father sichri mightie mā ephraim slewe maeseia ye kinges sonne asri • prynce house el • ana nexte vnto kynge child israel caried brother presoners two hundreth thousande wemen sonnes doughters toke greate spoyle broughte spoyle vnto samaria euē prophet ye lorde whose name obed wē te mete ye hoost came samaria sayde vnto beholde lorde god youre father wroth iuda therfore hath geuen ouer youre handes ye haue slayne abhominably come vnto heauē thinke ye subdue child iuda ierusalem bondman bond maydens vnto trespace wt agaynst lorde yor god herken vnto sende ye presoners hence agayne ye haue caried awaye youre brother wrath ye lorde fearce ouer gat vp certayne chefe child ephraim asarias sonne iohanan barachias sonne mesillemoth ezechias sonne sallum amasa ye sonne hadlai agaynst yt came ye battayll sayde vnto ye shal brynge presoners hither youre mynde make v trespace lorde make oure synnes offence greater trespace moch allready wrath fearce ouer israel hoost lefte presoners spoyle ye ruler whole cōgregacion stode vp men rehearced name toke presoners many naked amonge clothed ye spoyles deckte put shues vpon fete gaue thē eate drynke anoynted caried vpon ass many feble broughte iericho ye palme cite vnto brother came agayne samaria 〈…〉 tyme sent kynge achas vnto kynges assur yt shulde helpe edomites came agayne smote iuda caried awaye captyue philistynes also fell city playne towarde ye south parte iuda wanne beth semes • alon gederoth socho vyllages therof timna wt vyllages therof gimso vyllages therof dwelt therin ye lorde subdued iuda achas sake ye kynge iuda made iuda naked rebelled agaynst lorde teglatpilnesser kynge assur came agaynst beseged mightie ynough achas spoyled house lorde kynges house ruler geue vnto ye kynge assur helped morouer kinge achas trespaced yet lorde euen trouble dyd sacrifyce vnto goddes damascon smitten sayde goddes kynges syria helpe therfore wil offre vnto maye helpe also yet fall vnto israel achas gathered vessel ye house god together brake vessel ye house god • pa •• shut dores twentye yeares ierusalem4 1 • • mother name abia ye doughter zachary dyd right sight lorde father dauid 2· pa •• opened dores ye house lorde first moneth ye first yeare raigne made stronge brought prestes leuites gathered together vnto east streate sayde vnto herken vnto ye leuites sanctifye youre selues yt ye maye halowe house lorde god yor father put fylthines sanctuary oure father haue trespaced done yt euell sighte lorde oure god haue forsaken turned face habitaciō ye lorde oure god turned backes shut dores porche put lampes brent incense offred burntsacrifyces sanctuary vnto god israel therfore wrath lorde come ouer iuda ierusalem hath geuen ouer scatred abrode desolate hyssed ye se yor eies· beholde euen cause fell oure father thorow swerde oure sonnes doughters wyues caryed awaye captyue mynded make couenaunt lorde god israel yt maye turne awaie v wrath indignacion sonnes ye negligent • um 18 lorde hath chosen stō de mynisters burne incense vnto rose leuites mahath sonne amasai ioel sonne asaria child rahathites child merari ci sonne abdi asaria sonne iehaleleel child gersonites ioah sonne simma eden sonne ioah childrē elizaphan simri ieiel childrē assaph sachary mathania chidren heman iehiel simei child iedithun semaia vsiel gathered brother together sanctified wente acordinge kynges commaundement worde lorde clense house ye lorde prestes entred within house lorde purifye put vnclennes founde tē ple lorde courte lordes house prestes toke vp caryed broke cedron fyrst daye fyrst moneth beganne sanctifye selues eight daye moneth wente porche lorde halowed house ye lorde eight dayes fynished sixtenth daye fyrst moneth wēte kynge ezechias sayde haue clensed house lorde altare burnt offerynges vessel table shewbred apparell therof ornamentes kynge achas cast awaye whā kynge tyme transgressed haue prepared halowed beholde altare lorde thē kynge ezechias gat vp early gathered together elder cite wēte vp vnto house lorde broughte seuen bullockes seuen rammes seuen lambes seuen goates syn offerynge sanctuary iuda spake vnto prestes child aaron shulde offre vpon altare lorde slewe bullockes prestes toke bloude sprenkled vpon ye altare slewe rammes sprenkled bloude vpon altare slewe lā be sprenkled bloude vpon altare ye goates ye syn offerynge brought kynge congregaciō layed handes vpon prestes slewe sprenkled bloude vpon altare make attonemēt israel kynge commaunded offre burntsacrifyces sin offeringes israel set leuites house lorde cymbales psaltery harpes 〈…〉 dauid commaunded gad kynges seer prophet nathan commaundement lorde prophetes leuites stode musicall instrumentes dauid prestes trompettes ezechias commaunded offre burntsacrifyces vpon altare aboute tyme burntsacrifyce begāne offred songe lorde beganne also ye trompettes dyuerse instrumentes dauid kynge israel congregacion gaue praise thankes songe musician ye blowynge trompetters endured tyll burnt offerynge fynished whan burnt offerynge perfourmed kynge bowed selues gaue praise thankes ezechias kynge wt ruler commaunded leuites prayse lorde songes dauid assaph seer gaue prayse tyll ioyfull bowed selues worshipped ezechias answered saide haue ye fylled youre hādes vnto lorde steppe forth brynge hither ye sacrifyces thank offerynges vnto house lorde congregacion broughte sacrifyces thank offerynges euery mā fre wyllinge hert brought burnt offerynges nombre burnt offerynges congregacion broughte thre score bullockes ten hundreth rā me two hundreth lambes burnt offerynge vnto lorde sanctifyed sixe hundreth bullockes thre thousande shepe prestes fewe coulde pluck skynnes burnt offerynges therfore toke brother leuites tyll worke fyniszhed tyll prestes halowed leuites easier halowed prestes many burnt offerynges fat thank offerynges drynk offerynges burntsacrifices thus ministracion house lorde prepared ezechias reioysed people prepared god done righte haistely xxx chapter ezechias sent israel iuda wrote letter vnto ephraim manasses shulde come house lorde ierusalem kepe easter vnto lorde god israel kynge helde councell ruler cōgregacion ierusalem 〈◊〉 9 b kepe passeouer seconde moneth tyme coulde kepe prestes sanctified ynough people yet come together vnto ierusalem pleased kynge well cōgregacion appointed proclamed thorow israel berseba vnto dan shulde come kepe passeouer vnto lorde god israel many kepe wrytten postes wente letter hande kynge ruler thorow israell iuda ye kynges commaundement sayde ye child israel turne vnto lorde god abraham isaac iacob shal turne ye escaped lefte ouer amonge hande kynge assur ye youre father brother rebelled agaynst lorde god father gaue thē ouer desolacion ye se youre selues ye hardnecked youre father offre youre hāde vnto lorde come sanctuary hath sanctified euer serue lorde youre god shal indignacion wrath turne awaye yf ye turne vnto lorde shal youre brother child haue mercy sighte holde captiuyte maye come agayne londe 〈◊〉 34 c lorde youre god gracious mercifull shal turne awaye face yf ye conuerte vnto postes wente one cite another londe ephraim manasses vnto zabulon mocked laughed scorne yet asser manasses zabulon submytted selues came ierusalem hande god came iuda gaue thē one hert commaundement kynge ruler worde lorde came together vnto ierusalē greate people kepe feast vnleuended bred seconde moneth greate congregacion gat vp put downe ye 2 pa 27 altares ierusalem incense put awaye cast broke cedron slewe passeouer fourtenth daye secōde moneth ye prestes leuites ashamed halowed selues broughte burnt offerynges house lorde stode ordinaunce acordinge lawe moses man god prestes sprenkled bloude hande leuites many cōgregacion sanctified therfore dyd leuites kyll passeouer clensed mighte sanctified vnto lorde many people also ephraim manasses isachar zabulon cleane ate easter lambe wrytten ezechias prayed sayde lorde gracious shalbe mercifull vnto prepare hertes vnto god seke lorde god father though clensed holy purificacion lorde herde ezechias healed people thus child israel founde ierusalē helde ye feast vnleuended bred seuen dayes greate ioye leuites prestes praysed lorde euery daye loude instrumentes lorde ezechias spake hertely vnto ye leuites good vnderstondinge lorde ate feast seuen dayes offred thāk offerynges gaue thankes vnto ye lorde god father congregacion deuysed kepe feast yet seuē dayes helde seuen dayes also ioye ezechias kinge iuda gaue heueofferynge cōgregacion euen thousande bullockes seuen thousande shepe ruler gaue heue offeringe ye congregacion euen thousande bullockes ten thousande shepe many prestes sanctified selues whole congregacion iuda reioysed prestes leuites congregacion came israel straungers come londe israel dwelt iuda greate ioye ierusalem sence tyme salomon sonne dauid kynge israel soch ioye ierusalē prestes leuites stode vp blessed people voyce herde prayer came holy habitacion heauen xxxi chapter whan fynished israelite founde ye city iuda wente brake pilers hewed downe groues brake downe hye place altares iuda ben iamin ephraim manasses tyll destroyed thē child israel wente agayne euery one possession vnto city ezechias set prestes leuites ordinaunces euery one office prestes leuites burntsacrifices thank offerynges mynister geue thankes prayse gate hoost lorde kynge gaue porcion substaūce burnt offerynges mornynge euenynge burnt offerynges sabbath newmone feastes wrytten lawe lorde spake vnto ye people dwelt ierusalem shulde geue porciōs vnto prestes leuites yt mighte stedfastly endure lawe lorde whā ye worde came forth childrē israel gaue many fyrst frutes corne wyne oyle hony allmaner increace felde broughte moch maner tithe child israel iuda dwelt city iuda broughte tithe also ox shepe tithe soch thinges sanctifyed halowed vnto lorde god made heape heape thirde moneth begāne laye vpon heapes seuenth moneth dyd fynishe whā ezechias ruler wente sawe heapes praysed lorde people israel ezechi • axed prestes leuites concernynge heapes asaria prest chefe house sadoc sayde vnto sence tyme beganne brynge heue offerynges ye house lorde haue eaten satisfied yet lefte ouer lorde hath blessed people therfore heape lefte ouer commaunded kynge shulde prepare chestes house lorde prepared them▪ put heue offerynges tithe halowed faithfully ouersighte chanania leuite simei brother seconde iehiel asasia naglath asahel ierimoth iosabad eliel iesmachia mahath benaia ordeyned hande chanania simei brother acordinge commaundement kynge ezechias asaria prynce house god core ye sonne iemna leuite power eastgate ouer frewyllinge giftes god geuen heue offerynges vnto lorde ouer holy vnder hande eden miniamin iesua semaia amaria sachania city prestes vpon credence shulde geue vnto brethrē acordinge course leest greatest vnto counted men childrē thre yeare olde aboue amonge thē wēte house lorde euery one vpō daye office attendaunces course rekened prestes house father leuites twentye yeare aboue attendaunces course rekened amonge child wyues sonnes doughters amōge whole congregacion halowed sanctifyed vpon credence men also named name amonge aaron child prestes vpon feldes suburbes ye city shulde geue porcions vnto men child amōge prestes nombred amonge leuites thus dyd ezechias iuda dyd good righte true sighte lorde god busynes toke hāde concernynge seruyce house god acordinge lawe commaundement seke god dyd hert therfore prospered well xxxii chapter actes faithfulnes came sennacharib kynge assur 〈◊〉 18 c wente iuda pitched strōge city thoughte plucke vnto whan ezechias sawe sennacherib came face stode fighte agaynst ierusalem deuysed ruler mightie men couer water welles without cite helped gathered together greate people couered ye welles water brokes myddes londe sayde lest kynges assur fynde moch water whā come toke corage vnto buylded walles decaye made towres theron buylded yet another wall without strengthed millo cite dauid made moch ordinaunce shyldes set captaynes warre ouer people gathered vnto vpon brode strete gate cite spake hertely vnto sayde stronge bolde feare afrayed kynge assur ner ye multitude one greater v 〈…〉 fleshly arme v lorde oure god helpe v fighte v ye people trusted vnto wordes ezechias kynge iuda 〈…〉 afterwarde sent sennacherib kynge assur seruauntes vnto ierusalem laye lachis hoost wt ezechias ye kinge iuda iuda ierusalē sayenge thus sayeth sennacherib ye kynge assur wherin put ye youre trust ye dwell beseged ierusalem ezechias disceaueth maye delyuer vnto death hōger thyrst sayeth lorde oure god shal delyuer v hande kynge assur ezechias hath put awaye hye place altares sayde vnto iuda ierusalem one altare shal ye worshippe burne incense theron knowe ye father haue done ye people londes haue goddes heythen londes bene able delyuer countrees fro hande amonge goddes heythen father damned able delyuer people fro hande yt youre god shulde able delyuer fro hande therfore let ezechias disceaue let persuade eny soch thinge beleue yf god heythē kyngdomes might delyuer people fro hande hande progenitours shal youre goddes able delyuer fro hande seruaūtes also spake yet lorde god agaynst seruaunt ezechias wrote letter blaspheme lorde god israel spake sayde like goddes heythen londes haue bene able delyuer people hande euen shal god ezechias delyuer people fro hande cryed loude voyce iewish langage vnto people ierusalem vpon wall make fearfull fayntharted might wynne cite spake agaynst god ierusalem euen agaynst goddes nacions vpon earth workes men hondes contrary wyse kynge ezechias prophet esay sonne amos prayed cryed vnto heauē lorde sent angell destroyed mightie men hoost prynces ruler ye tentes kynge assur departed agayne shame owne londe 4 19 b whan wente god house yt came owne body slewe swerde thus lorde helped ezechias ierusalem hāde sennacherib ye kynge assur mayntayned thē frō euery syde yt many broughte presentes vnto lorde ierusalem iewels vnto ezechias kynge iuda afterwarde exalted sighte heythen ye tyme ezechias deedsicke prayed vnto lorde made promes4 20 esa 28 gaue wondertoken ezechias recōpensed acordinde geuen vnto hert lifted vp therfore came wrath vpon vpon iuda ierusalem neuertheles ezechias humbled selfe hert bene exalted ierusalem therfore came wrath lorde vpon whyle ezechias lyued ezechias greate rich worshippe made treasure syluer golde precious stone spyces shyldes maner costly vessell corne house increace corne wyne oyle stalles maner catell foldes shepe buylded city many catell shepe ox god gaue moch good ezechias couered hye water condyte gihon conveyed vnder west syde ye cite dauid ezechias prospered workes whan interpreter chefe babilon sent vnto axe question concernynge wondertokē happened londe god lefte deut • tempted mighte knowne soeuer hert saye ezechias mercifulnes beholde wryttē vision prophet esay sonne amos boke kynges iuda israel ezechias fell slepe father buried ouer sepulcres child dauid iuda ierusalē dyd worshippe death manasses sonne kynge steade xxxiii chapter manasses twolue yeare olde whā made kynge4 21 reigned fyue fiftye yeare ierusalem dyd euell sighte lorde euen abominacions heythen lorde expelled child israel turned backe buylded hye place 4 18 father ezechies broken downe set vp altares vnto baalim made groues worshipped hoost heauen serued buylded altares also ye lordes house wherof lorde sayde 2 par 7 c ierusalem shal name euer vnto hoost heauen buylded altares courtes ye house lorde valley sonne hennon caused awne sonnes go thorow fyre chosed dayes regarded byrdescryenge witch founded soythsayers expounder token dyd moch euell sighte lorde prouoke vnto wrath carued ymages also idol caused make set vp god house wherof lorde saide vnto dauid salomon sonne house ierusalem haue chosen trybes israel wyl set name euer wyl nomore let fote israel remoue frō londe appoynted father farre obserue yt haue commaunded lawe statute ordinaunces moses manasses disceaued iuda ierusalē dyd worse heythen lorde destroyed child israel lorde spake vnto manasses people regarded therfore dyd lorde cause ruler hoost kynge assur come vpō thē toke manasses presoner bōdes bounde cheynes broughte vnto babilon 〈…〉 whan trouble made intercession lorde god humbled selfe greatly god father prayed besoughte herde prayer broughte agayne ierusalem kyngdome manasses knewe lorde god afterwarde buylded ye vttemost wall cite dauid west syde gihon broke intraunce fyshgate rounde aboute 〈…〉 ophel made hye layed captaynes ye strōge city iuda put awaye ye straunge goddes idol ye house ye lorde altares buylded vpō mount house lorde ierusalem cast cite buylded altare lorde offred slayn offerynges thankofferynges theron commaunded iuda shulde serue lorde god israel neuertheles though people offred vnto lorde god yet offred vpon hye place saye manasses prayer god wordes seer spake vnto name lorde god israel beholde amonge actes kynges israel prayer intercession synne offence rowmes wherin buylded hye place groues founded ydols afore hūbled himselfe beholde wrytten amonge actes seer manasses fell slepe father buried house amon sonne kynge steade two twētye yeare olde amon whā made kynge reigned two yeare ierusalē dyd euell sighte lorde manasses father done amon offred vnto idol father manasses made serued thē yet dyd humble himselfe lorde manasse father submitted himselfe amon trespaced euer seruauntes cōspyred agaynst slewe house smote people londe conspyred agaynst kynge amon people londe made iosias sonne kynge steade xxxiiii chapter iosias eight yeare olde whan made kynge 〈◊〉 22 reigned one thirtye yeare ierusalem dyd righte sighte lorde walked wayes dauid father turned asyde nether righte hande ner lefte eight yeare reigne whā yet childe beganne seke god father dauid twolueth yeare begāne clense iuda ierusalē hye place groues carued idol molten ymages caused altares baalim broken downe ymages theron hewed downe ye groues carued idol moltē ymages brake peces made dust scatred vpon graues offred vnto bone prestes brent vpō altares clēsed iuda ierusalē ye city manasses ephraim simeon vnto nephtali wyldernesses euerysyde whā broken downe altares groues smytten idol peces hewed downe ymages londe israel came agayne ierusalem eightēth yeare reigne whā clensed londe house 〈◊〉 • 2 sent saphan sonne asalia maeseia shreue cite ioath sonne ioahas chaunceler repayre house lorde god came hechias ye hye prest delyuered vnto money broughte vnto house god leuites kepte threshouldes gathered manasses epraim residue israel iuda ben iamin dwelt ierusalē delyuered vnto hādes worke men house lorde gaue vnto wrought house lorde decaye yt shulde repayre gaue forth vnto carpenter buylders bye fre stone hewen tymber balkes house kynges destroyed men laboured faithfully worke ouer ordeyned iahath obadia leuites child merari zachary mesullam child kahathites worke leuites coulde playe vpon instrumentes ouer bare burthen furthured maner worke office scrybes officer dore kepers leuites whā toke money broughte vnto ye house lorde helchias prest founde boke lawe lorde geuen moses helchias answered saide vnto saphan scrybe4 22 b haue founde boke lawe ye house ye lorde helchias delyuered boke vnto saphan saphan bare vnto kynge broughte ye kynge worde agayne sayde geuen vnder handes thy seruauntes make ye money founde ye house lorde haue gathered together delyuered vnto ye officer workman saphan scrybe tolde kynge sayde helchias prest hath delyuered boke saphan red therin kynge whan kynge herde wordes lawe rente clothes kynge commaunded helchias ahicam sonne saphan abdon sonne micha saphan scrybe asaia kynges seruaunt sayde go youre waye axe councell lorde remnaunt israel iuda concernynge wordes boke founde greate indignacion lorde gone forth ouer v oure father haue • kepte worde lorde acordinge wrytten boke wēte helchias sent kynge vnto prophetisse hulda wife sallum sonne thecoath sonne hafra keper clothes dwelt ierusalem secōde parte spake vnto sayde vnto thus sayeth lorde god israel tell man yt sent vnto thus sayeth ye lorde beholde wil brynge plage vpō place inhabiters therof euē curse wrytten boke red kynge iuda haue forsakē brēt incēse vnto goddes prouoke workes handes indignacion shal go forth vpon cite shal quenched maner shal ye saye vnto kynge iuda sent axe councell lorde thus sayeth ye lorde god israel concernynge wordes thou hast herde thine hert moued thou hast humbled thy selfe sighte god whan thou herdest wordes agaynst place inhabiters therof hast submytted thy selfe rent thy clothes wepte therfore haue herde sayeth ye lorde beholde wil gather vnto thy father thou shalt layed thy graue peace yt thine eye shal se euell wyl brynge ouer place indweller therof broughte kynge worde agayne sent ye kynge caused elder iuda ierusalem come together4 23 kynge wente vp house lorde men iuda inhabiters ierusalē prestes leuites people small greate wordes boke couenaunt founde house lorde red eares ye kynge stode place made couenaunt lorde shulde walke lorde kepe cōmaundementes testimony statute hert soule acordinge vnto wordes couenaunt wrytten boke stode founde ierusalem ben iamin ye inhabiters ierusalem dyd acordinge couenaunt god god father iosias put awaye abhominacions londes child israel caused founde israel serue lorde god 〈…〉 longe iosias lyued departed lorde god father xxxv chapter iosias kepte passeouer vnto lorde ierusalem slewe passeouer fourtenth daye first moneth 〈…〉 set prestes office strengthed mynistracion house lorde sayde vnto leuites taughte israel sanctified vnto ye lorde put holy arke house salomon ye sonne dauid kynge israel dyd buylde 〈…〉 ye shal beare nomore vpon youre shulders se ye serue lorde youre god people israel prepare house youre father youre course appoynted dauid kynge israel salomō sonne stonde sanctuary ye course father house amonge youre brother child people course father house amonge leuites kyll passeouer sanctifye prepare youre brother maye acordinge worde lorde moses iosias gaue lambes yonge kyddes male heue offerynge comontye passeouer euery one founde nombre thirtye thousande thre thousande ox kynges good prynces awne good wyll gaue heue offerynge people prestes leuites namely helchias zachary iehiel prynces ye house god amō ge prestes passeouer two thousande sixe hundreth thre hūdreth ox chanania semaia nathaneel brother gasabia ieiel iosabad chefe leuites gaue leuites heue offerynge passeouer fyue thousande shepe fyue hundreth ox thus god seruyce prepared prestes stode place leuites course acordinge kynges commaundement kylled passeouer prestes toke handes sprenkled leuites toke skynnes remoued burnt offerynge geue amonge porcions father house multitude congregacion offre vnto lorde 〈◊〉 1 wrytten ye boke moses euen dyd ox also dighte passeouer fyre 〈◊〉 1 • b acordinge lawe halowed dighte pottes kettels pannes made haist comon people afterwarde prepared selues also ye prestes prestes child aaron occupied burnt offerynges fat vntyll nighte therfore must leuites prepare selues prestes child aaron syngers child asaph stode place acordinge 〈◊〉 ▪ • 6 • 7 dauids commaundement asaph heman iedithim kynges seer porter gate departed office leuites brother prepared thus god seruyce prepared daye passeouer mighte kepte burntsacrifices offred vpon altare lorde acordinge commaundement kynge iosias child israel hande helde passeouer tyme feast vnleuended bred seuen dayes senc • ye tyme samuel prophet passeouer kepte israel like kynge israel holdē soch passeouer iosias dyd prestes leuites iuda soch founde israel inhabiters ierusalem eightēth yeare reigne iosias passeouer kepte whan iosias prepared house necho kynge egipte wente vp fighte agaynst carcamis besyde euphrates iosias wēte forth agaynst sent messaungers vnto sayenge haue kynge iuda come agaynst fighte agaynst another house god hath sayde shal make haist ceasse god destroye neuertheles iosias turned face prepared himselfe fighte herkened vnto wordes necho mouth god came fighte wt vpon playne besyde mageddo archer shot kynge iosias kynge sayde vnto seruauntes cary awaye sore wounded seruaūtes toke charet caried vpon seconde charet broughte ierusalem dyed buried amonge sepulcres father iuda▪ ierusalem mourned iosias ieremy bewayled iosias synginge men wemen spake lamētacions ouer iosias vnto daye made custome therof vnto daye beholde wrytten also amonge lamentacions saye iosias mercy acordinge scripture lawe lorde actes first last beholde wrytten boke kynges israel iuda xxxvi chapter people londe toke ioahas sonne iosias4 23 • • esd 1 made kynge father steade ierusalem thre twentye yeare olde ioahas whan made kynge reigned thre monethes ierusalem kynge egipte deposed ierusalem condemned londe hundreth talentes syluer one talent golde kynge egipte made eliachim brother kynge ouer iuda ierusalē turned name ioachim necho toke brother ioahas caried egipte fyue twentye yeare olde ioachim whā made kynge reigned eleuē yeare ierusalē dyd euell siighte lorde god 4 • 4 • nabuchodonosor kynge babilon wente vp agaynst bounde cheynes cary vnto babilon nabuchodonosor broughte certayne vessel ye house lorde vnto babilon put temple babilon saye ioachim abhominacions dyd founde beholde wrytten boke kynges israel iuda ioachim sonne kynge steade eight yeare olde ioachim whan made kynge reigned thre monethes ten dayes ierusalē dyd yt euell sighte ye lorde whā yeare came aboute nabuchodonosor sent thither caused fetched vnto babilon costly vessel iewels house lorde made sedechias brother kynge ouer iuda ierusalem iere 52 4 24 one twentye yeare olde sedechias whan made kynge reigned eleuen yeare ierusalem dyd euell sighte lorde god submytted himselfe face prophet ieremy spake mouth lorde fell awaye also nabuchodonosor kynge babilon taken ooth god styfnecked hardened hert shulde conuerte vnto lorde god israel ye chefe amonge prestes people multiplyed synnes acordinge abhominacions heythen dyfyled house lorde sanctified ierusalem • ere 25 lorde god father sent vnto early messaungers spared people habitacion laughed messaungers god scorne despysed wordes prophetes derision lōge tyll indignacion lorde increased ouer people remedye healinge 4 • 5 broughte kynge caldees vpon caused slaye yonge men swerde house sanctuary spared nether yonge māner virgin nether aged ner graūd father gaue hande vessel house god greate small treasure house ye lorde treasure kynge prynces caused caried vnto babilon brent house god brake downe wall ierusalē palace therof brent fyre costly ornamentes destroyed loke escaped ye swerde hī caried awaye vnto babilon became seruaūtes seruauntes sonnes tyll persian empyre • ere 25 b ye worde lorde mouth ieremy mighte perfourmed euen vntyll londe ynough hir sabbathes tyme desolacion sabbath vntyll seuentye yeares fulfylled 1 esd 1 3 esd 2 first yeare cyrus kynge persia worde lorde spoken mouth ieremy mighte fulfylled lodde raysed vp sprete cyrus kynge persia caused proclamed thorow empyre yee wrytinge also sayenge thus sayeth cyrus kynge persia lorde god heauen hath geuen kyngdomes londe hath commaunded buylde house ierusalem iuda soeuer amonge people lorde god let go vp ende seconde boke cronicles first boke esdras boke conteyneth chap cyrus otherwyse called core kynge persia geueth iewes lycōce go agayne ierusalem buylde chap ii nombre wente vp babilon vnto ierusalem chap iii people resorte ierusalem prestes buylde altare kepe wente vp eszdras vnto ierusalem chap ix eszdras sory people haue myxte selues heythenish wemen chap x make couenaunt put awaye heythenish wyues first chapter first yeare cyrus kynge persia worde lorde spoken 〈…〉 mouth ieremy might fulfilled lorde stered vp sprete cyrus kynge persia yt caused proclamed thorow empyre yee wrytinge also sayenge thus sayeth cyrus kynge persia lorde god heauē hath geuen kyngdomes londe 〈◊〉 4 • hath commaunded buylde house ierusalem iuda soeuer amonge people lorde god let go vp ierusalem iuda buylde house lorde god israel ye god ierusalē euer remayneth yet eny maner place straunger let mē place helpe syluer golde good catell good frewill house god ierusalem gat vp pryncipall father iuda ben iamin prestes leuites whose sprete god raysed go vp buylde house lorde ierusalē aboute strengthed hande vessel syluer golde good catell iewels besydes gaue awne frewill kynge cyrus brought forth vessel lordes house • ▪ pa • 6 c 〈…〉 1 nabuchodonosor takē ierusalem put god house cyrus ye kynge persia brought thē forth mithredath treasurer nombred thē vnto seszbazar prynce iuda nombre thirtye basens golde thousande basens syluer nyne twentye knyues thirtye cuppes golde syluer cuppes foure hundreth ten vessel thousande vessel golde syluer fyue thousande foure hundreth seszbazar broughte vp came vp captiuyte babilon vnto ierusalem ii chapter childrē londe wente vp captiuyte whō nabuchodonosor kynge babilon caried awaye vnto babilon came agayne ierusalem iuda euery one vnto cite came zorobabel iesua nehemias seraia reeleia mardachai bilsan mispar begeuai rehum baena nombre men people israel child phares two thousande hūdreth two seuentye child sephatia thre hundreth two seuentye child arath seuen hundreth fyue seuentye child pahath moab amonge child iesua ioab two thousande eight hundreth twolue child elam thousande two hundreth foure fiftye child sathu nyne hundreth▪ fyue fortye child sacai seuē hundreth thre score child ban sixe hundreth two fortye child bebai sixe hundreth thre twentyethe child asgad thousande two hundreth two twentye child adonicam sixe hūdreth sixe sixtye child bigeuai two thousande sixe fiftye child adin foure hundreth foure fiftye child ater ezechias eight nynetye child bezai thre hundreth thre twentye child iorath hundreth twolue child hasum two hundreth thre twentye child gibbar fyue nynetye child bethleem hundreth thre twentye men netopha sixe fiftye men anathot hundreth eight twentye child asmaueth two fortye child kiriath arim caphira beeroth seuen hundreth thre fortye child rama gaba sixe hundreth one twētye men michmas▪ hundreth two twentye men bethel ai two hundreth thre twentye childrē nebo two fyftye child magbis hūdreth sixe fiftye childrē elam thousande two hundreth foure fiftye child harim thre hundreth twentye childrē lodhadid ono seuē hūdreth fyue twētye childrē iericho thre hundreth fyue fortye child senaa thre thousande sixe hundreth thirtye prestes child iedaia house iesua nyne hundreth thre seuentye childrē iemmer thousande two fiftye child pashur thousande two hūdreth seuen fortye childrē harim thousande seuentene leuites child iesua cadmiel child hodauia foure seuentye syngers child asaph hundreth eight twentye child dorekepers child sallum child ater childrē talmon child acub child hatita child sobai alltogether hundreth nyne thirtye nethinims child ziha child hasupha child tabaoth child cero child sieha child padon child lebana child hagaba child acub childrē hagab child samlai child hanan child giddel child gahar childrē reaia child rezin child necuba child gasan child vsa child passeah child bessai child asna child meunim child nephussim child bacbuc childrē hacupha child harhur ye childrē hazeluth ye childrē mehira counted amonge name soughte register byrth founde none therfore put presthode hathirsatha sayde vnto shulde eate holy tyll rose vp prest 〈…〉 lighte perfectnesse whole congregacion one man two fortye thousande thre hundreth thre score besyde seruauntes maydēs seuē thousande thre hundreth seuen thirtye two hundreth singinge men wemen seuē hundreth sixe thirtye horse two hundreth fyue fortye mule foure hūdreth fyue thirtye camel sixe thousande seuen hundreth twentye ass certayne chefe father whan came house lorde ierusalem well mynded vnto house god shulde set place gaue abilyte vnto treasure worke one thre score thousande gulden fyue thousande pounde syluer hundreth prestes garmentes prestes leuites certayne ye people syngers po • ters ye nethinims dwelt city israel city iii chapter whan seuenth moneth came child israel city 〈…〉 people came together euen one man vnto ierusalem stode vp iesua sonne iosedec brother prestes zorobabel sonne saalthiel brother buylded altare god israel offre burnt offerynges theron wrytten lawe moses man god altare set vpon sokettes fearfulnes amonge nacions lōdes offred burnt offeringes theron vnto ye lorde 〈…〉 mornynge euen helde feast tabernacle
